line: I've seen a lot of dicks. That is what most of them look like. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm already in my cups. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: What? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: So where do you two come from? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Us two? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Yes, you two with the horns. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Well, I don't know where he comes from. You think we all come from the same place? That was really inconsiderate. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: No, you are very different it's very clear. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: He's purple. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: She's blue. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Which is pretty rare. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: He's every color. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: It's very true. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I'm from Nicodranas. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Remember when we started the first campaign and all those places came in a split second and all that history. I'm from Shrev`nam Chicago. Oh yes. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm from the circus. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: So you're a traveler then? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Oh yeah. Quite a while. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Since childhood? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Long as I can reasonably remember at the very least. It's been a while. It's nice. I like it. They're good people. Work hard. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: You have a lot of scars. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: That's a very funny story, actually. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I like funny stories. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Me too. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: You did some crazy shit with that sword of yours. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Thank you. These swords-- you buy a drink and we'll see. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: You polish off that one already? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Wow, that's a lot-- okay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Can we get another round? For the-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: How much I owe you for the first round? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: They are keeping a tally of the table. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Frumpkin scrabbles up onto Nott's shoulder. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Hi Frumpy, nice to see you again. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Mother always told me to never give a story away for free. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Wise words. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: My mother said don't give away other things for free. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I already like your mother. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: My mother always said nothing in life is free. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I can tell. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: None of this absolves the dodgy goblin who slinked past that first question. Where are you from? What are you traveling from? Why the mask? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Only because we seem to find ourselves in quite the predicament. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: We're just a couple of friends, strolling around the countryside looking for adventure. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Sure you are. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Do you see many goblins walking around cities here? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: It has nothing to do with that. People who move from place to place frequently tend to have other stories as to why they're doing it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Well, let me make it clear: goblins are not typically welcome in any cities, that is why the mask. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Well, you're going back to the goblin thing. I'm more curious about the travel thing. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: We have a string of bad luck. We tend to get in trouble in places for various reasons. Some of which is my fault. Most of which is my fault. I have sticky fingers. I can't help myself sometimes. I'm fascinated by little bobbles and fancy pieces of jewelries and I love trinkets so much! I just have to take them, and have them with me, and put them in my pockets. It's gotten us in a few scrapes a couple times. Caleb, he is fantastic. Very patient with me, understands. But really it's my fault; it's not him. He's a smart man, a brilliant magician! Have you seen? Some of his tricks are phenomenal, really. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: No, I'd love to. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I feel bad to because we never stay in one place long enough for him to have a decent shower. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: It's a moving story. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I immediately check my pockets after that to see is Nott has lifted anything. Is everything still there, all my coin? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Make an investigation check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm going to join you on this one. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Not great. Not great at all. Six. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: 16? Everything seems to be in order for you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Wait that was a 15! Right? That was the dice I rolled? 16. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Everything seems to be in order. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Okay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Anyway, that's the long and short of it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: What do you do with the things once you steal them? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Well the nice ones I keep. I have a little-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Do you have a collection? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I collect a lot of things, but in the last place we hunkered down, it was all taken from me. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: We were in one of those prisons before-- Am I sharing too much? I'm sharing too much, aren't I? We were in a prison, they took all of our belongings. I lost all of my collections. I had a lovely rock collection. I had a rare coin collection. I had a stick collection. Yeah, it's all gone now. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: What about shiny things, though? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I love them. I just don't have any right now. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Because I think if you have sticky fingers for sticks and rocks, I don't think that will get you in trouble. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: True. But they were like people's canes and things. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I mean I call them sticks because I don't need them. But I suppose they really needed them. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah, that makes sense. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: There's only one way to find out. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Wait, I'm sorry. I think I need clarification. If sticks mean things like valuable canes, what do rocks mean to you? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: You know those rocks that humans wear on their fingers and around their necks and stuff. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: They're really nice rocks. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: We don't have many of those at the moment. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Would it be fair to say that the more someone desires something, the more you're interest increases? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Oh I don't care about the people who have them. I just like pretty things. Toys, anything really. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I'll keep an eye out for things that you would like. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Okay! Can you help with that? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I can if you want me to. Or I can point it out. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Is it the joy of taking the things or do you just like gifts? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: No, it's the collecting. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: It's like a nervous tick a little bit. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Are you good at it? Do you get caught very often? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Well, would you like a demonstration? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yes! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Now, Jester, if I may, we are already in a little bit of a pickle. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Steal something from me! Do you want me to close my eyes? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Sure! That'll make it really easy. Are they closed? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: All right. Out of practice here. I'm going to do a shot. Crack my knuckles. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Just don't take the thing on my waist, because he'll be pissed. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: He'll be pissed? What? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: He? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: What's on your waist? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm looking at her waist. What's on her waist? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: What's on your waist? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: My symbol to the Traveler. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Oh. All right, I'll go to her left buttcheek pocket and fish around. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I'm in a dress. I don't have a pocket on my buttcheek. But you can try. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: What pockets do you have? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I would have pockets on the front of my dress, and maybe a little pouch on my hip. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I'll do the hip pocket. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: All right, make a sleight of hand check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Three. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You close your eyes and feel a tug and a shake-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Plus eight. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: What's your passive perception? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm going to guess ten. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: No, it's 13. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: So, yeah, you totally feel-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: You're doing great! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: This is not how it usually works! The person is not really expecting it. This is embarrassing, really. I have the one skill and I failed at it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: It's okay, you can keep practicing. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: There is that one magic trick that you're able to do. Would you like to show them the magic trick that you can do? I pull out a small red clay ceramic bowl. Then I pull out a copper piece. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Here, you know the trick, right? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Yes, I know the trick. Takes a little bit of time, doesn't it? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: You're good. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Okay. (clears throat) I do know one piece of magic. Feast your eyes-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I take one step back. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: on the sacred money pot of school. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: If you place a copper piece into this pot and say the magic words-- what's the magic word again? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Fibulous. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Fibulous! It will turn into a silver piece. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Should I say it? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I want to hear you say it, anyway. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Only I can say it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: For everyone has their own magic word, and it won't work with you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: (vocalizing, trills) By the ancient order of the school, fibulous! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: That is a silver coin right there. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh my gosh. Wait a minute. Does this mean the silver I won from you was actually copper? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: No, it only works up. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Great! Thanks for the silver. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Well, no, we weren't giving you the silver piece just showing you a bit of magic. This pot is actually quite powerful. It can do that once a day, so if you'd like to purchase it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Can you turn this into a gold piece? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Well, it only works once a day. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Well, tomorrow can you make it gold? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I think it only does the copper to silver? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: The magic is not that strong. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Yes, it's a mild magic pot. But if you'd like to purchase it from us, we can sell it to you for five gold. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Five gold for one silver a day? That doesn't add up. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: By the end of the week you made your money back. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: No. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: At discount for friends, three gold. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Three gold. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: And for that, we'll teach you your own magic word. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: That's pretty good. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: That's 40 days. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: 40 days? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: You can do it once a day forever, you have it for the rest of your life. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah, but I have lots of money. I don't need it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: But this is free money, that you don't have to work for. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Also, you know, they basically helped us out today. You can do it for one, for them. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: All right, one gold. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: One gold. That's a really good deal. Did you hear how much he gave me a deal? Okay! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Do you give him the gold? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yes, I'll give him the gold. Hold on, let me make sure I have it. Where's my--? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: It's the second button. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh, currency! Gold. Okay, one down. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Do I notice anything shifty about that, while we were looking at his hands? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Perception check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: What's my magic word? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: It can be whatever you want it to be. You have to agree upon it and you have to focus on that word for one full day while you are in possession of the pot. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You watch that copper piece become silver, magically. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: How about skinky doodie? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Skinky doodie, that is unique. I'm sure no one else has possession of that arcane power word. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I could consider it yours if you focused on it all day tomorrow. But you really have to focus. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Okay, I will. Super a lot of focus. Skinky doodie. Thank you for this. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: It's a pleasure doing business with you. Does that answer your question? I've got some for you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: You have questions for me? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Yeah! How does someone like you -- you're human right? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, I am. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: How do you come by learning Halfling? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: My parents were in the winery business. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: The wine making business. And halflings really like wine. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Everyone likes wine! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: That's true. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Some people more than others. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Some halflings just deal in wine a lot, and a lot did in the town that I'm from and then my parents wanted me to keep up with the books and all that stuff so it forced me to learn halfling. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I was around it a lot. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: What town was that then? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: It's close by here, right? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: It's a bit aways. It's Kamordah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Hmm, haven't heard of it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: It's a small farming town, it's no big deal. It's whatever. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Nothing shady there! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Nope, just a wandering traveler just like the rest of y'all. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Well I mean I was really impressed with the little trick, I sure would like to see a big trick. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I use Thaumaturgy to open all the windows! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Being about one o'clock in the morning at this time, and the energy in the tavern has come to a quiet crawl, those who are keeping their cups are either snoring or in the process of preparing to go to sleep, you watch as Adelaine, the barmaid is walking around cleaning up tables and suddenly all the windows in the room slam open with a heavy impact and there's a burst of wind that comes through. The two crownsguard that were outside flanking the opening doorway suddenly rush and look in and look about at the lot of you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Sorry! Drinking! I did order two extra. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Two extra? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: They both just slowly curl back to their perimeter. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: You're no fun. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, circus! Woo, circus coming to town! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Jester, I meant a trick from Caleb. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: You want to see a trick? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I would love one. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I am well into my second trost at this point. I can show you a trick. Young lady, if you would assist me please. Step up onto the table. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Absolutely! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Just don't break anything. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Adjust your minds. I begin to weave one hand in a slow circle around the other, and a globe of golden light poofs out. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I put my hands and feet out in an akimbo pose. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: A second little globule of light comes out. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I feel it coming! Hit me! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Then two more at the same time come out of my hand. Then they amass upon my little companion and form a similar sized little humanoid of light that then coincides with my little friend. She is glowing golden on a table in the middle of the Nestled Nook. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: (sings) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: The Goblight, ladies and gentlemen. The Goblight! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Thank you! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: There's some claps in the back rooms. You see one of the drunken gentlemen has come to semi-consciousness and goes, "That's impressive!" (hic) Then passes back out on the table. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: How did you learn to do that? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I could always do that a little bit, as a kid. I was always good with magic. I had a knack for it. That one's easy. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: That's impressive. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Well, thank you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Aw buddy. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Maybe he can teach you how to do that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Is it something that can be taught to others? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Are you trying to learn magic? Is that a thing? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Well, I'm just a little curious about how people use their magic. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I've seen you have a few tricks up your sleeve. You seem like you're not totally magic inept. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: No, it's relatively new for me though, so I'm just trying to learn. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Are you reading a lot? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: No, I wonder if maybe I should be? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Well, it could be helpful. Although, I'm a bit of an amateur teacher. I taught Nott the one trick you saw, but other things. We've been working together, I suppose I could try to help you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Have you had your abilities your whole life, like a kid? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: No. Again, fairly recently. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Something happen? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Oh, I'm sorry, do you two not know each other super well? You seem like you do. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: We got a good 24-48 hours on the rest of you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah, we're not super deep. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Nope. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Where did you come from then? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Well I came up from the town of Port Damali. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: That's where we met! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah, I met Jester a while back and after I Ieft town, coming up to the northeast, I ran across her. I'd seen her do some of her magic before. That's what I'm trying to learn about. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: If you need anymore displays, you just let me know. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: We've seen that window thing a couple times. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: It's good. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Can I request a display? I think I have a broken rib. It might be getting more purple. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh yeah, I mean I can ask, but I think I'm tapped. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I'll sleep it off, it's fine. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah. I can try! I'll put my hand out. I'll try to cast Cure Wounds. I got shit. I got nothing. It's not happening. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: It's past midnight! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh, no. I've got to sleep. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You concentrate for a moment. Make a medicine check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Okay! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Natural 12! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: That's 17. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: 17. You focus on the bruised area, exposed out of her monk robes. You watch as the slight bruising suddenly turns like a sickly green. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Is that good? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: In a very unhealthy way. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: You know what? I think this might be worse than just like a bruised rib. Can I poke it? Does it seem infected? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Does it hurt? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I'm not going to poke it with my finger, though, I'm going to poke at it with a fork. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Don't poke at me with a fork! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Right now, she's inspecting it. You take a fork off the table and poke. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: No, you don't! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I'll use the blunt end, don't be such a baby! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: She pushes it in and the bruise hurts a bit. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You watch as this sickly pus liquid begins to pour out, with a thick viscosity and a lot of it. You all of the sudden feel like you've punctured a balloon that's beginning to erupt and you feel awful. Then you blink a few times and it's just a bruise. You hear this distant (cackling). →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh, motherfucker, he's such a dick! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: What? Who? What? What's going on? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: My bruise is in the shape of a dick? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: That would be really cool. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: That would be fun! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I'm just going make sure, I'm going to push on it a bit more. I think it's okay, you're fine. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: All right. I'll sleep it off. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I think I need some sleep, you guys. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Gustav, the person who runs the circus, is he your friend? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: He's family. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: He's family? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: We take care of each other. He's a good man. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: So what's your play tomorrow? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Well, they have all my things and they have all my family. I'm going to figure out what is going on. Try and find out what's actually doing this. I assume since it's none of us, it's going to happen again. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: But how can we because we can't leave this tavern? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Well, I-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Were Caleb and I not instructed not to leave the tavern? We received no formal instruction. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: No, you weren't part of that formal instruction. The rest of you were told not to leave the tavern until further notice. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm sure if we sleep on it, we'll think of something. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Fjord! You and I could leave in the morning the same way we got in. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: That's true. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: How'd you get in? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: With magic. I would show you now, but I'm out of spells! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: The fork trick wasn't very fun, was it? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: No. I was making sure she wasn't a zombie. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I thought she might be. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: That's fair. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: She got clawed, right? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: A bit, yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: All right. Hey bitches, I'm going to go to bed. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Where exactly am I going to be sleeping, by the way? I can sleep down here, but it might be nice-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Molly, if you would like to share my room, you can. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Excellent. You don't mind? I'm going to pull the swords off finally and start getting comfortable out of the performance clothes. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I'm in Jester's room, still, I think. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Sleeping on the floor on my bedroll. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: As she starts to go to sleep, I want to draw in my sketchbook and tell the Traveler all about the cool things I saw for the day. I'm going to draw the red faced guard as I pretended I was a zombie, and I'm going to draw Molly's horns all full of jewels and stuff! I'm going to draw the stack of books. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: The monster attack? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: And I'm going to draw like a zombie, but like as an old man but as he's biting his dentures fall out and he's not no teeth! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: All righty. Fairly decent sketches, actually. You eventually find yourself to sleep. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: The rest of you, go to your respective rooms and find yourselves falling into a night's rest. As evening comes to a close and the morning brings you to consciousness, you are rested. You are healed up, your spells are restored. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I can use the Long Rest feature of D&D Beyond! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: You hit a button! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: And all my spells back! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: There is a button for it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Whoa, nothing changed! No spells. I lost ten hit points?! What the fuck?! I've done something terribly wrong. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: D&D Beyond's watching going, "Fuck you, Nott!" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Wait no, you're putting temporary hit points on! What are you doing? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: We'll work on this during the break. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Self destruct in 10, nine. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: He just throws the iPad. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Coming to consciousness in your respective rooms, cold morning air. It's a bit frosty. The windows to each of your rooms have a bit of that curled bit of frost on the outskirts of the glass. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It's probably 8:00 or 9:00 in the morning at this point in time and the day is yours. What do you wish to do? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: As I wake up, I sit up and I go: Jester? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Hmm? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Were you laughing to yourself last night? I just kept hearing giggling. It was obnoxious. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I'm sorry. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Uh-huh. I just get ready. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: As a note, too, for all the drinks you guys drank last night, that probably put you back about one and a half gold. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Molly, that's your tab, right? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: All but the one you bought me. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah, except for that one. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: To be fair, I didn't give you that story. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: That's true. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I very carefully start unfolding my robe and it has my swords very carefully laid out in there from the closet. I do a little prayer and put everything back on. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Are you praying over your swords? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I am, of course. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Is that part of your thing? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: You seem honest. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I try to be. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Well, the swords are magic. According to my mum, they go back in our family generations to a very unusual rare line of tiefling that came from a demon of ice that lived inside a volcano. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Our family, and I take this with a grain of salt, were royal guards, were entrusted with these magic swords and these swords can only be activated by the blood of the royal family. So in honor of any fighting I ever do with them, I make sure my blood is at least drawn once. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: That's quite the story. Can I insight check him? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yes, you may. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: What am I fighting against? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: This would be deception. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: That would be deception. All right. I'm lying like a motherfucker. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Well thank you for sharing that honest story with me. It means a lot. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I walk downstairs. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: All right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Can I go knock on Fjord's door? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Sure. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Ey oh ey, good morning! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: She's a morning person too? Jesus. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Ey oh ey yourself. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: (laughter) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Hey, do you want to get out of here? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah, we said we were going to do that, didn't we? What did you have in mind? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Well, we sneak out and then we go find out why there are zombies. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: That's a detailed plan. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yes. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I like it. Are we taking anybody with us? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Well, if they can make themselves not look like themselves, then sure. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Fair enough. Do you want to ask any of them? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Hey, Beau. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Do you have anything you can do to make yourself not look like you? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I take my robes and I flip them inside out and I take some dirt and dirty it up a little bit and take my hair down and I steal a scarf off of Jester's stuff and I do a bandana around my head. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: No, you look like you with a bandana around your head. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah that's not going to cut it, not quite like what we had in mind. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: What are you guys doing? You guys leaving? Are you guys fucking leaving? You're not leaving without me are you? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: No, of course, we're coming back. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: You're skipping town. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: No. Oh, but we could. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: She's right here. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Okay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I could skip town with you, though. Do you want to skip town? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: We'll be back. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Let's see if Caleb and his little friend are downstairs first. He has tricks after all. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay, the two of you come to consciousness. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: What are you up to? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Get some breakfast, I guess? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Yeah, we're already down there. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You've already gone down there? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I've already gone. I'm having breakfast. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm leaving a note with the barkeep for Yasha if she comes back. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I guess I go down and have breakfast as well. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: As you guys wander down you find Caleb and Nott already at a table and Mollymauk returning from the bar after delivering that note. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Y'all are downstairs? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: (messy eating noises) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Can I try to pick a piece of bacon off your plate? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: (growls) Sure, for you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Thanks. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: It's like a little dog. The little back foot creeps up. (growls) If we could we're-- did you just fucking? Shit. We were thinking of maybe finding our way outside of the inn for a bit. I don't want to presume anything, but do you have the ability to change the way you look? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: To change the way I look? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah. You know →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: To leave the inn? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah, assume a different form. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Why would I do that to leave the inn? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: So we can find out why there are zombies. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Why wouldn't I just walk out of the inn? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Well, because we were told we can't leave the inn. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: We weren't told that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Huh. Well, that's convenient. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: But I can change my appearance. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Wow. I would never know it was you. →

name: MARISHA
line: I mean, you mentioned no sick people. If he was sick, sometimes that word gets around. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Maybe there is a morgue, maybe they recognized him. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: These small towns, most everyone knows everybody else. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Let's go to, is there a market area? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: They don't have a large bazaar, but there is an area that is generally where a lot of the simple wares and vegetables and meats and people who sell small things that they craft their own at, it's a small market. If you want to make an investigation check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay, by going around asking questions and inquiring and trying to prod people to talk about what transpired the night before, the information you gather involves the man who passed away. His name is Enon Brinjay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Grimjay? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Brinjay. He's a standard human being in his early 80s. He's old, but healthy, it seemed. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Was he in good health? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Seemed to be in good health for his age. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: So our war against the old continues. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Apparently. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: We're the Logan's Run of D&D. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He seemed to have been retired for quite some time, but had been making little bits here and there, helping the fishermen move fish to and from the outside of the lake. He wasn't really well known. The reason people are talking about him now is because the word is gotten around and gossiped about, but for the most part, he was one of the many faceless people that live in the town. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: A handful knew his name. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Retired fisherman? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: He was helping. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Do we know where he was retired from and where he was staying, maybe where he was drinking? He had to go somewhere. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Actually, he was known often to be drinking at The Old Mud Hole Tavern. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Is that with the weird "e" spelling? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: No, just "old." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm always a fan. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: I know. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: "Ye olde." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: "Ye olde" It's pronounced "the" when you see the ye. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I should point out this is the second connection to the Ustaloch. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: The what? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Well, before we met up with you two, we fought off a wicked, sick water snake. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: It came up out of the lake for some reason. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Is this a metaphor or is this actually a real thing? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: It really happened. I almost died. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I punched a snake to death. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: She did. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: There were the snakes in the circus last night, but it wasn't related to the attack, I suppose. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: A little different. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: How long of a snake are we talking about? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Oh, it was a giant water snake, then the little girls were complaining about more and more instances of these snakes coming out of the lake. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: And this fellow who died worked with the fishermen in the lake? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Well, he took some jobs with them. Did anybody see him the day of the carnival? Was he working with anyone that day? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You don't find any of that information. That would be an intense investigation. You would have to go beyond asking questions around a market. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Is the lake within the city limits? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It's technically considered part of the city. It might not be an issue. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Where's Ye Olde Mud Hole Tavern at? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: The Mud Hole Tavern, you've been to before. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I was doing my rounds. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yeah, when you first entered the city, so you can-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: The Lochward, is that what we're talking about? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: The Lochward is where the Old Mud Hole would be at. The Lochward is to the eastern side of the entire city. The Lochward is the central one. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: The wards border the lake. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: So you make your way to the Old Mud Hole. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Entering inside, this is a dark dive of a bar, you've been there once before. It smells heavily of old, wet wood, ale stains, and peanut. It's a very small area and of the four tables that are there, they are mostly empty, except for one old man who is sitting there in the process of playing a game of solitaire with his cards and a man in his 30s thumbing through a book, who would be the barkeep if there were more patrons at the moment. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He's flipping through and glances up and gives you a look as you enter. "Can I help you? Are you looking for drinks? Can I get you anything?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Yeah, I would really love a drink and I sit down next to him. What do you have? I need something heavier than a trost. I've had enough trosts to last me a lifetime. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "We have liquor." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I will take your liquor. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I will get some whiskey for you then. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Whiskey, everyone?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Sure. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Two please. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: It's okay. She's my daughter. She loves whiskey. I don't even remember what voice I was doing. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: (laughing) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Make a deception check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I let her have any whiskey she wants. Oh, that's pretty good. 17. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: We've been doing a pub crawl. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He goes and lines up a few small containers, fills whiskey for all of you. "All right, that will be eight silver for the batch." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I have that. I pull out eight silver. Oh wait, silver, did you say? I do not have eight silver. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: It's okay. I have it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: You do? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Sure. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: (high-pitched voice) I mean, sure. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He takes the silver and puts it away, slides the drinks to the rest of you and goes back to his book and starts thumbing through again. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Honestly, it's been a terrible 24 hours. We were at the circus last night and I did not know him well, but old man Brinjay fell. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He looks up and goes, "Enon, it's sad to see him go and many of us were wondering what day it was going to be." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Did you know him? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "He came in here most every day to drink. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He's a lonely man." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: It was a terrible way to go. I'm sorry. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Doesn't bother me one way or the other. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Just sad to lose a patron." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Do you know who was talking to him the day of the carnival? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I don't recall. Sometimes he would tell stories to whoever was willing to listen and not most were willing to listen." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Was he here that day? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Yesterday?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I think he came in briefly for a drink before the carnival, but that was it." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: You know, we should drink to old stories of Brinjay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: (shushes) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I down my shot. What did the man drink out of curiosity? What was his final drink? I'm a bit of a macabre person myself. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "It's this very whiskey you just had." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'll take one more, and I'll get one of my own. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I heard he was sick, too. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I don't believe he was ill. I hope not. He seemed to be rather wasting away. You shouldn't be doing so much manual labor at that age." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: What labor was he doing? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "He carries stuff around from small tasks to-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Down at the docks? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "The docks, up at the North Ward. He carried crates, boxes. Just odd jobs, ways to get by 'til the end of his days, which now that they've come, may he rest and not have to do odd jobs ever again." He pours his own bit of whiskey. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: ALL
line: Cheers. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Do you know who he was doing odd jobs for that day? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Your lady voice is worse than mine. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "To be honest, if he did, I wasn't paying attention." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I'm sure his family will miss him very much. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "There's nobody nearby. He had a son about 35 years ago, but he got married and went up north." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Did he work for any of the particular breweries around? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I don't know. Maybe." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Brinjay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Where did he sit in here? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He points over to the not the table the guy is playing solitaire on, but the empty table to the right of him. "Usually right there in the corner." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I go sit in the corner. I'm going to look for anything I can find that looks like an old man was touching it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay, make an investigation check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Okay. I'm really good at these. 12. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: 12. It looks like probably old person touching has been all over here. Yes. The table is very old and warped in places, stains all over it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It's not a very good table. It's seen some rough days. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: If we were to go down to the docks and ask after a few people he worked with, is there anyone you know that we should speak to, familiar of his? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I apologize. I served him drinks and pretended to listen to him many times, but I wasn't really paying attention." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I understand that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Is there anyone who did? That wasn't hypothetical. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Maybe. I apologize. I spend most of my days reading." He lifts the book. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: What's the book? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: You read! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Subtle, guys. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: We got a reader. While they're doing this, I'm going to saunter over to the card player. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Can I see what's on the spine of that book from where I am? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: At a glance at it, it's in Zemnian, which you can read. The translation would come about to The Rosed Embrace. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: A romance novel. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Probably. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Is Fabio on the cover? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: How's your trashy novel? Is it a good one? No judgement. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "It's not trashy. It's very tasteful." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Oh no, I'm fluent in Zemnian. I've read all of his works. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Have you?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Mutual fan. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I didn't realize there was another Samuel fan in here. Which is your favorite?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I love the Farthing's Embrace. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I haven't read that one." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: It's an early one. He actually did it under a pseudonym. He did a whole series under that pseudonym, short stories. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "What is it again?" He goes over and grabs a piece of chalk in the back and starts, "It was--?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Farthing's Embrace. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Mein Gott, I did not know about this. I may have to send out Zadash and see if we can find some of those books. Thank you." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: You're a big reader or just Samuel? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Just recently Samuel. I read on occasion. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It depends on what you can find." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I read a lot, but all I've been able to find in this town is that parchment place. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "The parchment place is good for trash. If you're looking for unique stuff, there's a few places you can go." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Here in town? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Here in town, yeah. If you're having a hard time finding a specific book, I would recommend going to Burnished Bibelots." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Burnished Bibelots. Which ward is that in? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "That is in the North Ward, just on the outskirts of the main market street. It's a bit of a cluttered mess, but Oglen would be happy to help you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Oglen? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Oglen." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: That is good to know. Thank you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Not to worry." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Those are hard to find, the Farthing's Embrace. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I imagine so. It can't be that bad." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: He wasn't as proud of them. Early work and all that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Of course. I have a contact in Rexxentrum. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: If I cannot find it in Zadash, I will get it from Rexxentrum." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: That would be the place. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "What's your name?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: My name is Caleb. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Caleb. Pleasure to meet you. I am Vosna." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Thank you for the drink, Vosna. I'll be taking my leave now. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Of course. If anybody else is a reader as well, come by and talk sometime." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Not there at all. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: This has been quite a day. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Is there pictures? (in high-pitched voice) Is there pictures? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Pictures are up in here." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh. Sounds exciting. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I sneak my undrunk whiskey to Nott. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I take out my flask from my leg, unscrew it, and pour it in. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: What do you guys think? Should we stay here? Should we go somewhere else? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: We got to get Molly. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I just sat down for a moment with this solitaire player. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Correct. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: They say that solitaire is the game for the death-obsessed. There's inevitability to every hand, most of them are doomed from the start no matter what you do. Any interest to buck fate and try your hand at an opponent for once? No money, just friendly. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I slide the rest of my whiskey over. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Are you a devil?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I've been called worse. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I don't play with devils." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm just a man who saw another man die yesterday. It's been heavy on my conscience and I was just wondering if there was anything you could tell me about Enon. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Enon wanted to go to that bloody circus." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm regretting it myself. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I told him not to go. Stupid, it is for the common folk and the young. He's always had his head in the clouds." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Has he? That's not what other people have said. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Other people are stupid." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Why do you think he went? Why do you think that happened to him? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "He's lonely. Don't trust the carnival. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Nothing but spooks and magicians and things that want to take your life and take your money, take your family, whisk you away. Fuck the circus." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Fuck the circus. So that's what you think happened to him, then? I feel like there's something evil afoot. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Says the devil." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Again, I've been called worse. Sure you have in your time, as well. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He takes the drink, sips it. "Don't come 'round here no more." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I take my cup back. Down it. I love small towns. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Shithead. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: We head outside. Well, that was revealing. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Was it? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: We learned a few things, actually. He's a prime target. Perfect victim, perfect candidate. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: No one really paid attention to him, he was old, he had no family, his son's gone. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Awfully convenient. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Awfully convenient. Still awfully convenient that your little circus doesn't allow the elderly, which you never fully explained, and he happened to be one of the oldest people in that circus. Where did that rule come from? The sick makes sense, I asked you that before, but why elderly? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: That rule's been around for as long as I can remember because it makes people think the show's dangerous. Gives them a thrill. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: You're worried about them having a heart attack or something? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: We're not really worried about people having a heart attack; we want people to be worried about having a heart attack, because then they're more excited to come see the show. This is how these shows work. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Do you know who implemented that rule? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Before my time. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: In his defense, every carnival I've gone to has said no sick people, no old people. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: It's a boilerplate. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Still a good candidate. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: If you were trying to hide doing something to someone it's a great candidate. If I was trying to get away with something, terrible idea. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Or if you were trying to frame someone. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Seems to be a lot of pretty bigoted people in this town who don't like tieflings and other strange lots. Jester, you actually said one of the smartest things of the night, which is-- you did, yeah. Which is, guard's really weird. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Right? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Wait, what? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: The guards are really weird. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: The Crownsguards. As you were saying, the Ustaloch? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: What kind of weird? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Like, you know, they-- What kind of weird? (laughter) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: They seem to be the one connecting through-line. Also, what's her name, Norda? Mentioned that she didn't want to let you lot in, but made an exception. I don't know, if I wanted to do something, and if I already knew a bunch of people were upset and angry at a circus and strange people coming in, it's easy framing, in my opinion. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: She makes a valid point, actually. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: LAURA. Oh. If people are scared of carnivals, they won't want them in the future. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Bingo. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: That, or if you're up to no good and you don't want to get caught, blame it on the easy frame. The weirdos who just rolled into town. →
