episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Great, so we just need to investigate the guards. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: That might be harder to do. Maybe we go down to the Lochward. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Start at the docks, but I'll keep that in mind. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I don't know, it might not be the guards. There might be another through-line that we're missing. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Do we need to question the guards? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: That sounds terrible. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Maybe we should tell them they can't leave town. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Ooh, that's a good idea, yeah! Maybe when they question us-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: We turn it around! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I like that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I was about-- nope, nevermind. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: What? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I was about to be very impressed, but I take it back. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Aw. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: How far is it from where we are to the Lochward? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You guys are technically in the Lochward. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It's a quick jaunt over to the edge of the Ustaloch. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: So the Ustaloch is the docks? It's what they called the ward, or it's the lake? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It's the giant lake that the docks are up against. The city is built against this giant, kidney bean-shaped lake. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: What does "usta" mean? What does "usta" come from? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Do you speak Zemnian? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: You speak Zemnian. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I do speak Zemnian. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: What does "usta" mean? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: It means-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Do you know? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Do I know? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: I just wanted to fuck with you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: It's been a while, but osten means lake. No, it's not Lake Lake. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Essentially, it just means "an east lake." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: East Lake. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Very good. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Not too complicated. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: All right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'd like to avoid the guards for as long as possible. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Agreed. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Let's head down to the docks. Keeping an eye out for crownsguard. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: As you guys make your way towards the Ustaloch and the Dockward there, we'll go and take a break. We'll be back in a few minutes. We'll continue to unveil this mystery. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: This is exciting. Gripping. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Indeed. I suppose. Little low level mystery here. We'll see where this goes. All right guys, back here in a few minutes. We're going to take a quick restroom break, pick it up from here. We have video at the break for this week's contest, so if you're watching on Twitch, feel free to go ahead and pay attention to get the password and enter this contest, and we'll have the victor at the end of the break. We'll be back here in a few minutes, and we'll see you then. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: [break] →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Welcome back, everyone. Before we dive in, real fast, we do have a winner from the chat. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Thanks, Sam. Congratulations to AvilynRain, AvilynRain in the Twitch chat! You won the awesome Wyrmwood prize package. Danoba will be in contact with you to get your contact information and get that sent out to you. Congratulations. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I love how we just went through every rain song in about 30 seconds. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yeah we did! Most of them. As you guys make your way across the streets of the Lochward, you find yourself to the docks, which are about five or six main dock structures that protrude anywhere from ten to 30 or so feet into the loch itself. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: There are no major ships. The biggest river that exits the loch heads towards the mountains, so there is no direct path to the inlet. All the boats in here are small fishermen's boats; they're designed specifically for the lake, for freshwater fishing and whatever needs to be transferred from bank to bank. As you approach, you can see a good amount of the boats are still out on the water. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You can look out and see the outline of them against the horizon. You see a couple of small landmasses in the center of the loch, that are barely out of view. You approach, and the first couple of fishermen that walk past you both look to be hardened in their years. Their skin is very battered by the sun, it's wrinkled and dark from constant beating of the sky upon them. They glance over at this unique-looking troupe as they approach. They stop and don't say anything, they just look at you like "What are you doing here?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Do we still have Disguise Self up? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You have it for maybe ten more minutes. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Oh shit. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Do we see any King's Guard? Crownsguard? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Crownsguard? Make a perception check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: 11, same. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Glancing about, you don't see any crownsguard in the immediate vicinity of the Lochward. You've seen them, they patrol the town and walk through, ward to ward, but you don't see any at the moment, no. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Looks like we're ahead of them in the investigation. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Hey, Jester. Do you happen to remember the name of that guy whose daughter we saved from the snake? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh shit. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Let's see if I wrote it down in my sketchbook. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, because I didn't write it down. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: King Bertrand? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: No. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Okay. What about-- no, I know that guy. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Nope, I didn't. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Damn it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You remember where he lives, mostly, because you were there. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: That's true. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: We could go by there. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: We could go by. He seems to like us. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: He worked out there, right? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You guys make your way along the edge of the loch to the outside of the fisherman's house. The house is currently being repaired. You can see in the main doorway, the door is off the hinges, and there's a large pile of ruined furniture and cabinets that have been shifted out of the building. You can also see a long serpentine body that is currently being skinned by a younger man, probably 14 or 15. He's in the process of carving the skin off of it. This thing is about 20 to 25 feet long. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: That's the snake I punched. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: That's your work? That's impressive. You took it all by yourself? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Well, no. They helped me. I'm not an egomaniac. They fucking helped me. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: But I saw your guns last night. You probably took the lead. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Give credit to the whole damn group, move on. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Flattery got you nowhere. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm comparing the snake to the snake that's tattooed on my hand to try and get the heads to be the exact same size. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: We have been in the woods for too long. I've forgotten how to talk to people. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Your game is really suffering. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Thanks for the damn compliment. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: As you approach, the young man with this large, sharpened knife-- it looks like it may have been a heavy butchering knife that he's using to fillet and pull the skin off the snake. Looks back at you guys and doesn't know what's going on. You hear a voice go, "Hey!" You look up and you see the fisherman that you saw before, the one who came to you guys in the tavern. He's up on top of the roof, and he's currently boarding some portions of it. It looks like a part of the roof had been damaged in the fray. He goes, "Hold on," gets up, and comes down the ladder on the side and approaches. You can see he's sweating. "I'm so sorry, I didn't know you were coming. What can I do for you?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Sorry for dropping in. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Do we look like ourselves yet? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: No, actually. This is an interesting point. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Damn it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Wait. None of you look the same. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: That's right, no, thank you for reminding me. He comes out and he goes, "How can I help you?" (laughter) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: It's us! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, it's me. I pull the hat off and pull my hair up. It's Beauregard. We killed your snake? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: (in normal voice) Pretend that I don't talk-- (in human accent) Pretend that I don't talk like this. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Fuck it, I drop Disguise Self. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He goes,"Ah!" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I'm sorry to deceive you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: I'm very confused. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Oh no. Don't worry about it. What was your name, friend? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Rinaldo." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Rinaldo! That's what it was. I knew it was an R! Okay, Rinaldo. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Rinaldo, this snake that was in your house is not the only strange occurrence that's been happening. We're trying to find out the cause of it. Have you seen anything else like this in the time that's passed? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "No, we've been doing repairs on the house and getting everything underway. This is the first thing that's come on this side. Most of them live toward the center of the lake and stay underwater. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It's been two in the last few months that have come up. It's a bit of a nuisance." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Have you seen any zombies coming out of the lake? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Zombies? What are you talking about?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: We're asking after a man that helped down at the docks, named Enon. Have you heard of him? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Enon?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Enon. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Yeah, I worked with him a couple times. He comes through, looking for work, asking to see what's available." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: You obviously have not heard the news from the traveling circus in town. From last night. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "No. That's the big blue tent, right?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: That's correct. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "No, what's going on?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: (whispering) Enon turned into a zombie. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: What? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: (louder) Enon turned into a zombie! (whispering) And was killed. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: What? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I'm sorry to hear that. That's terrible. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Wow, that's really terrible. I'm sorry." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: We were trying to see if he might have worked with people that might have known what he was doing that day, earlier. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I haven't seen him at the docks in a while. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Not for a week, at least." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Really? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Is there anything out of the ordinary from the past week or two that comes to mind? Anything off about the run-of-the-mill stuff? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Other than a giant fucking snake ruining my house, but not that comes to mind, no. Circus coming into town, that's a little weird." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I see you're skinning the beast. Can I ask why? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I'm not going to let it go to waste. That's some good meat. Some good skin." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: You mentioned the circus coming to town as weird. Why? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Because there's a circus in town." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: He just means out of the ordinary, yeah? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Yeah. We don't get many shows and traveling folk. Last time this was here, a year ago, it came and went in a week." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: You said you hadn't seen this-- hi. You said you hadn't seen this person in a week? Was that unusual? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "No. I didn't keep up with him. He came through every now and then. I had a little cash and needed some help hauling things around. I asked for his assistance. He was an old fella, and it was less that he was helpful and more that we wanted to help when we could." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: If we went down to the docks where he worked, is there anyone that we should ask for, to speak to, who might have known him better? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Your guess is as good as mine. To be fair, although we're a community, we're also relatively competitive. You understand." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I do. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: You think anyone would have wanted him marked or harmed in some way? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I don't think so. He's an old man. I haven't seen or heard anyone-- his disposition seemed positive enough, if a little sad and lonely." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: If you think of anything, or if you hear anyone speak about him, you can find us at the Nestled Nook Inn. We'd appreciate anything, if it happens to reach your ears. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Of course. Let me finish up here with the roof and I'll ask around, see if anything comes up." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Much obliged. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: How's your little girl doing? Sorry, I cover my beard. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "It just wasn't expected." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Sorry. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "No, she's doing great. She's been a little spooked, but she slept well last night. She's doing fine. Thank you again for what you guys did for me." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: You're welcome. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: What? For what? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: We saved a little girl! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Oh yes, that's right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: If you see any zombies, please let us know. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I will. You were so kind to help me when I saw a snake, I figure if I see a zombie, you'd also be helpful." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: We would, definitely. We already killed a zombie too! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: This is just a snake. This is a big, weird snake I'm looking at? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You can inspect it if you want. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: No, I've been looking at the snake this entire time. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh, we have one of its fangs. I pulled it out. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Make a nature check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Ooh, don't do those much either. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I have a fang too, right? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Nine. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Nine? You don't know much about snake biology. It's hard to tell if it's out of the ordinary. It's just a big snake. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Looks like mine. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Only bigger. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Much bigger. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Shall we? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Fuck. Sure. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: We are the best detectives ever. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I feel like we are really doing bad at this detective thing. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: We should probably wrap up whatever we're doing. I imagine they're going to come by the inn soon and try and speak with us. Not you two. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: We didn't leave any sort of Ferris Bueller-y thing? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Nope. No stuffed beds, no recordings on the old VHS. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: What are you guys doing? Where are you going? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Is there anywhere else that we need to inspect? The carnival or more docks stuff? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I feel like going back to the carnival is probably a bad idea. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'd say the docks are his home, if we could figure out where he lived. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Where he was last seen. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: He was last seen at the circus! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Rinaldo! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Yeah?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Do you know where Enon lives? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I can't say I do. I'm sorry. My apologies. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Wish I could be of more help." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: It's okay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: You don't happen to know what happened to his son, by any chance? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I didn't even know he had a son." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: See? We're better investigators than this guy. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: But he's not trying to investigate! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I take the compliment. I'm putting it my pocket. I'm keeping it for later. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He climbs back up the ladder to the roof. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I'm starting to think that following Enon's story isn't necessarily going to lead us here. He seems like a random victim. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Hey, 14 year old kid! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He has this puffy red 'fro going on. He looks pale, fresh to this, scrawny. He's stopped drawing his blade across the snake. "Yeah?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Do you live here? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "No, I live about three houses up." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Did you go to the carnival? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Last night? Yeah, I was there." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Okay, where were you at the carnival? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I actually snuck in under the tent after it had started." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Right, that's a good thing. Were you close to Enon? In the show. Were you on that side or the other side? Did you see the zombie? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I saw him a little bit. He was in the front and I had people in front of me, but I think I saw some of it. It was pretty cool." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: It was kind of crazy, right? Have you heard any ghost stories around town lately? About scary things happening? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "My grandma told me a ghost story years ago about these giant badger creatures that live on the hills of the Ashkeeper that can stand up on their hind legs, and they come down and they eat kids that don't go to bed in time." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh shit. Those guys are scary, I've heard of them. You should be really careful. Have you heard anything about zombies? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "No, not since that." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: What's up? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Caleb has seen some shit. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I have to finish the--" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Hey, listen, if you hear any other ghost stories, you come and find us, okay? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Okay." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: All right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: (laughter) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Are we just going from person to person in town telling them to come find us? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: We are really terrible at this! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Well, she's making friends with everybody. I don't see any of you making friends. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I'm a little concerned that we've been gone for a while. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, maybe we should get back. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Maybe let these two, that aren't under house arrest-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Continue the investigation? Or go back? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: No, continue. I mean, if you're up for it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Yeah, yeah, We'll be a regular-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Yeah, we've done nothing wrong. We're not sweating it. I'm not sweating-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah, I believe you completely. That was very believable. I'm going to give you another blessing before you leave, okay? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: What are you talking about? None of us did anything. None of us! We protected the people of this town! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: It's true. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: It is true. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I know. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: That's easy. Let's go solve a mystery, Nott. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: All right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Were you being sarcastic-- oh, no you weren't, okay. Catching up on that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: So, kids don't know anything about this, old people don't know anything about this-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Tavern-keeper doesn't know anything about this. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Only the pure of heart make their answer out of riddles. Back to the tavern. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: But pure of heart! Still going back to the guards thing! Back to the tavern, let's go. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Were we just on the docks? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yeah, you guys were at the docks. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: We came up with bupkus. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: We didn't ask anybody, we went straight to the house. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Okay, we'll walk around the docks and look for-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: We'll see you back at the inn. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: All right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Should we run back, or should we saunter back? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: You're going to probably, you know, poof. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, how much time does she have? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: About a minute? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yeah, it's about to fade. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah, I figured it had already happened probably midway talking to the kid. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Probably. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Maybe super stealthily back? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: All right. I put my hood up. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I can maybe put a rope through the window. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, that's a good idea. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Is it a two-story? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It's a two-story. You guys are up in the second story. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I got rope. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Let's do that, yeah. We'll sneak around the back of the inn, and try to climb up the upstairs window. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I can keep them busy at the front door. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'll go through the front like a proper person. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: All right, so you guys are setting up a rope to climb up the back? You go in, on your own, up to the top, you put a rope through-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Fjord's distracting. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: In the front. Then we're going to try to sneak-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Right, and then I'm going to drop some of the rope out the back window for them. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Easy enough to do, so those of you who want to wait and can take the rope up, you wait for a moment where nobody's watching and climb your way up into the inn safely and get to your rooms. You two, what are you doing? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: (singing) 50 feet of hemp rope, it's a standard! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Hey kiddo, do you want a piggy-back? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Sure, that sounds like a good idea. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Scramble up, let's go talk to some people. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: All right, I'll jump on Caleb's back. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: All right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I'll wander down to where people are working. Where people are moving crates around. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: He's on Caleb's back! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay, that would be probably closer to the Northward. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Okay, so that's the plan, is to look for people moving crap around, the same way that Enon is said to have. So that's what we'll do. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay, make an investigation check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: All right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Shall I help, or no? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: If you want to. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Not that great. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You aiding him would give him an advantage in the roll. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Oh! That didn't help. 12 for me. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You take a couple hours wandering through the Northward, asking questions, and most of the information you get is, they have no idea who that is, or like, "Ah, he died? It's about time." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: And there's no point even asking questions because we've asked them all for two hours, yeah? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: I'd say yeah, based on that roll. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Okay, well that's a big zero. You want to go book shopping with me? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Sure! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Okay. I believe that gentleman said that the Burnished Bibliots was in the Northward, correct? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: I believe you are correct. Yeah, it's in the southern portion of the Northward by where it borders the Lochward. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Okay, so I'll start asking questions to get us there. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Easily enough. You eventually are led to it, and you come to a closet that's affixed to another building. The wood used are almost driftwood and heavily weathered, and the front door is closed as you approach. It looks like a glorified storage shed that has been bolted and put up against another structure. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: All right, well I will walk up to the door and knock on it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay. (knocks) No response. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Is there any breaks in the door or the building or cracks that Frumpkin could fit into? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Visual glance, there look like there's that space underneath the door. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Probably not enough for a cat to slip through. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Are there any windows or anything or is it all a big, dirty, dingy mess? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: There are windows, but if you look at the back of the windows all you see is scraps of material, stacks of books, piles of boxes and crates, it's literally blocked out with things stacked up against it from the interior. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: How busy is the front of this place? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Not busy at all, it's just the two of you, right now, standing at the front door. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: No one's around us, though? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It's not on the main street, it's a little pushed back, recessed about ten or 15 feet from the main road so there's no one immediately around you. But there are people walking back and forth on the road behind but you're out in the open, per se. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: And no one's coming to the door? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: No one's come to the door yet, no. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Want me to break in? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Yes. No. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: [knocking] →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay. A moment passes and you hear, "Hold on!" The door opens. It was open. There's the sound of heavy sacks go tumbling down to the interior of it and you glance around and you hear a voice go, "Can I help you?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Hello? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You look down, and there's this crotchety-looking scrawny old gnome who's sitting there in the doorway. He's got this vibrant puff, like a cotton ball, of hair around his head. But it's this perfect "U" of bald on top. No glasses, eyes are very small and beady, and he has this bulbous, round nose at the front with this little bit of a tuft of chin white hair that matches the cotton ball tuft on the sides. He's sitting there clutching the top of the knob on the inside which is actually affixed shorter on the door and he goes, "Well come in." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Yes please, you're open for business I take it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Always open, come on in." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: All right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Turns around and musters his way inside. As soon as you step in the door and look around, this place looks like an episode of Hoarders. It is just floor-to-ceiling, wall-to-wall, stacks of anything and everything: knick-knacks, small stuffed animals, toys, books, glasses, and goblets. It is the biggest, crammed flea-market into a small shed-like space you've seen. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I start unscrewing my flask. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: (laughing) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Frumpkin climbs back up onto Nott's shoulder and nestles in. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: (meowing) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I am scouting the city for books, I am starved for books. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Well we've got books here." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Yes sir, I'm sorry what is your name? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Oglen. Oglen Hornsblower." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Oglen Hornsblower. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "And welcome to my collection. You want to buy something, let me know." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Well I see you sell a great many things in here, books included. This is just things you've collected throughout your lifetime? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Right. Boughten, traded for, found." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I don't know what you just said, but I am interested in books. Particularly in the arcane realm, but any kind of book. Do you have anything that you just outright know is out of the ordinary? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I'm sure we've got a few. Look around! See what you find. It's half the fun, half the journey." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: All right, friend, let's-- It's like Winter's Crest morning for me and I'm scanning the shelves. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Make an investigation check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Can you give me something to look for? To distract me and give me a mission to go on, please? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Yes. You want to find some sort of tool that helps you do what you do best. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: All right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Investigation check, that is a 21. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I rolled a 21 investigation check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: All right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I'm just looking for baubles to steal. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: All right. In thumbing through, there are plenty of books that, within a first glance, "This is not of interest to me." You have to move things out of the way and push things aside. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: The smell in there is dusty and moldy and you do find there is some subtle water damage and some mildew growing in one far corner and you're like ugh, put that back. However, you rolled really high. Two things catch your eye. One, there appears to be the remnants of some sort of notebook, a sketchbook that is written in a language you do not understand-- What languages do you know? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Well, off the bat, I don't know where that is in D&D Beyond yet. But if I open up my binder I bet I have a paper version that I can verify with. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I speak Sylvan, Common, and Celestial and I also can Comprehend Languages as a ritual spell but I think that takes some time. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It does take ten minutes. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Ten minutes. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: But you glance through the book, and while you cannot read the text you do recognize that there are elements at the back of the book that have a hint of arcane nature. That's one of two books you find with that roll. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: It's like the adult section for him. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: I know. The second book you find is written in Zemnian, which you can read. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: That's correct. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: The title translates to Fiends of Folklore. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I'm so happy. You have quite a shop here. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I know I do!" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: You have some real treasures. I'm particularly interested in both of these books. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Good choices, good choices." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I don't know though, I don't think that-- I mean I'm rather tight on coin at the moment so-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "That's too bad." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Maybe my eyes are too big for my stomach. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He's pulling the books away from you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: How much would you part with these for? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: (sniffs) He holds of the Fiends of Folklore book, "Three gold pieces. This one, (sniffs)-- ten gold pieces." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Which one is which? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: The Fiends of Folklore is the three, the other tome. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: The arcane, weird one. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You're not quite sure what's in it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Okay. Would you have any interest in a magic cat? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I'm sorry?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Frumpkin disappears from on Nott's shoulder. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Reappears next to the little man. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: (yelps) He like throws the books and grabs nearby this large sack and starts-- angrily beating the cat. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I'll take that as a no! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Childhood cat, destroyed! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He does hit Frumpkin. Frumpkin takes one point of bludgeoning damage. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: That might be it, I don't really know. I didn't think that this would happen so quickly. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Faced with our own mortality. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Frumpkin point two. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, he updates overnight as long as he's plugged in, right? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Hold on, I have to see if Frumpkin is still here. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Must be plugged in and connected to Wifi. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Type in your passcode if you agree to the terms. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: One hit point of damage? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yes. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: He's still here. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: There you go. Frumpkin immediately darts off jumps on your shoulder, turns around and (hisses). →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: So you don't like cats, I understand that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Sorry, it caught me off-guard." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Well I was trying to sample the merchandise for you. Because if it was just a cat it was just a cat, but this one-- changes to my other shoulder-- he's a magic cat. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Okay." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: You can roll him in mud, he comes back clean. He disappears, he reappears, he brings you things. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Can you make him go away?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Gone. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Thank you. Now we can continue to talk money." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Here's what I propose. I do not have ten gold at the moment. But it doesn't feel like you get a lot of thoroughfare here, so I'm going to come back to purchase this later. That's it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: That's the end of my spiel; that's all I've got. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I'm interested, and thank you for giving me the time. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Of course. Sorry about your cat, friend." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: It's okay. Nott? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Have I heard all of this conversation? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You've been hearing all of it, but you've also found, amongst the chaos, a brass baby bottle that's fairly dented, but it's very shiny and polished, you can already see on the inside. You find a new flask, actually. It's very tarnished, but you spit and rub it a little bit. It looks to be of very fine metallic material. You're not entirely sure, you'd have to clean it, but it looks like very nice quality material. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: All right. I'll try to trade my flask with that flask. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Make a sleight of hand check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Indiana Jones style. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: How?! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Wait. More. No, that's right. 22. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Now, your flask, which still has liquor in it, is left behind for the empty flask you receive. However, without an instance of anyone even paying attention. It is yours. You can write in your inventory you are now the owner of a platinum flask. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: ALL
line: Ooh! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Shit! Okay! It's a baby bottle, or maybe a rattle? What'd you say? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Baby bottle. Looks like it was used as a bottle for a very upper-class family. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: You're already so ahead, though! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I know. But I can't resist. I'll try to take one more look and pocket that as well. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Make another sleight of hand check, please. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It just vanishes into your cloak! It's the craziest thing! It was there and it's gone! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Yes! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Are we going to leave now? Should we leave? I think we should leave. Maybe we should go. Do you need some money? I could lend you some money, if you want. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Maybe we'll come back tomorrow. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: All right. Lovely place you got here! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Piggyback? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Yes, please! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I'll hold these books for you! Come back when you can!" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Within the week, I promise. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "All right. Have a good day, little girl!" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I will! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You guys exit the building. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I'm sorry! I did it again, I couldn't help it. I took some things. Do you think he noticed? Do you think we're in trouble? Maybe we should hurry back. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I don't think he saw. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: All right. Are you cross with me? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: No. Just wait one moment, okay? Wait for me here? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Okay. I heard you talking about money, by the way, I could lend you some, if you'd like. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Wait right here. I cast Detect Magic just before I walk back into the store. I look all around. What are your hours, here? As I look to see if there is anything besides that book, anything. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You glance throughout the interior, and you don't sense anything magical, unfortunately, within the piles of rubble. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Besides the book he put down? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: The book's not radiating any magical aura. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: But he answers. "Oh! All hours! I don't really close. I don't really sleep." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Middle of the night, even? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Sure!" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: All right. Business is business. Thank you! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "No worries. See you then!" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Bis später. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Pee shmiter!" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: That guy does not speak Zemnian! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: No, he does not. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Let's go back to the hotel, shall we? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Let's do it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: While they're away, you guys wait there for a bit, getting stir crazy in the process of waiting in your room. Jester and Beauregard, there's a knock at your door. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Hello? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Please open, it's Crownsguard." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Hold on, I'm naked! (whispering) Yeah, I don't know. Do you want to put clothes on? Should we take our clothes off? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Did you say that because you wanted to tell me something? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: No, I just wanted to make them wait. Okay, I'm dressed now! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I like that. We're giving them-- authority. Got the upper hand. Okay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: It's a power play. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Do we invite them in or are we going to--? You open the door. I'm going to sit, unassuming, on the bed. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Sit! Come in, please. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Oh! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: The door opens, and there are two crownsguards there, standing, shields to the side. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh hello, I wasn't expecting you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Oh, yeah, hi. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "We're here to notify you that the investigation is ongoing. You will not be needed today. Please remain in your premises. Be back tomorrow." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Jury summon. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Bullshit! Jury duty shit! Goddamn it! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: We are at D&D Jury Duty. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yes you are. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Seven dollars a day? What is this shit? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Can I ask you a question before you leave? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Yes, what is your question?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Are you guys going to be the same people coming back tomorrow? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Possibly." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: What is your names? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: They look at each other, look back at you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I am Jonas." The other guy pipes up, he's a little younger, he goes, "I am Lucas." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Jonas and Lucas, very good names. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: You guys should start a band. Like a boy band or something. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah, that'd be good. Girls would go crazy. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: If you guys want to play some games tomorrow, we'll just be here! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Very well! Have a good day." They look at each other like, "What?" and close the door. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I shouldn't have offered the game. What if we want to leave and then they want to take us up on the game thing? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I thought you enjoyed games. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: No, I love games! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Sure. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: But what if we leave and then they want to play games? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Okay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Onto Fjord's door. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm sitting playing with the cards. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I open it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Same two guards there. Lucas and Jonas. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Jonas and Lucas. "Hello. The investigation is ongoing. You'll not be needed for today. We will return tomorrow." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I shut the door. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Any progress? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: There's a pause and then you here the subtle shifting of greaves against the wooden floor as they slowly walk away. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Go take that game in the other room, why don't you? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: That was a power move right there. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Thank you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You guys return to the inn. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I guess we do. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yes you do. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Well. That was terrible. No one found out anything. It was a waste of a day. We're all terrible at this. Goodnight? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: What time is it? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: That's not true! I still say that some of the best information that you can get can be in the information that you don't find. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: That is nonsense. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I'm just saying! Sometimes the lack of information can be a process of elimination. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Sure. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: It's super broad! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: No, you know what? I'm going to take it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I'm trying to be fucking silver lining, so I don't feel like a piece of shit for waste a day, and you guys are shitting on that, but it's fine. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: You found nothing at the docks, zip, zero? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: We spent hours there, no one knew anything about the old man. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: See? No one knew anything about him. That means, prime candidate, someone's little experiment. Little Frankenstein. I'm telling you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I don't really understand what she's saying. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I don't either. I'm going to run up and down the stairs for a while. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: (quick footsteps) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: How long have you known this one? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Who are you talking to? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Anybody who's watching this happen. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: About 24 hours longer than you have. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: That explains a lot. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: At one point, Adelaine the barmaid comes up. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I'm sorry, can you please stop?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Okay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Thank you!" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Hey, Dungeon Master? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yes? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: The other night, when Nott was out carousing a bit while Caleb was asleep. He saw some figures in cloaks dash by. Was there any distinctive anything about these three figures that dashed by? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Not that you noticed, unfortunately. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Damn it. Okay, I will share that information with the group. I saw some weirdos running around. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: When? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: The other night, when he was asleep. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: How late? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Two in the morning? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: You were out that late? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Sorry. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Maybe we should go out at two o'clock in the morning and see if we can find them. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Ooh, that's a good idea. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Follow them. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: You guys notice that it's weird that no one's actually really talking about this? This is a small town. I come from a small town. Small town people gossip. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I feel like there should be some more gossip then there is, that's very true. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Someone is talking about this, we just haven't found them yet. 2:00AM field trip! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: We can always leave through the window this time. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Mm-hmm, I like that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I can be down for that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I leave the rope tied in here. Can we use your cat? Reel it back up in so that there's no trace of us until we need to get back there. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Are you asking for my cat to haul up our rope? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: No, I'm telling you that your cat is going to haul up a rope. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: How is a cat going to lift up a rope? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: It's not that heavy of a rope, it's just hemp. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Hemp rope can be pretty heavy. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Well, if I throw it back up there then I imagine you cat can knock it back down at the very least. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: There, that would work, maybe. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Oh, is he like an asshole cat? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I assume he's an asshole cat. Aren't all cats asshole cats? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: This is true. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: It might be down before we come back, is the thing. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I assume he's going to-- that's fair. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Where were you when you saw these cloaked figures? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I had gone out to do some window shopping. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: At 2:00AM? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Yes, I wasn't very successful. I had walked by the general store-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh, we went there. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, we did. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I passed by a place called Natural Remedies, herbs and medicinal things. I went by a spot named Jackalwere, it's a smithy. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Okay, but where did you see the cloaked guys? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: It was between-- I don't remember. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It was one block north of the Natural Remedies. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Natural Remedies. What was the other one? Jackalwere? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: I think that was what it was called. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yeah, Jackalwere Smiths. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: We could do a little stakeout! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: We could. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: That's true. How do people send messages in this town? Have we figured that out? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Probably by foot or by horse, right? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Not that big of a town. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Should someone stay up? Well, I was thinking someone should keep a lookout on the roof of the inn in case someone comes for us while everyone else is out. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: How would we let anybody know? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I don't know. Can you conjure those golden orbs up into the air as like a signal? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: It's pretty limited. They don't go that far. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Maybe we just risk it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Yeah! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Let's risk it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: It's 2:00AM, I'm sure everybody will be asleep. Let's risk it. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Before we leave-- is there a window in the hall? Or are there only windows in our bedrooms? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: There is no window in the hall, only in the rooms. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Okay, that's fine. On our side of the room-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You have three rooms between you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: There's three rooms and they all have windows. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Correct. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: On our side of the door, I'm going to take out my healer's kit. Do I have any bandages or medical tape or anything like that? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Not medical tape, but there are clean strips of cloth and some adhesive bandages, basic general-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: No tape?! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I'm going to tie a bandage ever so lightly around one side of the handle onto something on to the other side of the door. If there's something like a lamp or some kind of pipe or something I can tie it to. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: So that we'll know if someone tried to come in the room? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Correct. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Okay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You can pull one bandage out and affix to one of the chair legs nearby. You could do that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Oh for god's sake. I pull out a big thing of string. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Okay, yeah. I'll take some string and just some twine and-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: What are we going to do? Leave through our window? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: To their window? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Well, I figured we're all in the same room at this point. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: What are you trying to do? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I'm trying to make sure that if someone tries to come in our room we'll know if they come in. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I can take care of that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Oh, well then, I'm taking my string back. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: What can you do? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I have some magic for that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Yeah, he has a magical spell that alerts you when someone tries to break in your room. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: That is correct. Yeah. I will take a moment to do that and it will let me know. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Best part is, it doesn't alert him when I sneak in or out. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: That you know of. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Wait. What? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: One mile of the warded area. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Ooh! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: That's better! Let's do that. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: I just need ten minutes. And I pull out a little spool of silvered thread and stretch it out. Where did you want this? Over the window? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Well, I was going to say in the door, but if there's maybe a place in the hall. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Well, I can do the entire room really, I can go doorknob to-- The funny thing about this thread, there's no end to it. So I start looping it all the way around the room and tie it off, and take out one of my books from the holster, the one on the left side, and I open it up. You guys watch as I spend ten minutes referring to the book and tracing symbols on the floor. Along, underneath the thread, and about ten minutes of time, nothing happens, but that's taken care of. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Nice. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: See, he's really good. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Didn't really look like much. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Yeah, either that or I'm really bullshitting you and nothing happened. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Either way, I liked it. Let's sneak out. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
