line: I'm going to do one last thing before we leave, which is just tussle the room a bit so it looks like it's been robbed. Just in case they do come in. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay, so you toss the room a bit, muddle up the space, and you guys, one by one, climb out the back of the window, down the rope, and into the alley behind the inn. Looking about, you're waiting until about post-midnight, you said? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay, so it's dark. The various lanterns that dangle on the hook poles at different intersections of the street are lit. Other than that, you have a faint bit of moonlight that's coming through the sky. There are some clouds, but they're a bit broken up, so every now and then the moon cover can vanish and then return, but for now you have moonlight in the city. Where are you guys going? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Towards the north end. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I ought to be leading the way, I reckon. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Yeah, I'll go to where I saw the three cloaked figures. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: A little ways north of Natural Remedies? Okay. I would like everybody to make a stealth check, please. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Stealth check. Do I still have the blessing? No, I don't. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: No, you don't. But I can do it to everybody, one by one, if we get to an open area. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS

line: Forty-- 12. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You guys, following Nott, dodge between alleys, there are a few patrols of the crownsguard that you see passing by, and you wait for them to just cross paths, and then move on. Eventually finding your way to Natural Remedies, seemingly unseen. It's quiet, you can hear the sound of crickets in the distance. The cold night air is causing your breath to show every time you exhale, you all bundle your cloaks as you move on. The moonlight fades a bit, things get darker, but you follow Nott's lead, travel from place to place. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You finally get to the outskirts of Natural Remedies, and to the northern alleyway where you'd originally seen those figures pass. You're there. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Should we fan out a bit? Cover a couple corners, so we can still see each other? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: Good idea. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Yeah. I'm going to go with Fjord. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Let's not spread out too far, though. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Are you two like an item? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: What? →

name: SAM
line: You and Fjord, are you like a thing? →

name: LAURA
line: Why, are you interested in him? →

name: SAM
line: No, ugh, no! →

name: LAURA
line: No? →

name: SAM
line: Not at all like that, but yes, all right. →

name: MATT

name: LAURA
line: Natural one. →

name: SAM

line: I don't see shit. →

name: TALIESIN

name: MATT
line: Jester, you somehow get an eyelash caught in your eye and spend the next hour trying to get it out, but it's in the eyelid. →

name: LAURA
line: Fjord, can you see it? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: No, no, no. Okay, okay, okay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Occasionally, you can hear the crownsguard approaching, and they carry their torches with them. You can see the light crawling forward, so you all duck out of the way and let them pass. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: About an hour passes. Two hours pass. Around the third hour, you get the sensation that whatever you saw the other night is not arriving on a clockwork time or not arriving at all. It's about three in the morning, in the center of the city by yourself. What do you wish to do? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Three in the morning? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yeah. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: I turn to Caleb. Any tingling from your alarm system? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: No, I wouldn't have brought it up if something had happened. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: That's a good point. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm just going to try to meditate on the strange death and see if I can feel anything. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Make an intelligence check. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Pouring over the details of what has transpired and what you guys have done so far to find information, there are still things to inquire about. There are still things to wonder and discover and there are a few places you haven't been to. A few places you haven't returned to. A few people you haven't even inquired about closer to the investigation. →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah. →

name: SAM
line: Yeah, let's go wake her ass up. →

name: MARISHA
line: Maybe we should go back to the circus. →

name: MARISHA
line: I'm all right. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: So we can go to the circus? →

name: LAURA
line: While we're still trying to figure this out, I'm going to take out my painter's kit and draw like a little piece of poop on the side of the building that we're next to. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

line: It helps, but-- →

line: That's a triangle. →

line: Yeah, I thought it was like chocolate frozen yogurt. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Is math or something? →

line: It's dark okay?! I can usually paint much better than this. It's really dark and my hands feel a little numb. →

line: Let's move then. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay, you guys make your way through most of the Docksward on your way to the large blue tent that still stands ominously in the distance. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Thankfully, the moon has come out and cast this rimlight against the structure, so it's easy to see. As you guys are making your way outside of the Lochward, you immediately see the approaching torchlight of crownsguard. One of them you just faintly hear 40 or 50 feet ahead of you, "Who goes there?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Oh shit. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Is there only one guard? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: It's two guards, side by side. These watches, they patrol in pairs. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Are we in like an alleyway, or in the street? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Go in the lake. Quick, go into the lake! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TRAVIS
line: I cast Disguise Self, and I turn myself into a crownsguard. →

name: LIAM

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You do as well? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: Yeah. →

name: MATT
line: All right. So you both become crownsguard. →

name: MATT
line: You've all of a sudden are adorned in the goldish brass and red armor. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Anywhere to hide? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: There are some small alcoves, but you guys are out in the open, now. They've seen you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

name: MATT

name: LIAM

name: MATT

It holds you in place as you're snarling and looking scared. The other one pulls out his blade and says "Where did this thing come from!?" →

name: MATT

name: SAM
line: Ugh. →

name: MATT

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

You do see the faint distant flickering glow of firelight from the back side of the circus. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Glancing about, you can see the track marks of everyone fleeing. You can see the spatters of blood. You can see the place where the transformation occurred. There is a horrible shedding of certain layers of flesh. You can see previously existing layers of flesh and muscle that were shed as whatever this undead thing was fell to the ground. Once again, you make a religion check as well. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Okay. Roll high. I did not. Ten. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yeah. This is not your specialty. You have little experience with the undead and this type of magic. →

name: LIAM

name: MATT

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA

name: TALIESIN

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Without issue, you guys quickly dart around the side of the tent and make your way right towards the central area where the multitude of tents to this back encampment is placed. There is a single campfire. The embers are burning out. It has not been kept up. You do see two crownsguard who are currently keeping watch. One of them is slumped in a chair across from the fire and is nodding off. The other is doing a basic patrol and looking around. Other than that, you don't hear any sounds, you don't see anybody else. Just the two crownsguard. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Which of the tents is currently occupied? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: There are four main tents. There are two very large ones, one of which generally contains Toya and Kylre, the devil toad. That's on the south side. There's the north largest tent, this one contains the Knot sisters and Ornna. Then there's a very small tent to the south side that would be Bo the Breaker's tent, but he's not here. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Then there's a medium sized tent on the north side. Who would be in that one? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN

name: MARISHA
line: The cart? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: We have a wagon. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN

line: What's the easiest to get to without-- →

name: LAURA

line: I had Mona and Lena, but maybe it's Lolie. →

name: TALIESIN

name: SAM

name: TALIESIN
line: Over here! →

name: MATT

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm going to very gently lift the back of the tent up and not go in through the front. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

name: MATT

name: TALIESIN
line: (whispering) Do you know what's going on? (switches to normal volume) Assume we're whispering, because this is bullshit. →

name: TALIESIN
line: They couldn't be worse. And then Yasha Yasha'd. I don't know. Did Toya see anything? Did she say anything? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "We're still trying to figure this out ourselves. Are you alone?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: No, I've picked up a few scragglers. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: They're idiots, but they're helping. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Well bring them in." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: We come in. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You guys all enter the tent and you see Desmond. Previously you saw him in this very colorful outfit with the frilled neck piece and the full facial makeup. Now you see a man in his late 30s with a very scarred left side of his face. It looks like it was shredded at one point in his youth, that the makeup hid during the performance. As soon as you enter, even upon greeting him, he has a very sad presence to him. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Even though you're all under the cover of night and having this conspiratorial conversation, he has this melancholy about him that permeates the space inside the tent. He says, "So you're all the ones that helped earlier. Thank you. It would have been far worse if you hadn't." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: No problem. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: What do they think happened? What are they asking? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "They're thinking something about the show. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: They're thinking Gustav made this happen. I don't think it's Gustav, he's a good man. He makes poor choices and it's plagued him his whole life, you can see it in his brow. But good intentions have grave consequences. No one that good comes out of Shady Creek Run without some mistakes behind them, but I don't see him doing this." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: What would be the point? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Has it ever happened like this before? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Anything weird ever happened before? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Weird things? All the time. We're a bunch of weird folk, work with a lot of weird people. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Bunch of strange freaks gathered to this show." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Was there anyone new here recently that you haven't worked with a lot? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Yeah, she apparently ran off." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Yasha's the newest, but she can be flighty. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: What about Mona and Yuli? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "The sisters are bitter, but it's no fault of theirs." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Why are they bitter? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Because the world is cruel." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: You've never met it-- Well, nevermind. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I wish I could help them, but it--" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: (stutters) What happened to them? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Are you drunk? What's going on? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: No, I'm trying to hear and whisper at the same time. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: You can talk at a normal volume. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Magical whisper. Cone of Whisper. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Matt Cone of Whisper! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Oh God, that's a new thing now. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: What did they say? Why do they think that? Why is the world shitty? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Have you been around? Have you travelled to see anything?" →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Yeah. Listen. The world has its own brand of shitty depending on whose eyes are looking at it, right? So what is their brand of shitty? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Circus shitty. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "I don't know. Ask them." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Where are they? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: In a tent over there. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "They don't seem to take much of a liking to me anyway, so I can't really tell you myself. I'm sorry." →

name: SAM
line: They don't like you? Why? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "There's a lot of people that don't like me." →

name: LAURA
line: I like you, Desmond. I think you're great. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Why? What did you do? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He looks at you and goes, "Same reason folks probably don't like you; you're different." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Hmm. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Is everybody still here? They've not taken anyone away other than-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Other than those two, everyone else is here. We're just keeping under watch until their investigation is complete." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: Molly, why did you laugh when I asked about the sisters? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: We're carnival people, we've all got our issues. You don't end up here if you're not a little weird. →

name: LAURA
line: Can I try something? I want to try to cast Detect Good and Evil. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. →

name: LIAM
line: Cleric shit! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Right? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: On? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: On the area. It lasts up to ten minutes, so it's within 30 feet of me. →

name: TRAVIS
line: You ever cast this before? →

name: LAURA
line: No. →

name: TRAVIS
line: First cast! →

name: TRAVIS
line: First blood! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: So you cast it. You concentrate. You reach down and grasp the bottom of your symbol that hangs around your belt, and there's a faint rush of divine force given to your consciousness. You don't sense within 30 feet of you any fiendish, or celestial, or fey, or undead, or aberration. →

name: LAURA

name: MATT
line: It's like a radial thing. →

line: That's pretty cool, let's keep going then. →

name: SAM
line: Maybe we'll see something? →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah. Am I close to the edge of the main tent? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: There are two tents to the north. There's a bigger one, and a medium one. The one that you're in right now is the larger one to the north, and as such contains-- Actually no. The one that you guys are in right now is the medium one. The one that contains Desmond. The larger one contains both of the sisters and Ornna. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Okay. And they're closer to the big tent? Where is the big tent? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Correct. The big tent is about ten to 15 feet from the one you're in right now. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Okay, cool. Yeah, let's leave. I'll get up to the edge of the big tent, and I want to see if I can feel anything weird in that area. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. Is everyone else staying inside or are you going with her? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: We're going with, but before we leave I'll ask Desmond: From one outcast to another, are there any questions that are bugging you about all this? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: He thinks for a second. "I don't want this all to fall on Gustav. He's done a lot of good for" "all of us, and the way they're talking about the investigation, they're looking to make a scapegoat" "of this." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: SAM
line: Well, thank you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Thank you." →

name: SAM
line: (mimics bird call poorly) That's how they talk to each other. That's how carnival folk talk to each other. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Oh, for fuck's sake. I'm going to do my best. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Thank you." →

line: Oh god, I hate all of this. →

name: LAURA

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm not going to make the noise I'm just going to-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Right. As you make your way over to the edge of the tent where the sisters and Ornna are, you focus and concentrate. Nothing, from the radial thing. One of the guards, who's standing up and making a patrol, looks over right as you duck behind and you hear a "Huh?" →

name: SAM
line: Uh oh. →

name: LAURA
line: Quick, go in the tent. →

name: TALIESIN
line: (shushes) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: They both curl into a ball and stay really quiet. All of the sudden Ornna comes to consciousness and (light footsteps) the footsteps finish the circle and then go back towards where the fire is. →

name: LAURA
line: That was close. →

name: LAURA
line: Tell us you know something. →

name: MATT
line: "What do you want to know?" →

line: What did you see? I don't know. →

name: SAM
line: Who did this? What was it? →

name: MATT
line: "I don't know. I looked and I saw what you saw." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: This is Ornna I assume. →

name: MATT
line: This is Ornna, yeah. →

line: Right, okay. →

name: TALIESIN
line: For fuck's sake, they're going to kill every last fucking one of us unless we figure this out. →

line: She's like, "Right." →

name: TALIESIN
line: What do you think? →

line: "Well the sister's over here think it's a hit job, but this isn't a hit job with zombies? Are you fucking kidding me?" →

line: Yeah. →

name: MATT

line: No problem. →

name: SAM

name: MATT

name: MATT
line: You guys, as you curl around the outside, there's the one guard that's sitting in the chair by the fire that goes like (snores) and opens his eyes a little bit and looks over in your direction, Jester, and there's a brief moment where he's just looking right at you. Do you do anything? →

line: Can I use-- oh shit. I'm going shitballs, shit. →

line: Oh boy. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Okay. It's at this point that you turn your attention to the tent and focus. There is a hefty, radiating warm fiendish source from the inside of that large tent. →

name: MATT

line: (hiss) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Ornna goes, "To be perfectly honest, I have no idea what's going on. Y'all just came in here, started throwing accusations at me. Gustav got arrested. Bosun got arrested. Molly got arrested, I'm glad you got off that. But to be perfectly honest, this whole thing's a shit show. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: And the circus is probably not going to be the same after this." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Insight check on the-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Insight check on Ornna. →

name: LIAM
line: My cat is on patrol because we've been standing with our dicks in our hands for a long time. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Yeah, I'm sorry. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LIAM
line: No! I'm not complaining, but I would have sent the cat out. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: Seven. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Kind of hard to read. She seems genuinely frustrated and caught off guard by this. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: LAURA
line: I think she's telling the truth. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Ornna, you might as well come clean, this is classic you. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: She looks at you. "Molly." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: I'm just trying to-- →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "Fuck you." →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: Oh, fuck you, too. It's no secret that Ornna and Gustav have their differences, but this ridiculous. I mean, she knows damn well that half the circus would leave if he got fucking arrested and died. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: "You're for real worried about this? You really think who it could be? Let's play. Gustav: he's an idiot. But he's not a murderer. Bosun: bit of a dick. But he's a stand up fella. Toya: absolute doll. Couldn't hurt a fly. Mona and Yuli: They're cunts. But they're not going to kill anyone. Desmond's a weird fellow. There's something dark in his past; you can see it in his melancholy. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: But this is not his style. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

name: MATT

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: (laughs) Nice. As the cat darts under the tent and makes its way through, you glance over to the fire and sees a large dark shape step out from one of the tents and you watch as one of the guards who's sitting in the chair stands up and crumples onto the ground without a sound. You see the other guard look over, go over and run up to him and start to check on him. You guys hear a voice in the back start saying, "Damon? Damon?" →

name: MARISHA

name: LIAM
line: Fjord, something bad is happening. →

name: MATT
line: You watch as the dark figure spins and two flashes of red in the shadow nearby and you watch as the other guard suddenly grabs his head and grasps at his chest and falls on his back as his legs curl up. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MARISHA
line: What the fuck! →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: As you come out of the tent, you watch as the flesh on his neck and throat splits and a very familiar transformation begins to take place as both of the guards begin to (growling). →

name: LAURA
line: Oh no. We have to fight them. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: As you guys rush underneath the big blue tent, you watch as the two guards that are quickly bulging and mutating, bits of their flesh dislodging from their body and falling. You watch now, up close, similar to the last time, but now that you are looking intently for this, you can see where there should be blood, it's almost like dust and sand begin to spill from the wounds. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: Something you had noticed a little bit in the body of the old man before, but you didn't know if it was decomposition or just general dirt. →

line: Girls, we're not supposed to be here. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: TALIESIN
line: [laughing] →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny

name: SAM
line: Are we in the same tent or are we in two different tents? →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: You guys are all in one tent with the other girls. You are all jammed into the space. The two of you make your way outside of the large tent as you watch these two bulging, zombified creatures making their way towards the tent. And that's where we're going to pick up next time. →

line: (groaning) →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: We'll pick up there next week. The chase is on, apparently. Thank you guys so much for being awesome. Thank you guys for coming along and watching with us. We'll pick this up next Thursday where we left off, right in the middle of this campsite. Until then, have a wonderful week. See you guys then. And, is it Thursday yet? Goodnight. →

episode: Campaign 2 Episode 2 A Show of Scrutiny
name: MATT
line: [no audio] ♫ →

name: MATT
line: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons. →

name: MATT
line: (laughter) →

name: MATT
line: Liam gets ever creative every week right before the camera goes live. Thank you, Liam. →

name: LIAM
line: First good one of the campaign, come on. →

name: MATT
line: Welcome! Before we jump into the game, we have some announcements, so we'll get through those as quickly as possible. First and foremost, once again, returning, and for an extended time for the foreseeable future, we are happy to have a sponsored partner, D&D Beyond. →

name: MATT
line: (cheering) →

name: MATT
line: Awesome, fantastic application for those to make their D&D characters and store them online and adjust. Sam, do you want to go ahead and take it away? →

name: SAM
line: Yes! D&D Beyond is our awesome sponsor. It's a great online mobile access thing that you can manage all sorts of stuff. I'm losing my voice tonight, because-- →

name: MARISHA
line: Oh no! →

name: SAM
line: Yeah, I know. So that I can preserve my voice for the rest of the night, Laura, can you read the copy and I'll lip sync it. →

name: LAURA
line: The joy of sitting next to you. →

name: SAM
line: Thank you. →

name: SAM
line: Laura: Oh god. As you know, D&D Beyond is the official digital tool set for Critical Role. It's got a ton of features, but one of the coolest is that it keeps track of stuff like hit points, inspiration, and all sorts of modifiers to your dice rolls, which is amazing, especially if you're the kind of person that's more focused on which dice you're rolling with. →

name: SAM
line: Keep going. →

name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

name: LAURA
line: You know, the kind of superstitious gamer that thinks that the color and style of dice actually makes any difference at all. The sort of weirdo who believes some dice are lucky and some are cursed. Or one of those crackpot shut-ins who uses dice jails-- ha ha ha. Those people are lame. →

name: LAURA
line: Anyway, check them out at w-w-w-dot-- →

name: SAM
line: Oh, keep going. →

name: LAURA
line: dndbeyond.com That's D-N-D not D-and-D. →

name: LAURA
line: DnD. Get $10 off any book in the marketplace with code 'beginnings.' Also, Sam Riegel is a cock bag. →

name: SAM
line: What?! No! That's not what it says! (laughter) →

name: MATT
line: Thank you, Sam. Well done. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Classic, classic. →

name: MATT
line: Thank you, Laura, for the assist. Thank you, D&D Beyond for being an awesome partners on this new campaign. As a reminder, Talks Machina, with our recently paroled friend Brian W. Foster, your host every Thursday-- I'm sorry, Tuesday-- Tuesday nights at 7:00pm on Twitch and Project Alpha to talk about this episode that's happening tonight, next week. Check it out if you're around and want to see different cast members' thoughts on what has transpired. The new campaign episode two is now available for download on podcast, so you can go ahead and find that where all great podcasts are available on the internet. Issue #4 of the Critical Role comic, Vox Machina: Origins is out! It's been out for a couple of days now. It's starting to ramp up towards the story climax in the next two issues. Pretty excited about it and the next two issues are crazy. →

name: LIAM
line: Well-oiled machine, that party. →

name: MATT
line: Those of us that know what happens in the next two issues, it's like (quiet squeal) getting impatient. →

name: SAM
line: I don't know what happens. →

name: LIAM
line: Oh my god. I saw some early black and white pages today. →

name: MATT
line: Olivia did such a good job. Olivia is our artist for it. She's from the Critter community. →

name: MATT
line: She's amazing and did an incredible job with the comic, so show her some love. Olivia Samson is amazing, and Matt Colville, of course, our writer. →

name: MATT
line: Everyone who works on the comic does a great job, so check it out if you haven't had the chance. →

name: MATT
line: It's available on digital download on the Dark Horse app, on ComiXology, and a lot of other awesome places on the internet you can probably find. →

name: MATT
line: Are you-- oh jeez. Why do we put you two next to each other? →

name: LAURA
line: Look, I gave him a dice and he gave me a dice. →

name: MATT
line: Aw, that's actually really cute. I apologize for being so snappy. →

name: MATT
line: (laughter) →

line: I apologize if I'm a little puffy still. I had my wisdom teeth taken out. →

name: MATT
line: (cheering) →

name: MATT
line: On Saturday. →

name: TRAVIS

line: (laughter) →

line: No, you do not want that. →

line: They have been throughout the whole week and steadily, I have been like, "Please, please, don't be so bad on Thursday." It's okay. Not too bad today. →

name: MATT
line: Exactly. That's my usual defense mechanism for social engagement. Also, once again, our fantastic charity, 826LA. If you haven't had a chance, check it out. They do amazing programs for creative writing for underprivileged kids. If you have the opportunity to donate, or donate your time to become one of their fantastic volunteers, that would be fantastic. Check it out, we love them, and have been supporting them for a long time. They're amazing. Thank you, 826LA. Or an 826 near your home. I think those are all of the major announcements. →

name: LAURA
line: Whoa, that was fast! →

name: MATT
line: I know, we went through them fast. →

name: LAURA
line: I didn't even sort my dice yet! →

name: MATT
line: No new cons or events. So with that, let's dive into tonight's episode of Critical Role. →

name: MATT
line: [upbeat music] →

name: MATT
line: Welcome back. Last we left off, this intrepid band of slowly converging individual stories into some semblance of an adventuring party have found themselves caught up in an investigation. There was a carnival you attended, which Mollymauk was a part of, that had a terrible scenario occur. An older man who was at the carnival had been transformed in the middle of a performance into some horrible undead creature that attacked and assaulted other people within the tent. You defeated it and since have all been under investigation and been told you can't leave the town. To try and absolve yourselves of any sort of doubt, you've begun to investigate what the cause is for this strange transformation. →

name: MATT
line: You've gone around the town asking questions, meeting individuals, eventually finding yourselves back at the tent in the middle of the night, past midnight, in the early hours of the morning, sneaking into tents and asking members of the carnival what they may know about what has transpired. Upon speaking with a number of members of the carnival, two of the guards that were on site suddenly fell dead where they were standing, writhing in pain as they passed. You watched as a large shadow, which you had confirmed being fiendish in nature, leapt northward towards the Ustaloch and out of sight as both Fjord and Caleb rushed out of the main tent to see the center of the camp where these two bodies begin to rise up, two more of the freshly transformed undead creatures now angered and looking about for something to feast upon. And that was where we left off. →

line: Totally good. →

name: MATT
line: You watch as these two zombified guards, their brass-colored scale armor clanking as their forms rise up, looking around, peer past the shadowed darkness around the campfire lighting the interior. The horses grow nervous as you watch both Caleb and Fjord emerge from the tent right in their sights. You watch as they both begin to lumber in your direction. →

line: Well, that's all it can do. It dashed. It lurches towards them. They move a little bit quicker than you'd expect, but not necessarily that quick. They both spend their full turns trying to close the gap. For the horses-- →
