line: Okay, I'm going to hop off the boat and break eye contact with the captain of the boat so that I can Disguise Self into a crownsguard. →

name: LIAM
line: I talk to him while you do that. You have your wine, you have your gold. Thank you very much, it is much appreciated. It was a lovely trip. →

name: MATT
line: "Yes that's fine. Just, please, get out of my boat." →

name: TRAVIS
line: (English accent) Who goes there? What is this, what have you brought? →

name: LIAM
line: Oh, I have felled a beast. →

name: MATT
line: "They got in my boat. I-- they--" →

name: TRAVIS
line: Are you responsible for this? →

name: MATT
line: "No. They took over my boat and forced me to take them to the middle island there." →

name: LIAM
line: You will not take credit for my kill. I have killed this thing and I want it to be watched. I am going to the authorities. We will bring them back and get this sorted. →

name: TRAVIS
line: It's a horrifying-looking creature. You are to be commended for your bravery. Lawmaster Norda will want to know about this immediately. →

name: LAURA
line: You weren't here. →

name: MATT
line: Make a deception check with advantage. →

name: TALIESIN
line: This is so weird. →

name: LAURA
line: I'm just holding a bowling ball. →

name: MATT
line: He goes, "I want nothing to do with this. →

name: MATT
line: Good night." He helps each of you quickly get off the boat. Ties and locks it up and makes a beeline-- →

name: SAM
line: (shouting) We'll come to your house with your share of the reward. →

name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

name: TRAVIS
line: All right, we can't waste any time. →

name: LAURA
line: Can I lob the head up over the side of the boat? →

name: MATT
line: Make a strength check. →

name: LIAM
line: Monster calves. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh no. →

name: SAM
line: You're strong, though. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Are you? →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah, but at level two you need to roll higher than a three. →

name: LAURA
line: Eight! →

name: MATT
line: You get it partway up and it begins sliding back into the boat and plops into the boat and goes (bouncing) and you have to catch yourself. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Tongue and mouth just (lolling). →

name: MATT
line: It's terrifying. →

name: LAURA
line: All right, I need help. It's still covered, don't worry. She can't see what we're doing, it's covered with my cloak. →

name: SAM
line: I'll help you. →

name: LAURA
line: By the way, it's a little tiny cloak. It's like a half cape so it's like-- →

name: TALIESIN
line: It's like a napkin on a buffalo. →

name: MATT
line: A doily on a couch. →

name: SAM
line: I'll help you. →

name: LAURA
line: It's going to squish you. →

name: SAM
line: That's all right, I'm strong. One, two, three! →

name: MATT
line: Eventually you guys get it up onto the dock. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh, that's good. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Molly, do you intend to keep Toya here or do you need to take her back? →

name: TALIESIN
line: Take her right back. No one can know that she's been anywhere. →

name: LIAM
line: That is correct. Take her and sequester her with the family so not a peep gets out. →

name: TALIESIN
line: We'll explain to her what needs to be done. →

name: MARISHA
line: How do we trust you all won't skip town in the middle of the night? →

name: TALIESIN
line: We still have people in the lockup. →

name: LAURA
line: Gustav's in jail still. →

name: MARISHA
line: So? →

name: LAURA
line: Some people are loyal. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'll be back and I have to show back up with you people anyway. I'm going to get her as quickly as possible. →

name: MATT
line: The rest of you guys are doing? →

name: LAURA
line: Who is not very stealthy here? →

name: TRAVIS
line: I'm keeping watch over the toad head. →

name: MARISHA
line: I have a plus six to my stealth. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I wouldn't say no to it before I take off. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh that's true, you're sneaking back to the carnival. I give you a nice little blessing. →

name: LIAM
line: You're going to stay with your new friend. →

name: LIAM
line: You can't come to-- →

name: SAM
line: I'm not coming with you? →

name: LIAM
line: Not this time. It's not-- you know why. →

name: SAM
line: What if you're in trouble? You're very hurt. →

name: SAM
line: You've had a terrible night. →

name: LIAM
line: If any problem should arise, I'll send Frumpkin straight away to you. →

name: SAM
line: Unless you're dead. No one's going to be around to save you if you get into trouble. →

name: LIAM
line: I'm almost dead already. →

name: SAM
line: Yeah, that's not good. →

name: LAURA
line: That's not comforting, Caleb. →

name: LIAM
line: Nott, this is what I talked to you about the other night. These are our friends and we're going to sort this out and figure out what we do next. →

name: LIAM
line: It has been you and me, now it is you and me and them. Okay? You're with your blue friend here. →

name: LAURA
line: You can hold my hand. →

name: LIAM
line: I'll be back. I'm just going to have a conversation. We have gotten out of prisons before, you and I. I'm not worried about that. →

name: SAM
line: Her hands are very warm. →

name: LAURA
line: I'm warm blooded. →

name: LIAM
line: Well, she was just holding the throbbing head. →

name: SAM
line: Oh god. →

name: LAURA
line: Nott, you were too. →

name: SAM
line: That's true. But I didn't have my fingers in the holes. →

name: LAURA
line: Should I leave my cloak here over the head, sir, good sir, guard man? →

name: TRAVIS
line: It's fucking me, right? We know it's still me. I'm right here. →

name: MARISHA
line: We're not RPing still? →

name: TRAVIS
line: No. →

name: MARISHA
line: Sorry. →

name: TRAVIS
line: You can do what you want. →

name: LAURA
line: Should I leave my cloak here or should I take it with me? →

name: TRAVIS
line: Sure, I'll make a dramatic flourish of it. →

name: LAURA
line: Just make sure you bring it back home. →

name: MARISHA
line: I feel like the cloak is identifying to you. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Take it with you, scratch that. Good idea. →

name: MARISHA
line: Like where did this really pretty pink and lavender cloak come from? →

name: LAURA
line: It's green. →

name: MARISHA
line: I'm sorry, green. I haven't looked at the art. →

name: SAM
line: It's nighttime, the moonlight makes everything sort of look purple. →

name: TALIESIN
line: That's canon. →

name: TRAVIS
line: All right, go quickly. →

name: LAURA
line: Okay, we stealth away. →

name: TALIESIN
line: What is my stealth bonus now? →

name: LAURA
line: You just get advantage. →

name: MATT
line: We'll get to you in just a second. The rest of you guys make a stealth check, please. →

name: LIAM
line: I don't need to cause I'm just taking a stroll. →

name: MATT
line: Nope. For those of you who are-- →

name: MARISHA
line: Ten total. →

name: MATT
line: That's ten. →

name: LAURA
line: Seven. →

name: LIAM
line: Yep, that's my girl. →

name: MATT
line: Okay, before we get to you. As you guys make your way back to the Nestled Nook Inn, you come to the intersection where the alleyway leads you back to where the rope you had originally let down was placed. The rope is still there, in the darkness. →

name: MATT
line: As you make your way into the alley a voice goes, "Excuse me." The three of you glance over and you see a crownsguard at the end of the alley that's currently there with his arms crossed. "Can I help you?" →

name: LAURA
line: Is our back to him still? →

name: MATT
line: He's to the side. You guys are all looking up at the rope now and he's to the right of you. →

name: LAURA
line: Is it still dark out? →

name: MATT
line: Yes. It's close to midnight at this time. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh my god. Has anybody seen my shoe that I dropped earlier around here? →

name: MARISHA
line: I immediately drop to my knees and start looking for a shoe. →

name: TRAVIS
line: What, what? →

name: SAM
line: Did you say a shoe? →

name: MATT
line: I would like for you to make a-- (laughs) →

name: TRAVIS
line: You turned into Mr. Rogers? →

name: SAM
line: A shoe!? →

name: MATT
line: I would like for you to make a deception check, with disadvantage please. →

name: SAM
line: My shoe! →

name: LAURA
line: Eight. →

name: MATT
line: As Beau's on the ground frantically searching for a shoe and Nott's there in the darkness, the guard with his arms crossed goes (whistles). He begins to walk and approach you as two more guards close off the other side of the alley and they begin to come up to you guys. →

name: TRAVIS
line: How far away are they from me? Too far? →

name: MATT
line: Too far. →

name: MARISHA
line: Drop one of those rings, drop a ring! →

name: LAURA
line: It's not a shoe! I drop a ring. Wait, did we take a short rest when we were on the boat? We did. It was a short rest on the boat. →

name: MATT
line: To get across, I would say I'd allow a short rest. →

name: LAURA
line: Okay, I'm going to cast Invoke Duplicity. →

name: LAURA
line: Behind the guard. →

name: MATT
line: Make a sleight of hand check to see if they notice you suddenly casting a spell, or a spell-like effect. →

name: LAURA
line: Please please please. Natural 20! (cheering) →

name: MATT
line: Okay, so you Invoke Duplicity. Another version of you appears behind one of three guards. →

name: MATT
line: What are you doing? →

name: LAURA
line: Oh God. Oh, she doesn't make a sound, does she? →

name: MATT
line: Let's double-check this new ability that I'm getting used to. →

name: LAURA
line: I don't think she makes any noise. →

name: MARISHA
line: Can she tap? →

name: LAURA
line: But if she can cast through her, then I can imagine she can make contact because she casts on touch. →

name: MATT
line: You create an illusory duplicate of yourself. It is an illusion, it cannot make actually physical contact with anything. →

name: LAURA
line: Well, if she's behind one of the guards then two of the other guards can see her. →

name: MATT
line: Sure. →

name: SAM
line: We took a short rest on the thing? →

name: MATT
line: I'll say on the boat across the river, sure. →

name: SAM
line: If you want to hit dice it up. →

name: TRAVIS
line: You can roll one hit die. He's rolling commando. He don't want it. →

name: MATT
line: Anyway, you Invoke Duplicity and you appear behind him. →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah. My duplicate is going to jump up and down and start flailing her arms and then run down the alley around the building. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. →

name: SAM
line: We have to kill these fucking guards, don't we? →

name: MARISHA
line: No. →

name: MATT
line: The guard sees something quickly dart into the shadows and continues walking towards you. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh, come on! →

name: MARISHA
line: Just go with it, go with it. →

name: LAURA
line: Did you see that behind you? →

name: MATT
line: The guard approaches and goes, "It seems that you have been out and about when you were supposed to be within the inn." →

name: MARISHA
line: Found it! The ring. →

name: LAURA
line: That's my ring. I dropped it out the window. →

name: SAM
line: She calls it a shoe, it's a shoe ring. →

name: LAURA
line: I like to wear them on my toes. →

name: MATT
line: Three more guards have now approached from the front of the building and they approach and begin pulling out manacles and chains and say, "We're going to have to take you to the stockade." →

name: LAURA
line: Oh, please don't. Really, we just left the building because we wanted to go-- →

name: MATT
line: You're being locked up right now, as we speak. →

name: LAURA
line: This is the stupidest thing! →

name: MARISHA
line: So stupid! →

name: TALIESIN
line: Level two! →

name: SAM
line: Do I have to go, too? →

name: MATT
line: Oh yeah. →

name: SAM
line: But I was just a bystander! I was walking down here and I saw these two ruffians and I was going to go get help. →

name: MATT
line: Make a deception check. →

name: LAURA
line: It's actually true, she wasn't with us. →

name: SAM
line: Zero. →

name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

name: TRAVIS
line: You rolled a zero? →

name: LIAM
line: Look at him! →

name: TRAVIS
line: What's your modifier, negative two? →

name: SAM
line: Three minus three is zero. →

name: MATT
line: That went into my nose. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Brave new world. →

name: MATT
line: As you're telling him this, your mask goes (creak). He goes, "Arrest that creature!" →

name: TALIESIN
line: We're going to die from bad paperwork. →

name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, we really are. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Literally, we're going to die from bad paperwork. →

name: MATT
line: You both are put in chains. You're put in chains both arms and legs. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh, that's just mean. →

name: SAM
line: Racism! →

name: MATT
line: They bring you over to the stockade. →

name: MATT
line: Mollymauk. I need you to make a stealth check with advantage. →

name: MATT
line: You guys slowly make your way through the low grass over towards where the outside of the carnival is. As you approach, you can see there's about five crownsguard that are making rounds around the outside. It looks like where previously they had been keeping watch over the people that were there, since the murder of two of their own, it has heightened the intensity of the watch. It looks like it's fairly well watched. You get the sense, at a distance, that you would have a hard time getting in there. You can try and sneak her in and sneak out, but it seems dangerous. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Oh, shite. Not even a good push to get her underneath, just back into one of the tents, or no? →

name: MATT
line: You can try. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Yeah, I don't know they're caught, do I? →

name: MATT
line: No, you have no idea. →

name: MARISHA
line: Let's all get caught. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm going to try and wait for an advantageous moment. →

name: MATT
line: Which I'm going to allow you to do. You stay outside of the outskirts of the torchlight at the very front of the tent and the back of the tent. →

name: MATT
line: The fire of the actual encampment has gone out because you don't see any other carnival members. →

name: MATT
line: The sisters ran. They fled. You don't see any sign of Desmond or Ornna. Make one more stealth check, for the two of you, with advantage because you still have the ability. You're at the cusp end of it though. →

name: MATT
line: You manage to pace yourself, just carefully wait for the right moment, dart out of the grass having her under your arm and she's like, "What? Why? What is going on?" →

name: TALIESIN
line: You remember. Nothing happened. Find Ornna. You didn't see me. You just hid and waited and you didn't know that anything was wrong. If people ask, unless you hear from me, you don't know anything. →

name: MATT
line: "Okay." You slip her into the tent and back out, none the wiser. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm going to start heading back to the inn. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. You go back to the inn. You two. →

name: MATT
line: You're just waiting? →

name: LIAM
line: No, I'm not waiting. I'm going to see Norda, so I'll see you shortly. Be ready. →

name: TRAVIS
line: You will. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. You make your way to the stockade. As you approach and make your way into the interior, the two crownsguard at the front say, "Hold. What's your business?" →

name: LIAM
line: Excuse me, and I lurch and prop myself up against a wall and push back. Excuse me. I just had a very harrowing night. →

name: MATT
line: "Have you been drinking?" →

name: LIAM
line: You get me Norda this very minute and I will tell you what has happened with this circus and in this town and don't keep me waiting another minute. I'm bleeding out here. Arschloch. →

name: MATT
line: Make an intimidation check. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Nice. →

name: LIAM
line: Oh, come on. →

name: MATT
line: Just keep it in the-- →

name: LIAM
line: I wish I had gone with that because it was great there but it's not great here. That is a nine! →

name: MATT
line: It is indeed. He sits there and glares down at you for a second, your posturing, this filthy, scruffy man in a coat that wandered up out of nowhere covered in a little bit of his own blood. He just looks down at you for a second, "Sorry. She's done for the night." →

name: SAM
line: They keep regular hours here. →

name: LIAM
line: Excuse me. There are very good people being held under house arrest in a tavern right now. →

name: LIAM
line: They are innocent. I have evidence that I can show her. This whole thing can be solved now. →

name: MATT
line: "This whole thing can be solved first thing in the morning. I'll let you sleep it off. Have some water. Come back when you're feeling a little more yourself." →

name: SAM
line: Kill them all. →

name: TRAVIS
line: I draw back, and flames burst forth! →

name: LIAM
line: Okay. I look him in the eye. I will go away. →

name: LIAM
line: Get the message to her that the head of the circus frog is at the docks, waiting for her inspection. →

name: MATT
line: At this point, you hear a voice on the inside, just like, "Good night, good night" and a cloaked figure exits the front doorway, roughly about four and a half foot tall. →

name: LIAM
line: I remember the height. →

name: MATT
line: Norda is off the clock and is currently leaving for the evening to return to her home. →

name: LIAM
line: (shouting) There is a circus toad's remains at the docks! I would like to put this town's fears to rest. I am looking for-- What's her name? Yorda. →

name: ALL
line: Norda. →

name: LIAM
line: Norda. Yorda's at the inn. Right? →

name: MATT
line: There's Norda and then Yorda because I like to make it as confusing as possible. →

name: LIAM
line: Liam's memory is really spotty, but Caleb's is rock-solid. →

name: MATT
line: It's funny. When you spell things on paper, they seem so much different and when you say them out loud they're like, "Ah, they're very similar." The figure stops and turns and you hear this audible (heavy sigh). The figure waddles over towards you and pulls the hood back and it's Norda. "All right, what's this about a frog head?" →

name: LIAM
line: Thank goodness. Thank you, gentlemen. →

name: LIAM
line: Forgive me, I can see that you're trying to get yourself home to bed. →

name: MATT
line: "That would be preferable, aye." You see bags under her eyes. She's had a long day, her hair's a bit frazzled, and she looks like she's waiting for you to finish. →

name: LIAM
line: You are very aware that there are people at the Nestled Nook under house arrest by your order? They are innocent and I can prove it, and I would like to end things as quickly as possible. I have killed one of the circus folk this evening. →

name: MATT
line: "Now this'll be real interesting." She looks past you, and you follow her eyeline, and there you hear the sound of chains as a handful of crownsguard with Jester, Beau, and Nott, in manacles, approach from behind. "These ones, you're talking about, right?" →

name: MARISHA
line: Help. Help. Help. →

name: MARISHA
line: (laughter) →

name: LIAM
line: Funny story. Yes, these are the people I was talking about. Nothing has changed, however, and I am only asking to take another ten minutes of your time to walk to the dock. One of the performers has been killed this evening, and I have done it. →

name: LIAM
line: I staked out the circus because my friends were in trouble, and wrongly accused, and I knew this. So I staked out the circus this evening, and watched as this toad thing left the grounds there. It did this to me, and I, in a rage, followed it and destroyed it, and I will show you the remains of my work. We'll put it to bed. I'm either a clown or I'm a toad-killer. Let's see what it is. →

name: MATT
line: Make a persuasion check. →

name: LIAM
line: Come on, you fucker. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh, goddamn. →

name: MATT
line: She goes, (sighs) "Hold onto them for just a moment." She walks back inside. A moment passes, and she returns with four other guards. →

name: LAURA
line: I keep doing this so I can make a jingling sound with my chains. →

name: LIAM
line: You know, that's probably agitating the issue. Let's go to the docks. →

name: MATT
line: She comes up. "All right. Drag them along with us. Show us what this thing is, and if what you say is not true, you'll join them. How's that sound?" →

name: LIAM
line: I'm good with these terms. Follow me please. →

name: MATT
line: "All right." →

name: LAURA
line: You know, the only reason we were out of the inn is because we were looking for you, Caleb. →

name: LAURA
line: We didn't know where you went. →

name: LIAM
line: I am not going to answer her. I'm just walking very firmly, with purpose, to the docks. →

name: MATT
line: It has been close to an hour at this point. →

name: TRAVIS
line: If I can clock that, I would like to leave the head, move off into the shadows, and assume my older man form. →

name: MATT
line: Using your second slot. →

name: TRAVIS
line: No, I can just drop-- →

name: MATT
line: Oh no, you can do this whenever, that's right. →

name: TRAVIS
line: I'll drop the crownsguard, and make the old man and sit so I can keep an eye on it, but away from it. →

name: MATT
line: Eventually, you guys are led up to the docks, where you guide them. →

name: LIAM
line: Moment of confusion-- here it is, right here, where I left it. Nobody has tampered with it. I turn around and I pull back my clothing and show a huge slash across my body, and say: You see this? It was done by this thing. (whoosh) →

name: MATT
line: As soon as you pull back and reveal the face, its jaw is relaxed now, its muscles have sat now that it's been left in the dock, and it's pooled at its base. This old pumpkin look. Its tongue's lolling out and unraveled on the ground, what remained within its salivary glands has soaked the remaining wood around its base. One of the eyes has rolled back, but it's a horrible display. The guards take a step back immediately at the reveal, and Norda immediately gets interested, gets close, takes a look at it, and begins prodding a bit with her finger. →

name: LIAM
line: It is as bad as it looks, and if you have any holy people in this city, they will confirm that this thing is fiendish. →

name: MATT
line: (sighs) "You say it's a fiend? Because what this looks like is you just murdered one of our possible witnesses and/or other members of this investigation, so I'm hoping this is a fiend. I don't know fiends." →

name: LIAM
line: I hope you don't believe that I slashed open my own body and then went to the police. →

name: MATT
line: "Honey, I've been doing this for a long time. I've seen stranger. Hold on just a second." She calls one of the guards over, whispers to him for a second. He rushes off. "Just so happens we have someone in town who might be able to confirm this for us, might help your case." →

name: LAURA
line: Who is it? →

name: MATT
line: "Oh, they will be here shortly." →

name: LIAM
line: I sit down on a crate and I stop talking. →

name: MATT
line: Okay, and this awkward period of time with the guards all just standing there, holding you as you wait patiently. Some of them are tapping their fingers. You start rattling your chains and two guards pull the chains taut so you can't do it anymore. Mollymauk, as you begin to make your way back into town, because you're making your way through the dock district along the lakeside and you look up ahead, and you can see there's a couple of torches being held by crownsguard right where the head was left, and you can see Caleb, and then three of your allies in chains. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Hmm. (sighs) →

name: LAURA
line: Oh no! What are you going to do? →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm going to get a little closer. →

name: MATT
line: All right, make a stealth check, please. You do not have advantage anymore, that has passed. →

name: MATT
line: It's been more than a hour. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Just to take a look at what is actually going on. →

name: LAURA
line: Not to get too close. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Not too close. →

name: MATT
line: Yeah, it's not a high DC. →

name: MATT
line: You get a little closer, you are still maybe a good 100 feet or so away from them, keeping to the shadows along a building, keeping low. →

name: MATT
line: Thankfully it's nighttime, it's pushing midnight at this point. Because you're ostentatiously dressed, but there isn't a lot of light in your colors. As far as you know right now, no one can see you, you're too far away to hear much, but you can keep an eye on them. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Oh, what's the play? What's the play? Ah! I'm going to-- Yeah, fuck it. I'm going to walk up. →

name: MATT
line: All right. →

name: TALIESIN
line: With briskly. There I find you! I've been looking everywhere. →

name: TALIESIN
line: You're not supposed to leave the bloody inn you-- oh. →

name: TALIESIN
line: (sighs) They're already in trouble, apparently. →

name: MATT
line: "I love when they do this! Chain him up." You are shackled as well. →

name: TALIESIN
line: All right. Less questions to answer. →

name: MATT
line: At this point, Norda is starting to smile a bit. She's like "Man, if we could have more criminals like you lot, my job would be far easier. I would get home a lot earlier." →

name: SAM
line: We're not criminals! We're not! Me and Caleb were just travelling ever since we broke out of that-- Nothing! →

name: TALIESIN
line: Dance number. →

name: LIAM
line: No, it's good that you try so hard to protect the rights of giant frog creatures. I'm very impressed. →

name: LAURA
line: Fiend creatures specifically. →

name: MATT
line: At this point the guard that had left earlier, who has been gone for about 15 to 20 minutes or so, comes back with a brisk jog. →

name: MATT
line: There's another figure walking up behind him, also jogging. You can see light gray hood and cloak around and as the figure approaches into the torch light, pulls back the hood, and you see this long shoulder length curled blond hair. A very very delicate looking elven male, who approaches. "I believe I've been summoned, Norda?" "Yes sorry, this is Archivist Zeenoth. He's been in town for a few days and he comes from the library that knows a lot about a lot of things. I hope that he can help us in this. Zeenoth, they're calling this thing a fiend. What do you know about this?" He steps closer, kneels down next to the head. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Xhorhas. →

name: MATT
line: Hmm? →

name: TALIESIN
line: I just whisper Xhorhas. →

name: MATT
line: "Yes, these creatures do frequent Xhorhas." He gives some look over, pulls a small book out of his side pouch. Begins to thumb through it, compares a few things. "I'm not a specialist, unfortunately. This creature is very much a very dangerous entity from the far east. I'm surprised it made it this far into civilization before being destroyed. It's a good thing it has been." He now gets to look at everyone, over the crew and goes, "Are you the ones who slew it?" →

name: LAURA
line: Oh well technically it was Caleb, technically. →

name: LIAM
line: Just me. →

name: MATT
line: As the figure looks over and stops on Beau and kind of smiles. →

name: SAM
line: What's going on over there? →

name: MARISHA
line: Oh sorry, I just have back issues. I'm just stretching. →

name: LIAM
line: Yes it was difficult, but I prevailed in the end. The city is safe. What library was that that you mentioned? →

name: MATT
line: "Oh I'm an archivist. I'm the archivist of the Cobalt Soul." →

name: LIAM
line: Here in town? →

name: MATT
line: "No, I'm from Zadash. I'm a bit out of my depth at the moment." →

name: LAURA
line: What brings you this far? →

name: MATT
line: "Well, I have business." At this point Norda goes, "All right you know what? This is some serious bullshite. We're all just chilling here at the docks, we have confirmed that's a fiend." →

name: LAURA
line: The nergaliid! →

name: MATT
line: "A nergaliid! Bring them back to the stockade. Let's have a trial." They begin to pull you guys back to the stockade. Two of the guards grab the nergaliid head and they begin dragging it along, and you guys are all being pulled. →

name: LIAM
line: Oh sorry, one last thing, Watchmaster. I pull out the book that I read about the nergaliid. →

name: LIAM
line: Here this is a gift, for you. This is folklore. →

name: LIAM
line: You will find I have marked a page in there. It will describe this thing. →

name: MATT
line: As you guys are walking, she thumbs through and finds the page, begins to read, passes it to the archivist. He begins to read it. He passes it back. You guys all make your way into the stockade. You're not brought to her chambers, you're brought to a much larger room. This room has much more of a stark, barren, stone interior. →

name: MATT
line: There are benches built. There is a central kind of a pit. There's about four or five steps down into this pit. Then above that is a desk where Norda takes as the law master. As you step in you realize, oh this is a room of judgement. What are you doing? →

name: TRAVIS
line: I would like to try, once they start making their way back to that facility, to quickly make my way to the inn, if I can as the old man, enter, make my way into the restroom, drop my disguise, come back out as Fjord. Oh the water closet, what have you. →

name: MATT
line: There is a shared water closet. →

name: LIAM
line: It's just a pot. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah, the room with the pot in it. Then make my way back to the front door, stick my head out where the guards are. →

name: MATT
line: Yeah, there's two guards still posted there. →

name: MATT
line: Most of them have already left because they're carting off the rest of your friends. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Please, I can't seem to find any of my comrades. Have you seen where they have gone? →

name: MATT
line: They look at each other. "Yeah, they've been arrested." →

name: TRAVIS
line: I was afraid as much. Could I make my way down to where they are being held? I would like to be present, if it would be prudent. →

name: MATT
line: "You leave our watch, we cut you." They both flank you side to side and push you ahead a little bit. They are glued to your right and left. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Very kind of you. →

name: MATT
line: They lead you to the stockade. As you guys are brought into this chamber, Norda sets up. →

name: SAM
line: Who is going to go get the little girl? →

name: LIAM
line: You're the little girl here. You're confused. It's been a night. →

name: MATT
line: Norda, up there at the top, takes her cloak off, puts on her ceremonial armor bits. There's a whole element to the presentation of this. You can see her tiredly putting them on. Sets her hands on the top, "I would like you to present what evidence you have to absolve you of these charges against you and then based on what you present, I'll decide whether or not you're innocent or guilty or require further investigation. Who would like to present evidence first? You! You brought the head of a creature! You're not in chains. →

name: MATT
line: We'll start with you." They drag the creature's head forward. She takes the book from the archivist. "And speaking with Zeenoth here, it appears what you said is true. This creature is a dangerous, terrible fiend. And looking at it's apparent ability to feast on the essence of creatures, this explains both the transformation of the old man. This also explains destruction of our two guards, who were recently discovered. Rest their soul. So, that explains that. Convince me as to why you were not working with this entity, especially those of the carnival." She snaps her finger again and you watch as Gustav and Bosun are brought into the chamber, as well as a third figure who you see step out of the shadows. Her hair dark and fading to white, last seen fleeing into the distant fields, you see, in chains as well, Yasha being pulled into the courtroom. →

name: MATT
line: (cheering) →

name: TRAVIS
line: Showing up just to get arrested! →

name: MARISHA
line: Welcome to the club! →

name: LIAM
line: (singing) Breaking the law, breaking the law! →

name: TALIESIN
line: Lot of help you were! →

name: MARISHA
line: Welcome to the chain gang. →

name: ASHLEY
line: Hey. Yeah. →

name: MATT
line: "That one was caught fleeing from the scene." →

name: ASHLEY
line: No, that's completely a misunderstanding of things. That's not what happened. →

name: MATT
line: "I'm certain. You have a trustworthy face. →

name: MATT
line: What's the next bit of evidence you want to present, please? Anyone?" →

name: LIAM
line: Well, first a question. Are you familiar with Occam's Razor? →

name: MATT
line: "What?" →

name: LIAM
line: I figured. Okay. That one works for the circus. Do I look like I work for the circus? →

name: MATT
line: "Strangely, not well dressed enough." →

name: LIAM
line: No. I'm a dirty hobo and I reek like yesterday's garbage. →

name: MATT
line: "I wasn't going to go that far, but I'll admiss it." →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah. This one, does he look like a circus performer? Is he filthy like me? →

name: LAURA
line: He's not here. →

name: MATT
line: "Which one?" Fjord has not arrived yet. →

name: LIAM
line: But he's right here! Look, I can touch him. →

name: MATT
line: We'll say for the purposes of that, as you say that and reveal your hand, Fjord enters through the door like it was a planned arrival. →

name: SAM
line: Weirdly, he's dripping wet. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Baby oil. →

name: LIAM
line: The sardonic one, right? With the shit-eating grin. Does she look like she works for the circus? →

name: MATT
line: "I don't know what she works for, but I don't trust her." →

name: MARISHA
line: That's smart. →

name: LIAM
line: I am injured within a centimeter of my life. →

name: LIAM
line: This one is a nincompoop. →

name: LAURA
line: Wait, which one were you pointing at? →

name: LIAM
line: That's you. I pull the mask away. This is my good friend. She's a goblin. →

name: SAM
line: A little halfling girl! →

name: MATT
line: At this point, you watch her pull back. →

name: LIAM
line: I step in front of her. She is my friend and colleague and you will not lay a hand on her while I am standing here. →

name: MATT
line: Make a persuasion check. →

name: LIAM
line: Fucking right I will. →

name: LIAM
line: That is an 11. →

name: LIAM
line: (chanting) Level two! →

name: MARISHA
line: (chanting) Shitty dice! →

name: MATT
line: Her eyes are chained onto this goblin. →

name: LIAM
line: She's looking into my chest because Nott is behind me. I'm sorry, I'm confused why you're going to such lengths to defend the rights of this large, oversized frog skull. →

name: MATT
line: "I defend no rights of this creature! I've been in this office long enough to know that there aren't usually solo workers on something like this. I know these folk. They all protect each other. Who's to say this wasn't their whole reasoning for coming anyway, and something went wrong, and they're letting him take the fall?" →

name: LIAM
line: There's a big conspiracy to make undead crownsguard here in the city? →

name: MATT
line: "I don't fucking know! Don't tell me how I do my business! Sit the fuck down! Who's next?" →

name: TALIESIN
line: You're right. We do protect our own. →

name: TALIESIN
line: That's absolutely true. →

name: MATT
line: "Let him up." They loosen the chains and you get to stand and approach a bit. →

name: TALIESIN
line: It's a common tactic. It's a good way to make your way through this world. Normally it works. We assumed, the circus, anyway, that we were being framed. We were protecting our own. Is the head in here? →

name: LAURA
line: Yes. →

name: TALIESIN
line: This one showed his true colors, and then we took care of it. I'm going to throw one of my swords down on the ground that is filthy with its blood. →

name: MATT
line: "All right. Why did this one run?" →

name: ASHLEY
line: Well-- →

name: SAM
line: (high-pitched) I mean-- →

name: ASHLEY
line: I feel like I didn't need to be in there anymore. You know. I don't-- ugh. →

name: MATT
line: I would like you both to make persuasion checks. →

name: ASHLEY
line: I feel like-- →

name: TALIESIN
line: Oh, shit. 12. →

name: TALIESIN
line: We needed someone on the outside. We knew we were innocent. We knew you didn't think so. We just assumed you were going to have us all executed and we didn't do anything. What would you have done? →

name: MATT
line: "Is that goblin pissing in my court?" (laughter) →

name: SAM
line: I'm sorry! I'm really nervous! →

name: TALIESIN
line: In his defense, it's a wonderful vintage. Her defense. →

name: SAM
line: I'm very nervous. I'm sorry, it's just your guards shackled both my wrists and my ankles and I can't move to get into a good position. →

name: LIAM
line: You know, when she's nervous she aerates her bladder, all right? →

name: SAM
line: Look, I have some evidence to submit. Look at my hands and also the hands of Jester. We're covered in the thing's blood. We were there too. →

name: SAM
line: We helped the killing of the creature. →

name: MATT
line: The dwarf woman, Norda, leans forward and looks you dead in the eyes. "I've known friends I grew up with who were carved down by your kin. →

name: MATT
line: Convince me why I shouldn't hang you tomorrow." →

name: SAM
line: I'm sorry for your loss. Where are your people from? →

name: MATT
line: "Grimgolir." →

name: SAM
line: That's not where my clan's from. I had nothing to do with it. My clan operates far, far away and-- →

name: MATT
line: "Where does your clan operate from?" →

name: SAM
line: I'm looking on the map. Near the Felderwin Tillage. →

name: MATT
line: "That's not too far. Maybe we'll send some folks to pay a visit to your clan." →

name: SAM
line: You can. Feel free. I'll even tell you where they are. I'm no longer associated with them and I can help you hunt them down if you'd like. →

name: MATT
line: Make a persuasion check. →

name: MARISHA
line: Wow. →

name: LAURA
line: What is it? →

name: SAM
line: One. →

name: LAURA
line: No, but you didn't roll a one. He rolled a four. →

name: SAM
line: It's not a natural one. →

name: LAURA
line: Not a natural one. →

name: LIAM
line: Still sucks. →

name: MATT
line: (sigh) →

name: LAURA
line: God, why are we rolling so bad? →

name: MATT
line: She leans back. "I want to sleep. I think you're telling the truth. Most of you. Archivist, does this resonate with you as well? Does this check out, lore-wise? I don't know what the fuck you do." The Archivist is like, "I believe based on what they've stated, at least it's consistent though I'm a bit confused as to the demeanor of the goblin. It's not unheard of to have goblin kin turn against their own. There have been a number of historic individuals of various monstrous races who have been beneficial members of society." →

name: LIAM
line: I invite Nott up to my piggy-back position on my shoulders. →

name: LAURA
line: You can't, she's chained up. →

name: LIAM
line: I scoop her up. →

name: SAM
line: This is even more awkward. Just put me back down. Put me back down. →

name: LIAM
line: Just let it happen. →

name: SAM
line: No! The chains are pulling me one way and you're pulling me the other way. Just come down to my level! Come down here! →

name: MATT
line: "Bring the two others forward." They bring forward Gustav and Bosun. "This is your circus, right?" He goes, "It is my circus and I take full responsibility for what's happened. Sincerely. →

name: MATT
line: They have done nothing wrong. They are completely innocent. I brought this creature into our fold and that is on me. Whatever judgement you have, bring onto my head, not theirs. Please. I implore you." "Fine. I'll consider the investigation closed. You're all freed of charges against you. →

name: MATT
line: Including the goblin." →

name: SAM
line: Oh! Thank you! I would kiss you if I could. →

name: MATT
line: "I would not recommend trying. Okay. Gustav, what's-- I can't read your last name. You've been given quite a debt for Trostenwald so you shall remain here until you've worked off the debt to the city. To the number of 2,645 gold pieces. To make up for the deaths of our two crownsguard, of the two civilians who have died, and the general cost of this entire investigation. We'll consider what your work is to the city tomorrow. However, the rest of you: you're free to go. I'm going to go get myself some sleep." →

name: LIAM
line: Can I have my book back, please? →

name: MATT
line: Takes her armor off. "(sigh) All right. I'm going to get a drink." She puts her cloak on and then hops off. With the imposing sight of her on top of a large pedestal and desk, she hops down to her natural dwarven height and it's almost adorable to watch her just skitter the hell out of there. She's done. →

name: LAURA
line: Where are you getting a drink at? →

name: MATT
line: There's no response. →

name: LAURA
line: Do you want company? →

name: TRAVIS
line: I just turn to the nearest crownsguard and-- →

name: MATT
line: The chains are removed. They free everybody, including Gustav, but two guards are assigned to him to keep an eye over him. →

name: MARISHA
line: As soon as Beau gets out of her chains, I grab my stuff and I leave. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. As you are exiting the stockade, in the archway of the doors right outside, you see another figure standing hood up-- like a short hood with a mantle that stops about midway. Bare arms and dark skin, baggy gray pants and is there, waiting. →

name: MARISHA
line: What's the mantle? →

name: MATT
line: You don't recognize any details about it. →

name: MATT
line: You see a cloaked figure there, waiting, looking right at you. →

name: MARISHA
line: Is he blocking the doorway? →

name: MATT
line: Is just beyond the doorway. It's not blocked. →

name: MARISHA
line: Is there another way out? →

name: MATT
line: I mean, you can exit. They're just on the other side of the door. Every other way in, you don't know the stockade well and all of it just leads further into the stockade. There are other crownsguard inside. →

name: MARISHA
line: Okay, I'm just going to try and just bolt through. →

name: MATT
line: You're just going to bolt? Full run? →

name: MARISHA
line: Not run, just you know, Irish goodbye. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. All right. As you briskly exit and turn to the left, the figure intervenes and side steps right in front of you. →

name: MARISHA
line: Do I recognize him? →

name: MATT
line: No. You don't see much of the face. The hood is up and a little bit of the moonlight is coming, you can see the edge of features. The body is muscular, but thin. Looks not terribly masculine or feminine, but it looks able and it moved at a very quick speed to intercept your positioning. →

name: MARISHA
line: I just go: Oh, fuck! Turn around and walk back in. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. →

name: MARISHA
line: I'll join everyone else. I flick off the guy on my way back in. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. As you guys are being escorted out of the stockade, Beau comes back in and joins you. →

name: LAURA
line: I thought you left. →

name: MARISHA
line: Just had to pee. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Shame. →

name: LAURA
line: Hey, you guys, we're town heroes! What's it feel like? →

name: MARISHA
line: Yeah! →

name: LAURA
line: Yasha, it's very good to see you again. →

name: ASHLEY
line: It's good to see you guys, too. →

name: SAM
line: Where did you go? Were you on the lam for a long time? →

name: ASHLEY
line: I have a little bit of a problem with authority and I didn't want to be caught in a small and confined space and then that ended up happening. →

name: LAURA
line: How long have you been in there? →

name: ASHLEY
line: Immediately after I ran away. They sent out horses. I'm not that fast, but I did fuck up a few of the guards. "By accident. " →

name: MATT
line: As you say that, you hear a couple (clears throat) and two of the crownsguard visibly bruised that are escorting you guys out into the night air before they eventually leave you to your own devices. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Molly, what do you think this means for the carnival? →

name: TALIESIN
line: I don't know. That is a question. →

name: LAURA
line: I mean, if Gustav has to stay here then who's going to run it? →

name: MARISHA
line: That's a lot of gold. That's like a life sentence worth of gold. →

name: LAURA
line: Well, I mean-- →

name: TALIESIN
line: Gold comes, gold goes. →

name: LIAM
line: How much do you think the circus has? →

name: TALIESIN
line: I don't know how much the circus has and, honestly, I think Ornna would lie about it if we asked. →

name: MATT
line: The crownsguard have pulled away and now it's just you guys and Bosun and Gustav now, out in the air and Gustav is rubbing his wrists. →

name: MATT
line: "Well, thank you everyone for helping. That could have been a lot worse. And, you know, it's fine. I know it's a lot of money, but shouldn't take me more than a few years. It's a nice town! Trostenwald is a nice town!" →

name: TRAVIS
line: It's not that nice. →

name: MATT
line: "No, it's not, but you know, it's better than prison." →

name: LAURA
line: There's a lot of beer here. →

name: MATT
line: "That there is. I may have to start a small fund for that on its own." →

name: LIAM
line: What happens to the circus, because, you know, you can't do the same show for the same people for a year? →

name: MATT
line: "Where's Ornna? Where's the twins? Where's--" →

name: TALIESIN
line: Well, the twins buggered. Ornna? God only knows. →

name: ASHLEY
line: Where's Toya? →

name: TALIESIN
line: Toya is back at the circus, but shaken. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Very shaken. →

name: MATT
line: At which point, Gustav just begins making a beeline for the circus. Bosun goes, "Oh." (sighs) →

name: TALIESIN
line: How hard can it be to make 2,000 gold? →

name: MATT
line: "I don't know how much he saved. Nowhere near that much, probably." →

name: TALIESIN
line: How hard can it be to steal 2,000 gold? →

name: LAURA
line: I don't know how many people around here have that much. Although, the breweries might. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Maybe be best to find that gold elsewhere. →

name: ASHLEY
line: Wait, so who killed him? →

name: MATT
line: Gustav has spun around and comes back and is like, "Sincerely. I appreciate the aid, but don't. →

name: MATT
line: This is on me. I'll take care of it. This is not your responsibility. It's not your responsibility. →

name: MATT
line: You guys have already done so much. It's fine. →

name: MATT
line: I'll take care of it." →

name: TALIESIN
line: Suppose we should take a look at what's left of the circus. →

name: MARISHA
line: Can I go take a look around? Do I see Zeenoth anywhere? →

name: MATT
line: Make a perception check. →

name: MARISHA
line: Oh, god damn it, it was almost better. It was almost good. Ten. →

name: MATT
line: Ten? You don't see anybody immediately around. →

name: LAURA
line: Was that Archivist Zeenoth that was outside? →

name: MARISHA
line: Archivist. →

name: LAURA
line: That's what I said. Was that who it was that was like-- →

name: MATT
line: No, Zeenoth was still inside the courtroom when you were leaving. →

name: MARISHA
line: Yeah. Different guy. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh, who was it that was outside? →

name: LIAM
line: We don't know, we didn't see him. →

name: TRAVIS
line: It's very late, right? →

name: MATT
line: Yeah, it's post-midnight now. →

name: LAURA
line: I'm so tired. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Don't suppose you want to retire for the evening? Share a drink together now that this is somewhat behind us? →

name: TALIESIN
line: I will definitely drink. I think we should probably drink at our camp then. I'm fine inviting them. →

name: MATT
line: "Tell you what. As a thanks, we'll grab Toya. We'll meet you guys-- where are you all staying?" →

name: MARISHA
line: The Nestled Nook. →

name: MATT
line: "We'll come meet you at the Nestled Nook and I'll get a round for you all. As a thank you." →

name: TALIESIN
line: Is this a human thing to-- never mind →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah, we're just like tieflings, we're all alike. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I know. →

name: MATT
line: "All right. Bosun, come on." They make their way off to the carnival camp. →

name: ASHLEY
line: It was him? →

name: TALIESIN
line: Kylre went bad. Maybe he'd already always been bad, I don't know. →

name: LAURA
line: I mean, he attacked us. A lot of guards, too. →

name: SAM
line: He was an evil fiend. When he joined the circus, who brought him in? →

name: TALIESIN
line: Let's not be throwing words around. →

name: SAM
line: No, he was literally an evil fiend. →

name: LAURA
line: He summoned imps. →

name: TALIESIN
line: He did summon-- →

name: LAURA
line: He summoned imps, Yasha! →

name: SAM
line: He controlled the girl! →

name: TALIESIN
line: He was fine for years. Something set him off. →

name: LIAM
line: Ah, he said it himself, you people in the circus are weird, right? So, every once in a while, a glitch. →

name: MARISHA
line: A glitch? What? →

name: TALIESIN
line: He was fine for so long. There was nothing for so long. Why? Things don't just... →

name: MARISHA
line: I still think there's something creepy about this lake, man. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Maybe? →

name: MARISHA
line: It gives me the heebie jeebies. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Everything gives me the heebie jeebies. →

name: LIAM
line: Well, if it is this thing that we've read about in the book, then perhaps he needed to feed more or was impatient for some reason? →

name: ASHLEY
line: What's happened with Toya? →

name: TALIESIN
line: Shite. →

name: ASHLEY
line: How is she? →

name: TALIESIN
line: She is not good. She is taking it as you would expect. →

name: SAM
line: Also Beau crushed her windpipe. →

name: TALIESIN
line: That's true. With her stick. →

name: LIAM
line: And, I'm sorry, are we also taking the bouncer into our little coven of weirdos. Is that a thing that's happening? →

name: ASHLEY
line: Oh, well-- →

name: TALIESIN
line: Always. →

name: ASHLEY
line: I mean, I kind of go on my own, but-- →

name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, she's one of us. →

name: TALIESIN
line: She's the charm, she has to come! →

name: LIAM
line: I'm too tired to argue. Let's get that drink. →

name: TALIESIN
line: See, charm. Drink. →

name: MATT
line: As you make your way back to the Nestled Nook Inn, within the tavern, and within the next hour or so, Gustav and Bosun, Toya and Ornna all come in and join you. You guys crowd a few tables together, and under what is generally a pretty empty tavern this night, you guys, for the most part, dominate the center space. →

name: TRAVIS
line: I'm sorry, Yasha, for new patrons, you're going to have to surrender your sword. →

name: ASHLEY
line: (laughs) You're very funny. →

name: TALIESIN
line: He is very funny. →

name: LIAM
line: That is a very sick burn. →

name: MARISHA
line: Speaking of swords-- →

name: LAURA
line: Careful Fjord, we haven't been healed yet, you know. She could take you down. →

name: ASHLEY
line: You could always try to take it. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Arm wrestle. →

name: TRAVIS
line: I could, couldn't I? →

name: ASHLEY
line: Yeah. →

name: MARISHA
line: Arm wrestle! →

name: ASHLEY
line: You do look pretty strong. I mean, you're just a little bit bigger than me, but I still think I could probably take you. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Looks could be deceiving. →

name: MARISHA
line: Arm wrestle! Bets on Yasha. →

name: LAURA
line: Do it! Arm wrestle! →

name: TRAVIS
line: I just thought it would be a nice gesture. →

name: LAURA
line: To arm wrestle? →

name: TRAVIS
line: No, to give up her sword. →

name: ASHLEY
line: What about your sword? →

name: TRAVIS
line: Oh, I'm a paying patron here. They know me quite well. →

name: TALIESIN
line: So? You've got to be putting something on the table, though. Well, if you want to surrender the sword or not surrender the sword. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Did you want to stay in that room any longer, Molly? →

name: TALIESIN
line: (laughs) Never. →

name: MARISHA
line: I don't know what we're talking about anymore. →

name: LAURA
line: I don't either. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Let's get a drink. →

name: MARISHA
line: Are you guys going to arm wrestle? →

name: TRAVIS
line: No. →

name: MARISHA
line: Okay. How about "Boulder, Paper, Shears"? Wait, what is it? "Boulder, Parchment, Shears"! →

name: TALIESIN
line: That's a stupid game. →

name: SAM
line: I never heard of that game. →

name: ASHLEY
line: I think it's something that kids play. I have a better version of that game. We can play it later. →

name: MATT
line: The rest of the carnival in presence, Gustav goes and orders a round of drinks to all of you and then sits down. Toya still looks a bit shaken, but seems to be comforted with the rest of the family around her, that still remain at least. →

name: MATT
line: Desmond's come and joined as well. As you're all sitting together for a bit, there's a moment of quiet as you're all sipping, and just tiredly thinking over the events of the evening. Toya breaks the silence, "Is the family going away? Am I going to be alone again?" Ornna looks over at her and goes, "Not if I can help it. It's you and me, kid, against the world." Bosun pats Ornna on the shoulder and says, "Well, if you'd have me, you can probably use a strong arm." Ornna looks back at him. Ornna and him have had this rivalry tension for a while. She goes, "You know what? Sure. The trio makes for a strong pack of performers. Desmond, are you in?" And Desmond is just sitting there, staring into his cup and goes, "I see a new family before me. And one I fear that's a story I could only spoil. No, I thank you, but I'll find my own path." And he just sits there kind of quietly in this somewhat sad space. →

name: MATT
line: He gives a brief pat and side hug to Bosun before standing up and leaving. Gustav stands up and looks around. "I'm sorry for everything. For all the pain this has caused you, for all the pain it's caused you." Looks at Toya, "For all the pain it's caused you, little one." →

name: TRAVIS
line: We had quite the adventure, actually. I know people were hurt, but that was really something. →

name: MARISHA
line: And apparently, nobody really cared about Enon, so that's, you know, good for your conscience. →

name: MATT
line: "Everyone's conscience is heavy with its own reasoning." →

name: TALIESIN
line: Get no blame from me. →

name: MATT
line: "I appreciate that. We are our own worst enemy, are we not?" →

name: TALIESIN
line: Ah, cheers to that! →

name: LIAM
line: I catch Nott's eye and silently mouth the word 'lunatics'. →

name: SAM
line: Yeah, yeah. →

name: MATT
line: "Well, I think that's the end of my carnival." (laughs) →

name: LAURA
line: It was such a good carnival. →

name: MATT
line: "It was a good run! It was a really good run." →

name: MARISHA
line: Man, we caught the last show, you guys! →

name: TALIESIN
line: Not our best show. →

name: LAURA
line: I liked it. →

name: SAM
line: The tickets are probably worth something! →

name: MARISHA
line: They might! →

name: TRAVIS
line: Closed it down. →

name: MARISHA
line: I'm gonna keep this flyer. →

name: TALIESIN
line: You have plans? →

name: ASHLEY
line: No, I'm just going to float around like I usually do. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I don't know, I'm thinking about it. I don't know where I'm going to end up now. →

name: MATT
line: "You can go with Bosun and Ornna, if you like. You guys are still carrying on. I mean, I'm not going to keep the tent, I'm not going to keep the supplies. I might hock some of it to try and pay off my debt, but-- take what you want. Start anew. It's my gift to you." They all kind of, "Thank you very much. We'll start small, I don't think we need too much of the ensemble. How we began, back up in Shady Creek." →

name: LAURA
line: I mean, I could use a really large tent. →

name: LAURA
line: Like the biggest one? I would take that off your hands. →

name: TALIESIN
line: The biggest one's a bit-- →

name: TRAVIS
line: What would you do with a really large tent? →

name: LAURA
line: I don't know, I could open up a hotel? Or I could make a bunch of dresses. Or-- →

name: SAM
line: Out of the tent? →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah! →

name: TALIESIN
line: You could make a lot of dresses out of that tent. That's fair. →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah, right? It's really pretty fabric. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Thank you. →

name: LAURA
line: (gasps) A hot air balloon! →

name: TALIESIN
line: I don't-- →

name: LIAM
line: A what? →

name: SAM
line: Those aren't invented. →

name: LAURA
line: Haven't you seen airships? →

name: SAM
line: No! →

name: LIAM
line: They generally run from crystals. I've seen that kind before. →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah! →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah, there's no balloons, though. What's a balloon? →

name: MATT
line: They have simple dirigibles, but they're not very functional. →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah, it just involves fire you guys. We can figure this shit out. →

name: LIAM
line: Oh, a dirigible? Dirigible I've heard of, but a balloon? I don't know what that is. →

name: MARISHA
line: Have the airships made it to this continent yet? →

name: LIAM
line: You don't know. →

name: SAM
line: I think, Jester-- →

name: LAURA
line: I've seen airships, okay? I've seen them. →

name: SAM
line: Jester, I think it's safe to say that this first case is closed! →

name: LAURA
line: (gasps) →

name: SAM
line: So we could open some sort of private investigation service. →

name: LAURA
line: That's what we should do! →

name: SAM
line: Out of a tent. →

name: LAURA
line: Let's not open it here, though. This town sucks! →

name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah, we were still planning on moving on after this. →

name: MATT
line: "Bosun and Ornna, you guys can use that tent, right?" "Yeah, I think we'll take the tent." "All right." →

name: SAM
line: Aw, they took the tent. →

name: LAURA
line: Aw. We waited too long! →

name: SAM
line: You got to jump on the tent when it becomes available. →

name: LIAM
line: You know, just out of curiosity, what's everybody plan to do now? →

name: SAM
line: Well do we have to leave? I mean I'm not wanted anymore. →

name: LIAM
line: You were never wanted. Back to my question-- →

name: LAURA
line: Fjord and I are going to try and get him into the Academy. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Well, I wanted to find out more about the Soltrice Academy, yes. I didn't know what direction you were heading. I never even asked what you were doing here in the first place. →

name: MARISHA
line: Oh, you know, I'm just doing a walking tour? Through the continent, just kind of-- →

name: TRAVIS
line: A walking tour? →

name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, just like a backpack vacation, you know? Just stretch my legs a little bit. Meeting some fine people. Discovering myself. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Are you on a vacation? →

name: MARISHA
line: Yes. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Bring a lot of money with you for that vacation, did you? →

name: MARISHA
line: What's it matter to you? →

name: TRAVIS
line: I don't believe you're on vacation. Where are you going? →

name: MARISHA
line: (laughs) That's your problem. So, you guys going to take off or do you guys want company or-- ? →

name: MATT
line: Gustav finishes the drink and goes, "Well, I'm going to go get some sleep and try and figure out how to put my life together. I bid you all a wonderful night--" →

name: LAURA
line: Gustav, wait! Here. And I take off one of my rings. This is an old family heirloom, and I hope it can help you pay some of your debt. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I want to spy the rings on her hand, by the way, really quickly. →

name: MATT
line: "Looks just like the one I lost off my pinky." →

name: LAURA
line: Well, that's so weird that you and my family have the same looking ones. →

name: MATT
line: "That's wonderful, thank you so much." →

name: LAURA
line: You're welcome. →

name: MATT
line: "That's very sweet." →

name: TALIESIN
line: I want to look at the other rings she picked up, not that she's wearing right now. →

name: LAURA
line: They're right here. You can get a look at them! →

name: MATT
line: They're all over her fingers. →

name: TALIESIN
line: They are obviously rings from random dead people, aren't they? →

name: MATT
line: Yeah. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Okay. I'm just putting that together. →

name: LAURA
line: I play dinosaur fights. →

name: MATT
line: Gustav puts his hat on. "Yasha, be safe, and punch anyone who gets in your way." →

name: ASHLEY
line: I will. →

name: MATT
line: "Mollymauk, I hope you find what you're looking for." →

name: TALIESIN
line: I think I will. →

name: MATT
line: "To the new family, don't make the same mistakes your forefathers did. The rest of you, thank you." →

name: LAURA
line: (whispers) He said forefathers. →

name: SAM
line: (whispers) That's progressive. →

name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

name: MATT
line: "I bid you all adieu," and he exits. →

name: LAURA
line: What are you looking for, Molly? →

name: TALIESIN
line: Hmm, I'm not quite done with this one. →

name: TALIESIN
line: We'll see. →

name: ASHLEY
line: Toya. →

name: MATT
line: Bosun and Ornna stood up and Toya is there, "Yeah?" →

name: ASHLEY
line: What are your plans? What do you want to do? →

name: MATT
line: "I figure I'll just move on with Bo and Ornna and make a new show. Something with a little less death. That's what I'd like." →

name: LAURA
line: You should make your way to the Menagerie Coast. I think you guys would have a lot of success in Nicodranas. →

name: MATT
line: "I haven't been to Nicodranas." →

name: LAURA
line: It's beautiful. →

name: MATT
line: She looks up and tugs on the side of Bosun's sleeve. "You know, I actually haven't been there either." →

name: LAURA
line: They're always looking for good performers. →

name: LAURA
line: You would do well. →

name: MATT
line: "Hmm. Let's go ahead and make our way. That sounds like a nice change of pace, and this empire is getting a little stuffy for me anyway." →

name: MARISHA
line: I've bend down to Toya, and I take off one of the little jade bangles around my wrist, and I say, "Here. This will keep you safe from assholes named Beau. Except for that asshole, named Bo. He's a good Bo, but all other assholes named Beau." →

name: MATT
line: You watch as Ornna elbows him and is like, "Oh, no, he's an asshole too. It's fine." →

name: TALIESIN
line: It's true. →

name: MARISHA
line: Sorry. Sorry again about that. →

name: MATT
line: She takes it and goes, "It's okay. I know you did what you had to. But when I'm older, I'm going to get you back." →

name: MARISHA
line: You better. →

name: LAURA
line: Your first nemesis! →

name: MARISHA
line: My first nemesis! →

name: MATT
line: Is a twelve year old girl! (laughter) →

name: MARISHA
line: I give her a little chin (weak punch sound). →

name: TRAVIS
line: She goes unconscious. →

name: TRAVIS
line: (laughter) →

name: MARISHA
line: Aw, why? No! →

name: MATT
line: The three of them stand up and give a nod, wordlessly look over the rest of you with a smile of thanks, and Bosun looks to you and makes eye contact and goes, "Take care, brother. It gets tougher for us up north." →

name: TRAVIS
line: I'll keep that in mind. →

name: MATT
line: And they all leave the inn. →

name: ASHLEY
line: I mean, I'll say it. I don't know if you will, but I think that little girl is creepy. →

name: ASHLEY
line: (laughter) →

name: TALIESIN
line: Oh no, she's had a thing the entire time. There was a little while I thought she was in on it completely. →

name: ASHLEY
line: Yeah. →

name: LAURA
line: I mean, she might have been. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I've known her for years. I just assumed that she was in on it. →

name: LAURA
line: She could've been in on it, and just got right away with it. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Yeah. That would be great. →

name: LAURA
line: She's good. →

name: MARISHA
line: For her, yeah, I mean I got to give it to her, yeah. →

name: TALIESIN
line: You know, no matter what you pick, you're always welcome, right? →

name: ASHLEY
line: Yeah. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Wherever you end up. →

name: ASHLEY
line: Maybe for a little bit, but I've got some things I need do, so. →

name: LAURA
line: Do you guys want to travel with me and Fjord? →

name: ASHLEY
line: Where are you going, again? →

name: TRAVIS
line: Up north. Northeast to the Solstryce Academy. →

name: LIAM
line: Straight there. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Northeast. I've always wanted to go there. →

name: ASHLEY
line: Where's... where northeast? →

name: LAURA
line: (chuckles) →

name: SAM
line: We're here. →

name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

name: MATT
line: Well technically, you don't have a map. →

name: SAM
line: Oh, no. →

name: LAURA
line: We should really get a map, you guys. I haven't spent a lot of time in this area and I don't really know where we're going. →

name: TRAVIS
line: We're kind of going from town to town and asking as we go. Afraid we don't know too much. →

name: LAURA
line: I wonder if there's a place-- maybe at the general store? They would have a map? Or do you have to go to a map maker? →

name: TALIESIN
line: Traditionally, you have to go to a map maker. →

name: MATT
line: Traditionally but it can depend. →

name: TALIESIN
line: We might have a bit of something at the circus, I don't know. →

name: ASHLEY
line: I would love a map. →

name: LAURA
line: We'll go looking for things tomorrow. We can go shopping. →

name: ASHLEY
line: Okay. We'll go shopping with you. →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah. →

name: MARISHA
line: Where are you guys heading off to? Seems like people are making pretty big plans. →

name: TRAVIS
line: There's safety in numbers, you know? →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah. Took the words out of my mouth. →

name: LAURA
line: Nott, don't you want to travel with us, too? →

name: SAM
line: Um, is she coming? →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah, she just said she was. →

name: ASHLEY
line: Oh, are you scared of me? →

name: SAM
line: A little bit. You're very big. →

name: ASHLEY
line: Well, I thought you were Nott, the Brave? →

name: SAM
line: Oh. No, there's no comma. →

name: LAURA
line: (laughs) →

name: SAM
line: I'm just Nott the Brave. →

name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

name: LIAM
line: I don't know. You know, Nott and I have been travelling together for a while and two is better than one, although still very difficult. →

name: MARISHA
line: How long ago was it that you guys broke out of prison? →

name: LIAM
line: Uh... you know, it was six months ago, about. Five, six months ago. →

name: MARISHA
line: Damn, you guys are doing good. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Insight check. →

name: MATT
line: Against-- →

name: TALIESIN
line: Five or six months ago. →

name: MATT
line: Yeah. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh, that was so close. →

name: SAM
line: You have to roll, don't you? →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah. →

name: MATT
line: Roll either persuasion or deception. You can choose. Don't-- →

name: LIAM
line: I'll do persuasion. →

name: MATT
line: I mean, you don't have to say but you did. →

name: MATT
line: That's fine. →

name: LIAM
line: That's uh, I don't know where on my character sheet is. That's also a 14. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh. →

name: MATT
line: All right, so seems on the level. →

name: TALIESIN
line: All right. →

name: LAURA
line: (laughs) →

name: TRAVIS
line: Broke out of prison? That's very impressive. →

name: SAM
line: Well, it was mainly Caleb. We had to get out. →

name: SAM
line: I mean, it was a bad place. →

name: LAURA
line: Were they going to kill you? →

name: SAM
line: We would have died, for sure. →

name: ASHLEY
line: But you guys were there together? Because you knew each other before? →

name: LIAM
line: Well, first of all, she's being modest. It was not just me at all, I could not have gotten out of there without you. I don't think you could have gotten out of there without me either but you know. →

name: SAM
line: That's true, for sure. →

name: LIAM
line: That's why I said two. Better than one. One is the loneliest number. →

name: LAURA
line: That you'll ever see. →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah. →

name: MARISHA
line: There's nothing wrong with being alone. →

name: LIAM
line: You know, normally I wouldn't feel comfortable talking about shit like this but you are all very shifty. →

name: LAURA
line: I'm very trustworthy. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Thank you. →

name: LIAM
line: No, no, no, you're shifty as well. Yeah. →

name: TALIESIN
line: It's true. →

name: TRAVIS
line: In the short time we've spent with you, you seem to be very upstanding folks. I'm sure it wasn't for anything too serious. →

name: LIAM
line: No, nothing serious at all, really. I was too curious. She was maybe a little thirsty. You know, petty stuff. →

name: SAM
line: But they treated us very badly and we needed to get out of there. →

name: LIAM
line: We all know how this country works. →

name: MARISHA
line: And where was 'there'? →

name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah, is there anywhere we should stay away from on our travels? →

name: LIAM
line: (clears throat) →

name: SAM
line: Any place is-- I mean, we've been travelling around a bit but-- →

name: LIAM
line: You know, I wouldn't go west, maybe. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Northwest. →

name: SAM
line: I'm told east is bad too. There's monsters. →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah and they're pretty terrible in the north. That's no secret. →

name: LAURA
line: So we go south? →

name: SAM
line: Oh no, not south. →

name: SAM
line: (laughter) →

name: ASHLEY
line: It just depends where in the south, actually. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'd be happy keeping a bit of a low-key existence. →

name: LAURA
line: Well, I mean we are vigilantes so it's best if we, you know, have our secrets. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Some of us are a bit sketchy with the law. →

name: MARISHA
line: Yeah. →

name: LIAM
line: Mollymauk, you're comfortable leaving the circus? You are very-- you have a lot of flair. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Well, I figured if you're going to live your life, you're going to live your life. →

name: LAURA
line: (jingling) →

name: TALIESIN
line: Does do that. There's nothing wrong with living your life. You only get one of them, or mostly. And your days are going to be the days that you're going to have and I'd like to keep living my life the way I'd like to and keep off of certain radars. →

name: MARISHA
line: Cheers to that. →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah. Life does need things to live. →

name: LAURA
line: (laughter) →

name: TALIESIN
line: Stupid phrase. →

name: LIAM
line: That doesn't make any sense at all. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Really stupid. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Who said that? →

name: LIAM
line: I mean, it does but it blatantly obvious and simplistic. →

name: LIAM
line: (laughter) →

name: TALIESIN
line: That's just ridiculous. →

name: TALIESIN
line: (laughter) →

name: TALIESIN
line: That felt so good. That's catharsis. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Yasha, anywhere that we should avoid for you? →

name: ASHLEY
line: You know. I'm just-- I'll make my way wherever we go and maybe I'll not stay with you the whole time but I don't like, you know-- →

name: TRAVIS
line: Being confined. →

name: ASHLEY
line: Yeah. I don't-- groups and things-- →

name: MARISHA
line: Are you claustrophobic? →

name: ASHLEY
line: Uh, no. →

name: MARISHA
line: You mentioned the smaller cl--cramped space in the cell. Just curious. →

name: LAURA
line: Clamp space? →

name: MARISHA
line: Clamps-- clampy space. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Clam space. →

name: ASHLEY
line: I like to have my freedom. →

name: LIAM
line: I mean, technically this is a group. You mean groups bigger than this group or is this group too claustrophobic for you or-- ? →

name: ASHLEY
line: No. I don't mean it like that. I just want to make my own way sometimes. →

name: MARISHA
line: Not tied down to anything but that cloak, am I right? →

name: ASHLEY
line: (chuckles) Yeah, that's right. →

name: LAURA
line: Speaking of cloaks, mine smells really bad. →

name: SAM
line: It was on top of a head. Ugh, that's really gross. →

name: LAURA
line: I'm going to go try to find somewhere to wash it. →

name: MATT
line: Upstairs at the end of the hallway is a communal washroom. You can find space there. →

name: LAURA
line: Hey Caleb! →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah? →

name: LAURA
line: You know what's upstairs? (laughter) →

name: LAURA
line: This place where I'm going to go wash some stuff. You could use it. →

name: TALIESIN
line: You smell fine. →

name: LAURA
line: (chuckles) →

name: SAM
line: I like you just the way you are. →

name: LAURA
line: You're bloody now, too, in addition to being stinky. →

name: TALIESIN
line: You should probably get that patched up, actually, though. That is fair. →

name: LIAM
line: (clears throat) →

name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, I actually feel like you're starting to get a rash. →

name: MARISHA
line: (laughter) →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah, I'm good, thank you. →

name: LIAM
line: (laughter) →

name: TRAVIS
line: Damn right. →

name: TRAVIS
line: (laughter) →

name: MATT
line: All right. →

name: SAM
line: Well, I suppose we should all go to sleep and then if any of us are here in the morning, we'll set off together? →

name: TRAVIS
line: That seems fair. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm all right with that. Collect our things from-- my things, anyway, from the circus. →

name: TALIESIN
line: There should be some spares. →

name: LIAM
line: Do we have time to-- look at this, we're making plans with friends, that's amazing. Do we have for errands in the morning? I have a couple stops. Nothing major. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Take me a while to pack. →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah. →

name: MARISHA
line: You guys want me to tag along with you? →

name: TRAVIS
line: If you weren't too anxious to run off anywhere. →

name: MARISHA
line: (chuckles, clears throat) No. I'm free on my backpack tour. No plans. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Right. Any sightseeing we should schedule along our way? →

name: MARISHA
line: Maybe avoid Zadash just because I just came there, you know. Don't want to hit the same place twice. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Zadash? →

name: MARISHA
line: Yup. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Keep that in mind. →

name: TRAVIS
line: (laughter) →

name: TALIESIN
line: Note, note, note. →

name: MATT
line: As you guys are all finishing your drinks and standing up to leave the table, a familiar voice pipes in from the center of the tavern. →

name: MATT
line: "Beauregard?" →

name: MARISHA
line: (groans) →

name: MATT
line: And the Archivist who was there earlier during the trial in the stockade. "It's been difficult to find you. Do you mind if we speak?" →

name: MARISHA
line: Hey, Zeenoth! Hey. It's been all of about twenty minutes since I've seen you last. →

name: MATT
line: "Yes, um, would you walk with me? I believe we have much to discuss." →

name: MARISHA
line: Okay. →

name: MATT
line: "Don't worry. She'll be returned to you. →

name: MATT
line: Just--" →

name: TRAVIS
line: You all right with this? →

name: MARISHA
line: It's cool. I've got it. →

name: TALIESIN
line: We don't care. We're not that attached yet. →

name: LAURA
line: (laughs) →

name: MATT
line: "All right then. This way please, Beauregard." →

name: MARISHA
line: (sighs) →

name: MATT
line: The elvish man gives a bow and he seems jovial. →

name: MATT
line: (laughter) →

name: TALIESIN
line: More mine, more mine! →

name: MATT
line: Beau leaves and you guys are able to go about the rest of your evening to rest however you see fit. →

name: LIAM
line: Way up after Nott has gone, I go over to Norda. Is Norda down there? →

name: SAM
line: Yorda. →

name: LIAM
line: No, there's two people with rhyming names. →

name: MARISHA
line: Yorda is the bartender. →

name: MATT
line: Yorda is the bartender. →

name: LIAM
line: This is revenge for Vex and Vax. →

name: MATT
line: Yeah, and Purvon. →

name: LIAM
line: I find the purveyor of the establishment. →

name: MATT
line: Yorda. →

name: LIAM
line: Mork from Ork, that's what I said. →

name: MATT
line: "Right, what can I help you with?" →

name: LIAM
line: Excuse me, is there-- I know you have a bath here, but is there a hot bath place like a bathhouse? I'm bruised over every inch of my body and I'm in a lot of pain. →

name: MATT
line: "Right, that'll probably be in the Hillsward. It's a bit pricey, but I don't know if it's open this late." →

name: LIAM
line: I know, but how much are we talking about? →

name: MATT
line: "Oh, I'd put it maybe somewhere in the neighborhood of five silver for a bath." →

name: LIAM
line: That's expensive. →

name: MATT
line: "But you get bathed like proper, multiple people bathing you." →

name: LIAM
line: Northward, you say? →

name: MATT
line: "No, Hillsward." →

name: LIAM
line: Okay, good. →

name: MATT
line: "I mean, no offense to you. Their clientele is a bit, upper class." →

name: LIAM
line: I'm not worried. →

name: MATT
line: "Alright, fair enough." →

name: LIAM
line: Danke. And I head up there. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. Beau, as you exit with Zeenoth. As soon as you step into the night air, a second figure flanks your other side. The hooded figure from earlier that had caught you. →

name: MARISHA
line: I just look at Zeenoth and go really? Is this really necessary? →

name: MATT
line: "It is only because it's been so difficult to find you. I had to call in a favor. Please, come with us. We have a warehouse." →

name: MARISHA
line: Do we have to with this guy? He fucking-- look at him. He looks shifty. →

name: MATT
line: The head turns to you in the hood and you see dark elvish features. A bald head as the hood comes back. What looks to be a female elf of very lithe form who turns to you and goes, "Actually, it is a woman, but I'll ignore that." →

name: MARISHA
line: Sorry, you're super covered-- literally saw no features until right now. →

name: MATT
line: "It is fine." →

name: MARISHA
line: You're very attractive though. →

name: MARISHA
line: (laughter) →

name: MATT
line: And she walks ahead of you and the two of you begin to make your way there. They're guiding you towards the Northward and as you step into the dark following their lead, we're going to take a break. →

name: MATT
line: (cheering) →

name: MARISHA
line: I smell bad y'all. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Do you? →

name: MARISHA
line: Don't. You were like, oh my cape smells bad and I was like RPing and I like, ooh. →

name: MARISHA
line: (laughter) →

name: TALIESIN
line: Everybody at home, grab your ticket you got in the mail. Scratch off number three. →

name: TALIESIN
line: (laughter) →

name: MATT
line: We'll be back here in a few minutes. For those of you who want to enter the Wyrmwood giveaway, tonight it's a special Valentine's Day promotion from our friends at Wyrmwood. They have four types of dice vaults to choose from where they translate your Valentine Day's message in Elvish. →

name: MATT
line: (gasping) →

name: TRAVIS
line: Damn that shit glows! →

name: MATT
line: So you have some golden Evish stuff there. →

name: LAURA
line: It's pretty and you can choose the wood. →

name: LIAM
line: The writing only shows up if you throw it in fire. →

name: LIAM
line: (laughter) →

name: MATT
line: Don't listen to Liam. To whoever is the winner of this or any of these, they'll go ahead and get you the contact information for Wyrmwood so they can customize your phrase. If you want to be part of this giveaway over the break, make sure to use the keyword toad. T-O-A-D in the chatroom. →

name: MATT
line: There's also apparently an anti-Valentine's Day Drow vault they do as well. It's pretty cool. →

name: MATT
