line: At this point, you guys can see more people are fleeing. As you get closer, about 100 feet outside the city, you watch as the droves of people are beginning to get-- at least either the ones that are actively fleeing have made it out of the city, or in the process the stragglers are still coming through. You see a young human man with scrappy, tattered brown hair, a bit of blood dripping down his face, running before his back arches and he falls into the grass. You can see an arrow protruding from his back. At that point, you can see, standing up from behind one of the exterior walls of the city, a humanoid creature stretching up to about seven feet tall, muscular torso with thin dog-like legs. You watch as it extends its neck with spots of fur, its ears curled upwards as it has a dog-like snout at the front of it. →

name: LAURA
line: Werewolves! →

name: MATT
line: You watch as it leaps onto the back of this fallen villager, bites into the shoulder, and tears a chunk out. Swallows it before it growls into the air (yipping howl). →

name: LAURA
line: Is that a werehyena? →

name: SAM
line: Have we seen these things before? →

name: MATT
line: You have. You've encountered a roving band of these on your way southward. →

name: LAURA
line: What is it? →

name: SAM
line: I think they're-- well, we don't know what they're called. We just fought them. I don't know what they're called; we fought one before! →

name: LAURA
line: You know how to kill them? →

name: SAM
line: You just hurt them until they die. →

name: MATT
line: It swallows the flesh, grabs the body, and then darts back into the city, dragging the corpse of the villager it's just killed with it rapidly. →

name: TALIESIN
line: That's weird. →

name: LIAM
line: Is it a walled-in city or just parts here and there? →

name: MATT
line: No. They're small and waist high, and shoulder high walls that are partitions here and there, but it's largely a farming city. →

name: LIAM
line: Not fortified at all? →

name: MATT
line: No, not at all. →

name: LAURA
line: Is he within range to hit with a spell? →

name: MATT
line: No, he's about-- well, depends on the spell. →

name: MATT
line: Right now he's about 200 feet from you and he's running into the city. You can see the flames are further in but you can see the orange glow flickering in the distance. →

name: MARISHA
line: Can I do a quick scan and see if I see more? →

name: MATT
line: Perception check. →

name: MARISHA
line: Don't fuck this up. That's okay, 17. →

name: MATT
line: 17. In the immediate vicinity, you do not. →

name: MATT
line: You see more people from the village starting to run out, screaming. You see a handful of crownsguard come out, one of them looks wounded and is, "To the north. Where are they coming from?" You see the two of them dart off northward into the city. What are you guys doing? →

name: TRAVIS
line: I chase after the crownsguard. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. →

name: LAURA
line: Go after the one that stole the guy. →

name: MARISHA
line: We'll go after the one that stole the guy. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Is this making my spider sense tingle, can I track them? →

name: MATT
line: No. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Okay. →

name: MATT
line: You get the sense, at the moment, there's no active idea that these would be considered a creature that would draw your attention. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Okay, all right. →

name: MATT
line: Are you leaving the cart there, on the outskirts? →

name: TRAVIS
line: Yes. →

name: LIAM
line: We leave the toilet behind and we run in. →

name: MATT
line: All right, as you go charging into the city, you're pushing past fleeing villagers and you can see some of the buildings now have been locked shut. You can see faintly through the windows furniture being boarded up from the inside. People are hunkering down for whatever this assault is. →

name: MATT
line: As you enter, you see the crownsguard went northward but the one creature that you saw charge in went straight towards the heart. Right now you can see there's two main streets that bisect this small village. There's one that goes at an angle, northwest to southeast. One that goes right towards the center, west to east. As you head towards the center you can see the flames are more near that central square. As you guys begin to run, push past a few more people, the smoke is starting to billow up and you can see now there's embers rising and then falling. This very faint ashy rain of small points of reddish-orange light that begin to fall with the ash. As you turn around one of the buildings, there's one of the side walls and four crownsguard all ducked down behind the wall with crossbows and longbows, all back behind it. You can see one that's adorned with more ornate armor. You see a person there with elven features, but hint at a mixed lineage. They have their helmet on the ground, showing shoulder-length blond hair that's turned red in places from a spattering of gore. Through gritted teeth they curse in pain as the bandages are applied to what you can see is a wound right around the midsection in the thigh area. Another soldier is in the process of wrapping it. You watch as they go, "Gah! You fool, bind the wound, don't stuff it." Goes and they pull a bolt back into the crossbow and nock it at the ready. →

name: MATT
line: Glancing up and seeing you approach, they scan past you-- most of you now with weapons at the ready, it seems, charging forward. "You!" You suddenly have an array of arrows, about five or six, come over the wall. One of them manages to pierce the back of one of the crownsguards' heads and falls and crumples to the ground. They all get lower again. You hear in the distance (growling yips). →

name: MATT
line: The individual looks back to you. "You, are you able-bodied?" →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah. →

name: SAM
line: Very. →

name: MATT
line: "And you're armed." →

name: TRAVIS
line: We are. →

name: MATT
line: "30 gold a gnoll ear. Now get in there and help." →

name: TRAVIS
line: A gnoll? →

name: MARISHA
line: 30 gold a gnoll ear? →

name: LAURA
line: For each one? How many are there? →

name: TRAVIS
line: Just go get them. →

name: MATT
line: They give you a look like-- "Just go!" →

name: LAURA
line: I just don't want to get overwhelmed is all. →

name: MARISHA
line: Nott and Jester, do you guys have ways to block arrows? →

name: MATT
line: (whoosh) Two of them glace up and fire two crossbow bolts over the wall and duck back behind. →

name: MATT
line: You hear a heavy smashing of wood, some more barks and gibbering echoing around the way. You can see now flames curling up to the top of the building that you're all right next to, before the small wall that bisects the entryway. →

name: LAURA
line: I have a shield. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I start one of my swords on the back of my neck. →

name: LIAM
line: We are sitting ducks here. What do we do, Fjord? →

name: TRAVIS
line: It's all on the other side of a wall? →

name: MATT
line: Correct. →

name: MARISHA
line: Let's go towards the wall. →

name: MATT
line: To give you perspective now. →

name: SAM
line: Oh. This'll help. Hey side note: where's my fucking wine? →

name: LAURA
line: Did you leave it? →

name: TRAVIS
line: You mean your water? →

name: MARISHA
line: Did you leave it outside? →

name: SAM
line: Is it gone? →

name: MARISHA
line: No, it's just on the table. →

name: LAURA
line: Whoa! Oh my gosh. Where are we? →

name: MATT
line: You guys-- →

name: LAURA
line: This is so cool. Look at that flame on the side of the roof. →

name: MATT
line: You are all right over this side area, corner. Arrange yourself as you feel you wish to be. Over there on the far end of the village. →

name: SAM
line: Oh wow. What a cool map. →

name: MATT
line: If you wish to, you can place yourselves where you wish or show me where you want them to go. →

name: LIAM
line: I would be pressed against the wall of that house. →

name: MATT
line: Right here? →

name: LAURA
line: Before I ran over here, I'm going to Caleb. →

name: LAURA
line: I'll hit you on the shoulder and say, bless you. →

name: LAURA
line: And I'm going to give you Blessing of the Trickster just in case you want to stealth because you're squishy, yo. →

name: LIAM
line: Okay, so I have advantage on stealth? →

name: LAURA
line: Yes. →

name: LIAM
line: Thank you. →

name: MARISHA
line: I'll be with Jester. →

name: SAM
line: The enemies are just all over that direction, right? →

name: MATT
line: With what little bit you've looked over to the side you can see there are some up on the rooftops in the distance. You can see their dark figures silhouetted by flames, and other bits of light that normally fill the streets in the center of the city. Most you can see are these up here and you can already see a few bodies of guards and civilians that are lying on the ground, carved open and not moving. You see spatters of blood. →

name: MATT
line: You still hear them barking and giving orders next to each other (rabid barking). →

name: LAURA
line: How far away are the ones on the roof? How long is the distance from us? →

name: MATT
line: Over here? At this distance it's hard to say. I'd say probably in the neighborhood of about 70 to 80 feet from you. You guys, I would like, if you are trying to stay out of sight, make a stealth check, please. Those of you with a point of exhaustion, you have disadvantage. →

name: MARISHA
line: Natural 19. →

name: LAURA
line: Six. →

name: SAM
line: So revealing-- →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah, well, I'm exhausted. →

name: MATT
line: That's okay. As a group, for the moment you guys haven't drawn their attention. You're still right next to where there are crownsguard who are in the process of a firefight with whatever is in this vicinity of the city. However, you may or may not make it through, for the moment, unseen. You're not certain how many there are. But you can hear a lot of yipping and growling right around this large, two-story building that is currently engulfed in flames. →

name: SAM
line: I have an idea. We need to move away from here, right, Fjord? →

name: TRAVIS
line: We do. We have to use the cover of the buildings. →

name: SAM
line: All right, I think I can do something that would make them fire many of their arrows at something, but not us. Should I do that and then as soon as they fire their arrows we can run? →

name: TRAVIS
line: Diversions are absolutely-- →

name: SAM
line: Diversions! That's what it's called, it's a diversion. All right, may I move, is that a thing? →

name: MATT
line: You may, you're stealthed currently. →

name: SAM
line: I take out a bit of fleece, and repeating the words and doing the hand gestures that I've been taught and tracing the image of a creature on the fleece, I will make a Silent Image of the guard who told us 30 gold a gnoll. I'm going to have the image of that guard dash across, slowly, dash across this alleyway. Like that way. →

name: LIAM
line: Maybe amble more than dash. →

name: SAM
line: Yes, not dash, just walk in a way that he could be easily shot. →

name: MATT
line: Interesting point of order, you're not too certain of the gender of this individual, kind of fluid. →

name: SAM
line: Okay, great, that long-haired guard individual. →

name: MATT
line: There you go. As the figure leaps over the wall and begins making a run towards the center area, about four different arrows pass through its form before one of these gnoll creatures goes lumbering forward and slashes out to it. This gnoll, interestingly enough-- the other ones you see and the one you saw before the city are all built and muscular. This one seems to be porous. →

name: MATT
line: With a brief bit of view, you can see there's clumps of fur and exposed bone and part of its skull is just pushing out of its snout with teeth gnashing. As it tears into the illusion, it claws through, confused, and looks over in your direction. →

name: MATT
line: As you're finishing drawing your blade across your back, what normally would be cold energy suddenly flickers into this beacon of bright white light. →

name: SAM
line: Ooh, nice. →

name: MATT
line: Something clicks in your mind and you're like, "Oh, I know you." →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm preparing. How close am I to this thing? →

name: MATT
line: This entity would be here now. It would have just left out into that section there. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Does it see us? →

name: MATT
line: It does now. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm going to use Vicious Mockery at it, really quickly. →

name: MATT
line: All right. →

name: LAURA
line: Can I invoke Duplicity? →

name: MATT
line: You may. I'm giving you all one round preparation before we roll initiative. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah, I was going to say, we're in it. →

name: TRAVIS
line: This is a fight. So anything you want to do now, do it. →

name: LIAM
line: I mutter a few words and my form starts to blink in and out of view. There is another Caleb next to me and another Caleb next to me. Shifting, blinking, flashing back and forth and it's hard to see where I am. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. Is that concentration? →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah, it is. →

name: MATT
line: All right, I'm going to put a concentration marker on you just so we remember it. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Can I also, knowing that we're probably going to be up close, danger close, I'm going to cast Armor of Agathys on myself. You see a spectral frost start to harden around my armor in a shimmering light. →

name: MATT
line: That's cool. So that's you. That's you. →

name: MATT
line: You're going to Vicious Mockery. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm going to use Vicious Mockery. I'm going to look at him with my eyes glowing, and my sword glowing, and in Infernal say, (rasping) The light comes to blind your eyes and burn your flesh. Yeah, 1d4. →

name: MATT
line: He rolled a 13 minus three. I believe it's wisdom, correct? →

name: TALIESIN
line: Yeah, it's a wisdom saving throw. →

name: MATT
line: I'm pretty sure that's a ten and that does not make your DC. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Yup, so he takes three psychic damage and he has disadvantage on his next attack roll. →

name: MATT
line: Yes. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm going to use my bonus action-- yeah, fuck it, let's go for it-- I'm going to activate both swords. →

name: MATT
line: You drag the other edge of your blade-- →

name: TALIESIN
line: Should I? Yeah. →

name: MATT
line: You've taken a total of six damage and your max HP is down by six. But you have currently the new invoked Rite on each blade. →

name: LAURA
line: Can I use my bonus action really fast? →

name: MATT
line: You may. →

name: LAURA
line: To say a little pray to the Traveler, and I'm going to cast Spiritual Weapon. →

name: MATT
line: You may do that. Where are you going to cast it? →

name: LAURA
line: I'm going to cast it right above this zombie gnoll. It's going to be in the shape of a giant lollipop. Like a bludgeoning lollipop. →

name: MATT
line: You watch as this flash of purplish energy suddenly apparates into the air. This thick-like wooden handle that is jammed into a massive, bludgeoning, solid piece of sugary goodness. →

name: LAURA
line: Yes! →

name: LIAM
line: The old fashioned swirly kind? →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah! →

name: MATT
line: With that, you can make an attack with that as soon as it comes out. Make a melee spell attack, please. →

name: LAURA
line: Okay, 17? →

name: MATT
line: 17 does hit. →

name: LAURA
line: Ooh, seven. Seven radiant damage. →

name: MATT
line: Seven radiant damage, nice. As it strikes down, wham! From the creature, already watching its bones and its form shakes-- →

name: LAURA
line: Oh wait, oh wait, oh wait, I was looking at the wrong spell, hold on. Oh, 1d8 plus three! Seven plus three-- Ten! →

name: MATT
line: Ten. Oh, that'll be enough. You watch as it pulls back with the Infernal shouting of Mollymauk causing it to prepare itself for a lunge. As it gets low, its jaw snapping open, you watch as bits of its skin fall onto the ground as it does so (snarl). And right before it leaps, (wham) it just smashes it into the ground and its bones go flying and scattering in every which direction. →

name: ALL
line: Oh! →

name: TRAVIS
line: Is that one of the were-thingies? Damn! →

name: LAURA
line: That ear is mine! →

name: MATT
line: All right, so Beau, what are you doing? You all have one round of prep. Right now, you've gone-- →

name: SAM
line: I cast a spell. Can I also move? →

name: MATT
line: You can move, yeah. →

name: SAM
line: As soon as the arrows flew by, I'm going to dash across the alley. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. →

name: LAURA
line: And I'm going to send my duplicate after her. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. You're running that way? →

name: SAM
line: Yep. As far as I can go. →

name: MATT
line: All right. And you send your duplicate over there as well? →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah. →

name: MATT
line: All righty. And Beau? →

name: MARISHA
line: I'm also going to use my speed to dash across. I can move 40. Can I peek into this window and see if I can see anything in here? →

name: MATT
line: Sure. Easy to see in this perspective. You glance inside-- →

name: MARISHA
line: Stealthily? →

name: MATT
line: All right. As you glance inside, you can just barely see around the corner. The place is tossed. It is shattered and ruined. It looks like it was once the interior of a small tavern of some kind, but the kitchen is wrecked and you can see two of these gnolls are in the process of grabbing large sacks out of the kitchen and pulling them out through the front door on the opposite side of the building. →

name: MARISHA
line: Oh shit. Okay. I turn to Nott. I go-- →

name: SAM
line: Look at two unicorns inside? →

name: MARISHA
line: The gnolls! →

name: SAM
line: They're inside the--? →

name: MARISHA
line: Shh. →

name: MATT
line: I would like you all now to roll initiative. →

name: MARISHA
line: Natural 20. →

name: ALL
line: Whoa. →

name: MARISHA
line: That's the second one of the night. →

name: SAM
line: Oh wait, is this an ability check? →

name: MATT
line: Yes, so these are with disadvantage. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh, really? →

name: LIAM
line: Oh, scheiß. →

name: MARISHA
line: No good? →

name: LIAM
line: That was worse. →

name: MARISHA
line: Oh no. →

name: TRAVIS
line: (German accent) That was worse. →

name: LIAM
line: That was already bad. →

name: LAURA
line: Initiative is an ability? →

name: MATT
line: It is. →

name: LAURA
line: Are attack rolls? →

name: SAM
line: No. →

name: LAURA
line: Okay. Did I already ask that? →

name: SAM
line: Nope. Don't worry, though; I touched all your dice, so they're going to roll great tonight. →

name: LAURA
line: Thanks. Thanks, Sam. →

name: TALIESIN
line: He may have licked a couple of them. →

name: LAURA
line: Can you lick this one? →

name: MATT
line: 25 to 20, anybody? →

name: LAURA
line: I'm going to put it back over here. I'm going to try it. Maybe it'll roll really well with your spit on it. →

name: TALIESIN
line: It's a very pretty die. →

name: LAURA
line: It's so pretty, right? →

name: MATT
line: 16. All righty. 15 to ten? →

name: TALIESIN
line: Nine. Oh, nope, never mind, yeah. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Wow, guys. Wow. →

name: LIAM
line: Mm-hmm. →

name: MATT
line: All right, ten to five. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Nine. →

name: LAURA
line: Seven. →

name: LIAM
line: Six. →

name: MATT
line: Okay, so that order. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I want them to get a little closer anyway. They're all far. →

name: LIAM
line: It's all part of the plan. →

name: LAURA
line: Mm-hmm. →

name: TALIESIN
line: It's going to go great. →

name: MATT
line: Molly, then Jester. Then Caleb? →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah. →

name: SAM
line: And Nott. →

name: LIAM
line: What'd you get? →

name: SAM
line: Six. →

name: LIAM
line: Oh, all together at last. →

name: MATT
line: All righty, so. Top of the round, as some of this has happened. The one gnoll skeletal form has shattered onto the ground. Some of the other gnolls begin to look over in that direction, and see a few of you over by the guards now, standing up and darting over the way. They're preparing for some sort of... whatever's coming. But first of the round is you, Beau. →

name: MARISHA
line: I turn to Nott. →

name: SAM
line: Huh!? →

name: MARISHA
line: Hey, you want to take these guys? You ready for this? →

name: SAM
line: (panicked stuttering) I'm going to drink from my flask. →

name: MARISHA
line: Get ready. I want them to come to this window, okay? I'm going to go (whistles) through the window. Try and get their attention. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. →

name: LAURA
line: Right there? →

name: MATT
line: Make a performance check. →

name: MARISHA
line: To whistle? Not great. Not great at all. →

name: MARISHA
line: Three. →

name: MATT
line: All right. The whistle has a bit of volume to it. Unfortunately, with the sound of all the breaking of furniture, them all growling at each other, and the general screams in the vicinity, it's lost in the chaos. It's not necessarily a quiet atmosphere to draw a guard's attention. The gnolls don't seem to care much for a whistle around the window. They're more focused on grabbing and running out the front, other way, with whatever they're taking. →

name: MARISHA
line: Is that my action or a bonus action? →

name: MATT
line: I'll let that be like a bonus action, we'll say. →

name: MARISHA
line: Bonus action. →

name: MATT
line: Because you were waiting for something to happen. →

name: LIAM
line: Mercer-ful. →

name: MARISHA
line: Shit. Going in! I jump through the window, and before one of them leaves, I'm going to crack them with the staff right over the head. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. With a 40-foot movement, that brings you-- →

name: MARISHA
line: Can I go in through the window? →

name: MATT
line: You do. As you go through the window, because they've mostly shifted into the other room now; that's where you see them moving. They're not in the room that's closest to you, so you go jump through the window, over the mass, make your way through the living room, and you watch as they're exiting the door. You get all the way through. →

name: MARISHA
line: I thought it was much closer than that. →

name: MATT
line: Unfortunately, no. But you do manage to make it all the way to this door there. →

name: MARISHA
line: Oh! They're going out the back door. I thought they were going out that way! →

name: MATT
line: Nope! →

name: MARISHA
line: Okay. →

name: MATT
line: Is that still what you want to do? →

name: MARISHA
line: That's bad disadvantage. Fog of war. →

name: MATT
line: Well, here's what you do. As you rush through to go after them, as they're fleeing out the other side, you come to the doorway and you can see there's one gnoll right in front of you that hasn't noticed you rushing behind it. It's currently throwing a corpse of one of the villagers onto a cart that's sitting right outside of that door. That cart, which is piled up with other corpses, and bags, and whatever things they were robbing from the inside of this building that they've thrown onto this cart. You can now see there's four gnolls that are gathered around it in the process of throwing things onto it, and it looks like they're getting ready to start pushing it. They haven't noticed your arrival, as you've just darted into the doorway. What are you going to do? →

name: MARISHA
line: Okay, I'm going to double ba-- Ah, I can't move anymore, can I? →

name: MATT
line: No, that was your move to get there. →

name: MARISHA
line: I'm going to spend a ki point and do Patient Defense. →

name: MATT
line: Well, as your action you can just go into it without having to spend a ki point. →

name: MARISHA
line: Oh, really? →

name: MATT
line: Because you already used your bonus action. →

name: MATT
line: The ki point allows you to do it as a bonus action, but you can just do it as an action any time. →

name: MARISHA
line: Ooh. Great, I'll do that. →

name: MATT
line: You just go into the dodge action. →

name: MARISHA
line: I'll just hold back and wait. →

name: MATT
line: Right, so you're holding back in the doorway, and you're ready to use the door to help defend you if it needs to. Okay, that ends Beau's turn. It's now their turn. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Oh, shit, already? Oh god. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Yeah, this is what was coming. →

name: MATT
line: They rolled really high in the initiative. →

name: TRAVIS
line: What are we calling these things? →

name: ALL
line: Gnolls. →

name: LIAM
line: G-N-O-L-L. →

name: MARISHA
line: I thought I was going to still be a lot closer to Nott. →

name: LIAM
line: (sings) G-N-O-L-L. →

name: LAURA
line: (sings) K-N-O-L-L →

name: MATT
line: Visibly off to the side, there is... →

name: SAM
line: N-O-L-L? →

name: MATT
line: Yeah, that's going to be two of them firing their bow-- Actually, no, three, because they watched you come out. There's three of them that are going to be firing their bows at Beau. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh no! →

name: SAM
line: Beau, bow, Beau, and bow? →

name: LIAM
line: Bobobo-bo bo-bobo. →

name: MATT
line: They all have disadvantage on the attack, however. →

name: SAM
line: She's in Patient Defense; she's going to be fine. →

name: MATT
line: As this one fires off in the direction of your duplicitous form, as it disappears through. →

name: MATT
line: As it's the only thing it can visually see. It's going to stay behind the wall. That's three attacks at disadvantage against Beau. →

name: MARISHA
line: And they all have disadvantage. →

name: MATT
line: They do. →

name: MARISHA
line: Because I did Patient Defense? →

name: SAM
line: You're going to be fine. →

name: MATT
line: First one with a longbow, that's a 15? →

name: MARISHA
line: Miss. →

name: MATT
line: Right. Misses. The first one, you watch as it just moves past you and slams into the door. →

name: MATT
line: The next one, from this guy up here-- →

name: MARISHA
line: I immediately go: whoops. →

name: MATT
line: That's a 12 and a two. The other one misses into the wall. This one over here is going to fire at you. That's a 16 and a 14, plus three, 17. →

name: MARISHA
line: 17 is my armor class. →

name: MATT
line: The first two: one hits the door; the other one, you duck out of the way; and the third one comes and it's piercing right towards your chest. →

name: MATT
line: It's going to deal 2d8, seven points of piercing damage. →

name: MARISHA
line: Okay. I'm going to use Deflect Missiles for my reaction. →

name: MATT
line: Oh, right! Because you got that for your-- Okay. As a reaction, you watch this one arrow that you can't quite duck out of the way-- →

name: MARISHA
line: (grunting exertions) →

name: MATT
line: All right. So go ahead and make the roll. →

name: MARISHA
line: But it's not super-- I'm still level three, so it's more like a cat swat. →

name: MATT
line: Yeah, you're trying to swat it and see if you can carry the momentum with it. →

name: MARISHA
line: That is seven on the dice, plus seven, 14. →

name: MATT
line: You reduce the damage to zero and you catch it. →

name: SAM
line: Whoa. →

name: MATT
line: If you want to, you can spend a ki point to throw it, if you want to. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Oh! Throw that shit! →

name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, let's do it! Just because I can! →

name: MATT
line: All right, where are you throwing it to? →

name: TRAVIS
line: In the foot. →

name: LIAM
line: At the bitch who attacked you. →

name: SAM
line: Or the guy in front of you. →

name: MARISHA
line: I'm going to do it at the guy in front of me, who's right behind me. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. →

name: MARISHA
line: So I'm going to catch it, and I'm going to spin around in a full flourish, and I'm going to just throw it like a Gambit card with the momentum that it's got. →

name: MATT
line: All right, so as you grab it, you spin around and throw it. Go ahead and make the attack roll. →

name: MARISHA
line: What's the attack roll? →

name: MATT
line: It should be your-- →

name: MARISHA
line: What is it? I've never done this before! →

name: MATT
line: I know. This is new. →

name: MARISHA
line: It's brand new! →

name: MATT
line: Here we go. You just make a ranged attack with it, so roll a d20, add your dexterity modifier and your proficiency modifier, so same as any of your other attacks, because it counts as a monk weapon. →

name: MARISHA
line: Okay, 16. →

name: MATT
line: 16 hits. It takes 1d8, so roll 1d8, plus two. →

name: MARISHA
line: Four. Four damage total. →

name: MATT
line: All right. I wonder, does it add your damage bonus to it, or the original weapon, because it is your strength throwing it back. Pardon me, folks, while we're figuring out new abilities they can use. →

name: MARISHA
line: You make the attack with proficiency and the missile counts as a monk weapon for the attack. →

name: MATT
line: It is your attack, so you get to add your dex bonus. →

name: MARISHA
line: So six total. →

name: MATT
line: All right, so six points of damage. You watch as the arrow just sinks into the chest of its thick hide armor. (snarling) →

name: MARISHA
line: I go: Hah! Ooh. →

name: MATT
line: The other ones that are throwing stuff onto the cart hear this commotion and turn around and look at you. Three of them continue just throwing stuff onto the cart faster, while the one that's immediately in front of you spins around and stands tall. You can see it looking down at you a full foot and a half, almost two feet taller than you. →

name: MATT
line: (snarling) It's going to go ahead and grabs a spear off the side of the wall that it had leaning against and it's going to try to thrust it at you. →

name: MATT
line: It still has disadvantage on the attack, though, because you're in your stance. That's 16. →

name: MARISHA
line: Miss. →

name: MATT
line: This one, as it goes and thrusts with the spear, coming off of the adrenaline of the deflected missile, you duck low, and then kick the spear up, which slams into the top of the door frame and completely misses you. He's now stepping into the door frame, completely filling it as you're backing up into your space, and the two of you are in this very intense, small, occupied block. →

name: MARISHA
line: And I go: no, seriously dude, did you see that?! →

name: TRAVIS
line: My legs are jumping around like crazy right now. →

name: MATT
line: These guys are going to begin pushing the cart and it's going to move at half their movement to there. This one here is going to move up to here, right around the side of this wall, and it's going to take its longbow and fire at you, because you're the one they can see. →

name: MARISHA
line: That's fair. →

name: MATT
line: Disadvantage. That is a 15. →

name: MARISHA
line: Miss. →

name: MATT
line: This one, actually, you see over at the fire, and you grab the front of the armor of the gnoll and pull his in front of you, and it actually hits the back of his armor, splintering it, and the smell hits you. →

name: MARISHA
line: I just go, excuse me for a second. Thank you. →

name: MATT
line: As you let him go, there's this thick, oily, horrible liquid that's matted in the fur, and the touch of it's nasty. The smell itself is very acrid of rotting flesh and mangy fur. That's going to end all those guys there, they're pushing there. All right, that ends the gnolls' turn. →

name: MATT
line: Fjord, you're up. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah, okay. With my 30 feet of movement, can I wrap around the far side of the house and just get to cover of the corner? →

name: MATT
line: That's exactly where you can get. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Now there is an individual over there that sucks, right? →

name: MATT
line: Correct. You see it has a longbow and is currently reaching back and it's pulling another arrow and getting it notched up. →

name: TRAVIS
line: I beg for forgiveness, I'm going to try some shit. I would like to cast-- →

name: MARISHA
line: We're all trying some shit, it's okay. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Crown of Madness. →

name: TRAVIS
line: (cheering) →

name: MATT
line: All righty, so what's the save on that one? →

name: TRAVIS
line: It is wisdom saving throw, I believe, let me double-check. Yeah, wisdom saving throw. →

name: MATT
line: No, that's an eight. I'm pretty sure that does not hit. →

name: TRAVIS
line: So he becomes charmed, and a jagged crown of iron appears around his head, and madness glows in its eye. →

name: MATT
line: That's concentration, correct? →

name: TRAVIS
line: Yes, it is. →

name: MATT
line: I'm putting a concentration circle on you. →

name: MATT
line: All righty, the charmed target must use its action before moving each of its turns to make a melee attack against a creature other than itself you mentally choose. So it has to be a melee attack. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Oh, melee. Fucking shit, I saw the bows. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Damn the words in this book! →

name: MATT
line: That's okay. →

name: MATT
line: (laughter) →

name: TRAVIS
line: But I can make him move towards something, right? →

name: MATT
line: That you can. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Okay, good. I'm going to have him climb up on that roof and attack that other fucking gnoll that's up on that son of a bitch. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. Since it has to use its action before its movement, you watch as it looks up at the top of the roof, (snarling) and leaps up, climbs, scampers up to the side, and gets right up into base to base with this guy, confusing the other gnoll, who looks down at it, like it's about to help him, and it doesn't seem to notice there's any sort of threat there, but it can't make an attack on this round. →

name: TRAVIS
line: That's fair. Can I use my bonus action to use my Mask of Many Faces to make myself look like a gnoll? No, they're taller. They're too tall. →

name: MATT
line: Well, they're medium, they're not-- →

name: TRAVIS
line: Two feet taller, I can only do a foot taller or shorter. →

name: MATT
line: It's cutting it close, you'd look like a small gnoll. →

name: TRAVIS
line: I'd like to do it. →

name: LAURA
line: A teeny gnoll. →

name: MARISHA
line: He's the runt. →

name: MATT
line: You are visible to a number of gnolls in this courtyard. You don't have any movement to back away from that edge, unfortunately. →

name: TRAVIS
line: I was hoping to just be-- Because I can't see that far-- to be right here to hit the only guy that could see me on the ground there. →

name: MATT
line: Right, but you're right on the corner, that's how you were able to see him and send him this way. →

name: TRAVIS
line: The guy on the roof can see me as well? →

name: MATT
line: Yeah, they can both see you. Just so you know. The rest of them probably can't, but you transform yourself into a gnoll-like appearance. →

name: MATT
line: All right. Does that end your turn? →

name: TRAVIS
line: That is it. →

name: MATT
line: All righty. In the back of the alleyway, one of the gnolls stands thicker, more angry, and more ornate than the rest of the pack. You see heavy scale mail armor across the torso, and a large helmet across its head. You look as thick spines about a foot and a half to two feet long are woven into the scales themselves off the shoulders, the back of the helmet, and the sides of the armor. →

name: MATT
line: They look natural, as opposed to metal, like long, bony spines that are put onto it, both as an ornate adornment, or possibly just a means of defense and to look scary. It begins barking and steps forward, giving motions to some of the other gnolls, and the ones that are on the cart continue pushing it, as it steps forward-- →

name: LAURA
line: Oh no. →

name: MATT
line: To there. →

name: TRAVIS
line: I should have used it on that fucker. →

name: MATT
line: It's going to go ahead and use-- →

name: SAM
line: Is that a crownsguard? →

name: LAURA
line: No, he's like a Grandmaster gnoll. →

name: SAM
line: No, the guy next to him. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh. I feel like that's a zombie gnoll. →

name: MATT
line: It's going to use Incite Rampage. →

name: SAM
line: Oof, what does that mean? →

name: MATT
line: It looks over towards the one that's right next to Beau and goes, (snarling). The one that's in the middle of the area with you hears that, grins, and then gets an extra attack against you, with disadvantage. And a four. That defense is helping you out. It goes to strike again, and as it comes out with its claw, it's putting its spear to the side. →

name: MARISHA
line: I do a little duck. →

name: MATT
line: It misses you entirely. That's going to end its turn at the moment. Then it goes to the guards on this end. These guards are going to fan out. →

name: TRAVIS
line: (raspy voice) Hey, come on, let's go. →

name: MATT
line: Then they dart back around this way. They're going to find a corner next to you, Jester, and take a shot at the gnoll that's up on the roof, next to the one that you have charmed. Shit, that's going to miss. Five plus five. He fires and it goes wide, you see it vanish into the rising cloud of embers and flame. That's going to end the guards' turn. They're getting around and preparing for the next round to shoot a volley. →

name: LAURA
line: I pat him on the shoulder and say: don't worry, nobody saw that. →

name: MATT
line: They glance over their shoulder and is like, "Shh!" Molly, you're up. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm going to take a run. Am I going to do this? Am I going to be this idiot? Yeah, let's be an idiot. I'm going to take a run to try to get cover at the other house. I'm going to try to run across the alleyway. →

name: MATT
line: This way? →

name: TALIESIN
line: Yeah. →

name: LAURA
line: Dashy-dash? →

name: TALIESIN
line: Dashy-dash. →

name: MATT
line: (counting) It will put you at about there. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Yeah. →

name: MATT
line: But that's your round. →

name: TALIESIN
line: That's my round. I just (zooming). →

name: MATT
line: Cool. All righty. That ends Molly's turn. →

name: MATT
line: Jester, you're up. →

name: LAURA
line: Okie dokie. I'm going to send my duplicate out against the wall on this house. →

name: MATT
line: Over here? →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah. Against that wall. She can go up to 30 feet. And I'm going to run across-- →

name: MATT
line: That space? →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah, can I get against the wall further in? Yeah, right there, that's good. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. That's your turn? You still have an action. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh yeah, I'm going to use my bonus action-- →

name: MATT
line: You currently cannot see anything for it to attack. You need to be able to see a target for it to attack something. So you'd have to be either further out. You can do it as part of your movement, as you run across, make it move and attack, and then continue back-- →

name: LAURA
line: As I'm running, can I use my spiritual weapon and-- →

name: MATT
line: Can you move it 20 feet? →

name: LAURA
line: I think it's 30 feet. Let's see. 20 feet. →

name: LAURA
line: You're right, I'm sorry. 20 feet. →

name: MATT
line: Which direction? →

name: LAURA
line: Towards the giant guy and hit him! →

name: MATT
line: Make a roll. →

name: LAURA
line: Hit him with the rock! 15. →

name: MATT
line: 15 unfortunately does not hit. →

name: LAURA
line: Boo! →

name: MATT
line: It just misses, you watch as the shield comes up and deflects the large glowing mace of a lollipop. Then you continue the rest of your movement to dart behind the building. At this point, you've all pretty much shown your cards that you're here and part of this fight. You're the only one who's up in the air. →

name: LAURA
line: For my action, can I still see my duplicate around the corner right there? →

name: MATT
line: Correct. →

name: LAURA
line: She is going to cast-- →

name: MATT
line: Well, you would be able to as you're running. →

name: LAURA
line: Okay. She is going to use the cantrip Sacred Flame! →

name: MATT
line: Against? →

name: LAURA
line: Against the same big guy! →

name: MATT
line: These would be things you would have done before you ran across. →

name: LAURA
line: Yes, basically yes, that's what I did. →

name: LAURA
line: Technically I did this before I moved. →

name: MATT
line: Just letting you know that usually you have to do that as part of your movement. Dexterity saving throw. That is a 12. →

name: LAURA
line: Good! He has to beat 13! It hits him! →

name: MATT
line: It takes 1d8 points of radiant damage. →

name: LAURA
line: Yes it does! Four. →

name: MATT
line: After the shield deflects the lollipop, the flash of radiant energy burns across the armor and the torso. Instinctively it puts up the shield to try and deflect the blow from the eyes. →

name: MATT
line: (screeches) Looks out and doesn't see where it came from, but it's singed a little. That ends Jester's turn, Caleb and Nott, you're up. →

name: LIAM
line: Yeah okay, I will move along the table over here to this spot. →

name: LAURA
line: Well, that's one method to be able to reach. →

name: LIAM
line: I think I have a clear view of the big gnoll, correct? From there? →

name: MATT
line: The big one? You do. →

name: LIAM
line: I mutter a few arcane words under my breath and a circle of flame spins around my hand and three beams of fire shoot out towards this big guy. I cast Scorching Ray. Each one is a separate attack. First one is a 16. →

name: MATT
line: 16 hits. →

name: LIAM
line: Second one is also a 16, the third one is a 17. →

name: MATT
line: All three hit. →

name: LIAM
line: So 6d6 on him. →

name: LIAM
line: Because they all hit. That's four, six-- →

name: TRAVIS
line: What dice are you rolling there, big guy? →

name: LIAM
line: Nine. That's the six? →

name: TRAVIS
line: No, your d20, which one was it? →

name: LIAM
line: This one. →

name: LAURA
line: That's the Grog one. →

name: LIAM
line: Oh, thank you. (counting) That's a total of 19 fire damage on him. →

name: MATT
line: 19 points of fire damage. As the three beams arc out and blast, you see as the large gnoll, who seems to be a pack lord or leader of some kind, sees this coming. Tries to put the shield up, but all three blast into its armor. You watch as flames burn out of it suddenly. As it withdraws and takes a step back-- (grows and howls) It just looks angry. It looks hurt a little bit, but mostly angry. →

name: LIAM
line: I probably have ten feet of movement which I would like to use to move back to where I was and try to not hyperventilate against the back of this building. →

name: MATT
line: Okay. →

name: LIAM
line: Dead center. Yeah. Okay. Good. →

name: MATT
line: Good to know. →

name: LAURA
line: I like that you're facing the wall so it looks like-- →

name: LIAM
line: No, I'm like this. I'm doing this. →

name: MATT
line: Nott, you're up. →

name: SAM
line: Nott's going to poke her head into the window where Beau is inside. Beau is within a few feet of a baddie, right? I'm going to shoot the baddie next to Beau. 15. →

name: MATT
line: 15, that doesn't-- oh wait, for a regular gnoll that just hits, barely. →

name: ALL
line: Regular gnoll! (laughter) →

name: TRAVIS
line: That's all I heard! →

name: SAM
line: Nine points, that's including sneak attack damage. Plus fury of the small, so 11 points of damage. →

name: MATT
line: Well, it's your level, right? You went up a level so technically-- →

name: SAM
line: Ten points of-- wait, what did I say? Nine? 12! Thank you. →

name: MATT
line: 12 points of damage. As this gnoll is in the process of slamming through the front doorway, the doorway has been bashed inward on each side and Beau is in the process of dodging and weaving and getting out of the way. You find one opening and fire your crossbow bolt. It goes through the window, through the doorway bisecting the two different rooms and straight under the clavicle near the heart section of it. As it pierces in, (screams) and it coughs up a bunch of blood onto the front of its hide armor. It's not dead, but it's pretty hurt. That was a pretty nasty blow. →

name: SAM
line: Movement, I will use to climb up into the second floor window. That's not me. The one next to your right. There you go. →

name: MATT
line: Go ahead and make an athletics check. →

name: SAM
line: That was good, but it's disadvantage. That's better. Athletics. It's a straight ten. →

name: MATT
line: Ten is exactly what you needed. That was the DC to get up onto the second floor. As you come up into the second floor, you immediately climb and leap up through the window into a chamber that is filled with roaring flame. →

name: SAM
line: (screams) →

name: MATT
line: Trying to avert your gaze, the heat is pressing into you. There's a table that's on fire, most of the roof has been burned away. There's beams that have fallen. You're like, "This was a bad idea!" →

name: SAM
line: I say: This is fine! (laughter) →

name: SAM
line: Can I use my dash? Was that all my movement? →

name: MATT
line: No, that was your movement to get up there and you could use your bonus action if you'd like to. →

name: SAM
line: Okay, I'll use a bonus action to get-- Is towards the window less fiery? →

name: MATT
line: It's still burning, but you're going to have to leap over the flames to get there. →

name: SAM
line: Sure. →

name: MATT
line: I'll say make an acrobatics check to try and leap over parts of broken-- →

name: SAM
line: It was two threes. →

name: MATT
line: You make it across. You leap onto the first beam and it breaks. You're like "Ah, that burns!" You leap again onto the next one, "Ah, that burns too!" Eventually, you get over there. Your boots are on fire, and you're having to pat them out real fast. You suffer five points of fire damage getting across the room. →

name: SAM
line: Rough. →

name: MATT
line: But you are in an area where it seems it's just embers, and most of the flame is catching behind you for the moment. You get the sense that it might begin to spread in the next minute or so, but at this point, you're not immediately in the threat of flame and you have a look down into the entirety of the courtyard with a little bit of cover. In fact, it would be considered half cover up in here. →

name: SAM
line: Half cover. I'm done. Hey, look at that, it's me in the window. →

name: MATT
line: At which point, you can see the skeletal gnolls that are out there all at once turn and begin shambling forward. There's one this way that begins to run up and take a swing at your duplicitous form, before striking out with no effect. This one spins and comes up into Beau and then there's one that emerges from-- →

name: LAURA
line: I'm going to point out I've been doing it wrong because I was thinking of my duplicate as like Trinket was, which had movement the same as me, and it is a bonus action to move my duplicate, which I did not realize. I'm going to stop doing that. →

name: MATT
line: That's okay, we learn what the new abilities do. →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah, I just looked it up and I'm sorry. →

name: MATT
line: That's all good. →

name: SAM
line: So your duplicate is somehow less useful than Trinket? Is that what you're saying? (laughter) →

name: LIAM
line: She doesn't give a shit about that bear. →

name: MATT
line: Out of the doorway here, another one of them bursts through and runs to the back and sees the direction where Jester is in the process of glancing over to the side. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh! That's real me! →

name: MATT
line: It uses its action to charge up into combat with you. It can't actually make an attack this turn, but it's right up to you. Its gaping, vacuous skull, open sockets, trying to bear down on you. That's going to end their go, except for the one that's striking at you, Beau. →

name: TALIESIN
line: There's one on the roof still, too. →

name: MATT
line: Well, that's not one of the skeletal ones. →

name: MATT
line: That's going to be, with disadvantage, 17 to hit. →

name: MARISHA
line: 17 hits. →

name: MATT
line: 17 hit. It bites out towards you with its broken toothy jaws and you suffer six points of piercing damage as the jaws clamp down on your forearm and you're like "Oh god!" It's pushing now to try to find the space next to the larger gnoll and they're both currently blocking the doorway from your escape. →

name: MARISHA
line: I'm doing the animal control thing and be like: No, no, bad. →

name: MATT
line: Which, by the way, top of the round. Beau, your go. →

name: MARISHA
line: My go, okay. Let me put these hit points in. Apply changes. →

name: LAURA
line: This makes my duplicate way less fun if I can't move her. →

name: TALIESIN
line: You get bonus actions all the time. →

name: LAURA
line: That's my spiritual weapon. →

name: SAM
line: She may move if you move away from her 30 feet; she may just come with you. →

name: LAURA
line: 120 feet. →

name: SAM
line: Oh shit. But you can leave her out in the open. →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah, at least she's directing fire. →

name: MARISHA
line: Okay, I'm going to do something creative. →

name: MARISHA
line: I'm going to take the arrow that Nott just fired into the guy's chest. I'm going to grab it. Can I rip it out with my off-hand, spin around, and stab him back in the blade? →

name: MATT
line: Awesome, go ahead and roll for your main attack. →

name: MARISHA
line: God blessed fuck. That's not good. That's a ten. →

name: MATT
line: You pull it out. There's a horrible pained yelp as you yank it out. As you spin around and attempt to slam it into its back, its giant, thick gnoll arm slams into the door frame and blocks your ability to pass forward. You get caught over its arm and have to withdraw. →

name: MARISHA
line: Okay, I'm going to take my other off-hand attack on the one that just bit down on me. I'm going to rip from it and elbow crack it right in the nose. →

name: MATT
line: The one that just bit you? All right, go for it. →

name: MARISHA
line: Damn it. That's 11. →

name: MATT
line: 11? 11 doesn't hit unfortunately. Lot of whiffing on both sides when it comes around Beau, but as you attempt to strike out with the elbow, it does strike its skull, and its jaw unhinges and snaps it back into place. →

name: MARISHA
line: Shit, that was my bonus action, wasn't it? →

name: MATT
line: Yep. →

name: MARISHA
line: I can't use a ki point, can I? →

name: MATT
line: As a bonus action, you can use a ki point to do two as your bonus if you have it. Flurry of Blows. →

name: MARISHA
line: I was wanting to do a ki point to do Patient Defense again. →

name: MATT
line: No, you used your bonus action, sorry. You want to move or you want to stay where you are? →

name: MARISHA
line: Yeah, can I back up into the house and close the door? →

name: MATT
line: The door frame is pretty banged up, you can try. You can certainly try. →

name: MARISHA
line: Sure! →

name: MATT
line: Taking a step back, one has spears, so you're still in its melee range as you try and close the door. They'll both get attacks of opportunity on you if you do that. →

name: MARISHA
line: No, I'll stay. →

name: MATT
line: Okay, so you stay there holding your position. That ends Beau's turn. The gnolls go. →

name: MATT
line: Before we do anything, the one that's right next to the guy on the wall, what do you want it to do? →

name: TRAVIS
line: Melee, so if he has a weapon or anything, hit him. If not, just knock him the fuck off the roof. →

name: MATT
line: He has a spear or you can make a shove, up to you. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Spear! →

name: MATT
line: All right, so the spear attack, it's going to, as it climbs to the top and lunges out with its arm. Go ahead and make an attack roll for me. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Oh, okay. Plus anything? →

name: MATT
line: It is plus five. →

name: TRAVIS
line: That's a 20. →

name: MATT
line: Sorry, plus four. →

name: TRAVIS
line: That's a 19. →

name: MATT
line: 19 definitely hits. Go ahead and roll 1d6 damage plus two. Two hands technically, so that would be 1d8. Sorry. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah, that's much better. Nine. →

name: MATT
line: Nine. Nein! It jams the spear with both hands into its friend and the gnoll yelps and grabs it and pulls it out and looks at it confused and angry. →

name: MATT
line: Trying to figure out what exactly happened. As it does so, it's going to attempt to shove it off the wall that just hit it. Make a roll for the athletics check of the other gnoll. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Adding my modifier or its? →

name: MATT
line: Its modifier. →

name: TRAVIS
line: 16 plus? →

name: MATT
line: 16 plus two. It beat it. It rolled a 17. →

name: MATT
line: After it gets stabbed and looks back at the gnoll that you took control and Sparta-kicks it off of the edge of the roof. It slides and tumbles down, landing onto the ground prone right next to Molly. →

name: MATT
line: It does suffer one point of falling damage. Molly, you watch as it tumbles and hits the dirt next to you and it's like (groans). You watch as this mystical crown of weird iron horns are floating above its head. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Is this--? →

name: MATT
line: That takes up his turn. This guy's going to move forward and advance. This is unfortunate for Beau, partially. This one is going to fire at Beau. This one actually can see Nott and this one is going to take a shot at Nott as well. So one attack against you, Beau, from that gnoll there. →

name: MATT
line: That's going to be 11, misses. It actually hits the wall and embeds itself into the side of the door frame. The two attacking you, Nott-- You do have partial cover on these guys. Half cover will be plus two bonus to AC. The first one is going to be a 20. →

name: SAM
line: Hits. →

name: MATT
line: The second one is a natural two. The one that does hit you, you suffer nine points of piercing damage. A lot of nines tonight! As the arrow suddenly arcs upward and hits you right in the side of the jaw and carves through part of your neck that way before it exits out the other side. You have this big gash on the side. It doesn't quite hit the jugular, thankfully, but it is pretty messy as you are starting to bleed down the side of your neck. →

name: LAURA
line: Isn't she harder to hit because she's so little? →

name: MATT
line: Yeah, but that one had some decent aim. →

name: MATT
line: These guys here continue to push forward that way and they're going to use their other action to push forward. This guy is going to go ahead and throw another body up onto this as the other one's pushing it. They don't get quite as far because one of them stopped pushing, but they're getting to the edge of the map. The one that's snarling there is watching them vanish behind. This guy around the edge is going to, let's see. Seeing you yelp up in the window, he's going to take a shot at you. Beau's currently being dealt with two of them and you're up in the flames right now. That is going to be a 15, which I do not believe hits. →

name: SAM
line: No. →

name: MATT
line: This one strikes the ember wood on the outside and breaks through, but it only comes partially out and is embedded, missing you by an inch. That finishes the gnolls' turn, I believe. →

name: MATT
line: Oh, this guy is going to turn and take a swing at Beau with a spear, two hands. That is a 16. →

name: MARISHA
line: Miss. →

name: MATT
line: 16 misses. It swings out and you actually catch the spear off to the side and you're now in a strength tug of war with its own weapon as it's-- →

name: MARISHA
line: My stick! Mine! Drop it! Bad! Do you want to play or not? →

name: MATT
line: Ending their go, it goes to Fjord's turn. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Crown of Madness piece of shit. Can I go ahead and send, using my action to maintain it, can I send that stupid ass back up the roof? →

name: MATT
line: Let me double-check something. →

name: TALIESIN
line: The damage may have-- →

name: TRAVIS
line: Knocked it out. No! →

name: MATT
line: I don't know if that's the case. It's not just that. It already moved on its turn, it takes its turn, you have to spend your action to maintain the spell, so it won't do anything on your turn. →

name: MATT
line: So either you continue to maintain the spell, and then next turn it's still under your control, or you do whatever you want-- →

name: LAURA
line: Or you drop it because he's prone and Molly will get super advantage on hitting him. →

name: SAM
line: Super advantage! →

name: TALIESIN
line: Yeah, I don't know what the crown is. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Fuck it, I'll drop it and I'll come into the street, down the way 30 feet. But I look like a gnoll. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Concentration's gone. →

name: MATT
line: Oh, that's right. Thank you. →

name: TRAVIS
line: But I still look like a gnoll. →

name: MATT
line: Yes, you do. →

name: TRAVIS
line: That will be my turn. →

name: MATT
line: All righty, are you holding your action to do anything? →

name: TRAVIS
line: I guess, because I dropped it, I have it. →

name: MATT
line: You have your action because you didn't maintain the spell. →

name: TRAVIS
line: With my action, I'm going to cast Hexblade's Curse on that big son of a bitch. →

name: MATT
line: This guy? →

name: TRAVIS
line: Yeah. →

name: MATT
line: I believe it's a bonus action to do that, isn't it? →

name: TRAVIS
line: It is. →

name: MATT
line: So you still have your action. →

name: TALIESIN
line: You could even make it to get into his face. →

name: TRAVIS
line: With my action, I will Eldritch Blast from where I am. →

name: MATT
line: Go for it, make the attack roll. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Thank you. Skadoosh. It's a 15 plus six, 21. →

name: MATT
line: That hits, go ahead and roll damage. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Amazing, 1d10. (counting) Sorry, I should've looked at this beforehand. 14. →

name: MATT
line: 14 points of damage. As you rush up, you watch as this squatter gnoll saunters out in the middle, points to the seeming leader of this cluster, and as it does, the soot and ash from the ground begins to affix itself around the inside of its armor, holding it in place for the moment. →

name: MATT
line: With the other hand holding the suddenly appearing barnacle-studded blade, you unleash this blast of eldritch energy that slams into the center of the armor. You watch as the energy courses through all of the crevices between the scales that are overlapping. As it fades, you watch as this bit of steam and blood come out of its mouth, and it turns right to you, its head turning, it spits a cluster. →

name: TRAVIS
line: (yipping) →

name: MATT
line: We'll get to that. That's your turn? →

name: TRAVIS
line: That's it. →

name: MATT
line: Okay, it's his turn now. Now it-- (shrieks and growls) (laughter) →

name: MATT
line: And goes running and rushes up towards you. →

name: MATT
line: You watch as previously it just had this large pole on its back? It pulls it and brings it loose as you see a large two-handed glaive come swooping, which doesn't actually-- it can get to there and still hit you because of its reach. As it runs forward, it brings it down. It's going to multi-attack you twice with it. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Okay. →

name: MATT
line: First one is going to be a 21 to hit? →

name: TRAVIS
line: Oh, that'll hit. →

name: MATT
line: And a 17 to hit. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Both hit. →

name: MATT
line: Both hit. All right. →

name: TRAVIS
line: That's okay, I've got the armor. It deals damage when you hit me. →

name: LIAM
line: Ooh. →

name: MATT
line: That is eight points of slashing damage on the first hit. Wham! As the large polearm-- the axe-like hooked blade at the end of it. You can see the same spines that are on its armor are affixed to the edge of it. As it slams down towards you, the armor bursts, this cold energy that-- how much damage does he take? →

name: TRAVIS
line: I got ten temporary hit points at second level, so he takes eight points of cold damage. →

name: MATT
line: Slick. Second strike? He rolled a one. That is going to be four points of slashing damage for the second strike. →

name: TRAVIS
line: So he'll take two points of cold damage and I'll take the other two points. →

name: MATT
line: Nice. →

name: MARISHA
line: You have so many fun gadgets! →

name: MATT
line: Oh! He does get back his Incite Rampage. At which point, he's going to go ahead and glance over towards the gnoll that is-- hmm. →

name: SAM
line: The grassy gnoll? →

name: MATT
line: The grassy gnoll, yes. Thank you, Sam. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Thank you, Sam. →

name: MATT
line: All right, yeah. The only one that they can currently see that's in melee range at the moment, because the wall's there, is going to be the one next to Beau. →

name: SAM
line: No, really. Thank you, Sam. →

name: MATT
line: Sincerely. So after it strikes you twice with the glaive, bits of ice shards spray off with each blow now affixing to the ash and the energy that's instilled this armor after you blasted it. →

name: MATT
line: It looks over to the one right in front of Beau and goes (growls and snarls) and it glances over its shoulder, and with renewed strength, pulls the spear free from your grasp and goes for another strike against you as a reaction. →

name: MARISHA
line: Bad dog. →

name: MATT
line: That is going to be a 19 to hit. →

name: MARISHA
line: How much? →

name: MARISHA
line: That one hits. →

name: SAM
line: How many are engaged with you right now? →

name: MATT
line: Two. →

name: MARISHA
line: Three? Two? →

name: LAURA
line: She's so wanted. →

name: MATT
line: That's going to be seven points of piercing damage. →

name: LIAM
line: Apologies to my friend. →

name: MATT
line: All righty, that's going to end his turn and the guards back here are going to come forward and-- →

name: TRAVIS
line: Oh, let's go this way! →

name: MATT
line: They're both going to fire at the one on the rooftop. →

name: SAM
line: Hey! →

name: LAURA
line: (laughter) And a miss and a miss! →

name: MATT
line: First one's a miss. Second one is a 16. That hits. →

name: SAM
line: Hey! →

name: MATT
line: It's an eight plus two so that's ten points of damage. Based on the Crown of Madness damage it took earlier, the spear's enough to finish it off. You watch as on the top, it goes and draws an arrow and pulls it back, looking down at you as you're down in the square. Then one of the guards pulls its crossbow and (shrieks) it stumbles back and falls dead on the ground. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Here we go. →

name: MATT
line: That ends that one, the other guard over there. They're going to go ahead and move up the side and step out now that it seems to be opening and is going to fire towards the skeletal gnoll that is currently in the process of harassing the image that as far as they're concerned is just Jester. It's going to be-- yeah, that hits. →

name: MATT
line: Without issue. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm not used to melee combat. This is so terrifying. →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah, right? →

name: TRAVIS
line: Get up in that. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I don't want to get up in that. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Get a whole bunch of stank right in your face. →

name: MATT
line: Pulls out the heavy crossbow and fires and does 11 points of damage, which is enough to shatter the skeletal gnoll witherling. As it falls to the ground and breaks into a scattered pile of bone bits and dried gnoll flesh. That ends the guards' turn. Molly, you're up. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I'm going to stab this thing that just fell right in front of me. Just going to stab it. →

name: MATT
line: It is prone, so I believe you have advantage against it. Yep! With each attack. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Question about Rite of the Dawn, is it just plus three or is it just my wisdom or is it also a--? →

name: MATT
line: Wisdom bonus is against undead creatures. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Okay, this is not an undead creature. →

name: MATT
line: It is not. There are undead creatures among the pack, but there are none there. It's just straight Rite damage. →

name: TALIESIN
line: So it's just an extra 1d4. Okay, just checking. That's how that works. Okay, cool. →

name: TALIESIN
line: See if I hit? Thank you. 13? →

name: MATT
line: 13 unfortunately misses. The first strike-- →

name: TALIESIN
line: Oh my god. →

name: MATT
line: As you swing down onto the ground, it scrambles about and pulls its shield up just in time. Your blade catches the edge, embeds itself an inch into its rear. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I hit it with the other one. →

name: MATT
line: You use your one blade to push the shield off to the side as it's still there, and trying to jam downward. Go for it. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Definitely hit. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Come on. Oh, thank God. 21. →

name: MATT
line: 21 hits. Go ahead and roll damage. →

name: TRAVIS
line: (chanting) Level three! Level three! →

name: TALIESIN
line: So that's nine points of damage. →

name: MATT
line: Nine points of damage. You manage to jam underneath and hit it in the chest. It shrieks with pain and pushes the blade out of its body with a sheer flexing of its muscle. It begins to try and get up off the ground. It's hurt, but it's still standing or about to be standing in a moment. You can move if you'd like to. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Yeah, that's right. I can break combat with it. It doesn't matter, right? At this point? Or does it get an attack of opportunity? →

name: MATT
line: It does get an attack of opportunity, but it has disadvantage on him. →

name: TALIESIN
line: There's no way I can circle up onto the wall, is there? →

name: MATT
line: Onto the wall? →

name: TALIESIN
line: Yeah. Get a little vantage on him. →

name: MATT
line: You could. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I want to be able to hop on because I want to head that direction afterwards. All right. →

name: MATT
line: You get up onto the wall. →

name: TALIESIN
line: And that way, if he tries to run or do anything, I can futz with him. →

name: MATT
line: Cool, that's fine. Molly, your turn is over. →

name: MATT
line: Jester, you're up. →

name: LAURA
line: Yay! I'm going to run away from this guy that's next to me. I'm going to run out into the alley so I can see people. →

name: MATT
line: This way? →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah. →

name: MATT
line: As you rush out, it takes a swing attack of opportunity towards you. This is going to be with a club. It has a heavy wooden club and it makes a giant arc towards you as you speed away. That is 19 to hit. →

name: LAURA
line: Can I use a reaction on that? →

name: MATT
line: You can, yeah. →

name: LAURA
line: I'm going to say "I am rubber and you are glue" and use Hellish Rebuke on him. In Infernal. →

name: MATT
line: All right. Well, first, the club hits you and you take five points of bludgeoning damage. →

name: LAURA
line: Okay. →

name: MATT
line: As you turn around, you say that at him and unleash your Hellish Rebuke. He has to make a constitution saving throw, I believe it is, right? →

name: LAURA
line: Maybe. Hold on. →

name: SAM
line: You have to save first. →

name: LAURA
line: I'm applying my changes to my health. →

name: SAM
line: Now close out of that. →

name: LAURA
line: This is so much! →

name: MATT
line: It has to make a constitution save-- No, that's dexterity saving throw, which it does not make. It's seven. So it suffers 2d10 cold damage. So how much did you deal? →

name: LAURA
line: Oh, 2d10. Okay. Nine. →

name: ALL
line: Nine. →

name: TALIESIN
line: This is becoming a thing. →

name: LIAM
line: So sorry, guys. There you go. →

name: MATT
line: As you dart away, you release your fury and anger, and you watch as suddenly this blast of cold water and ice energy burst out of its body. The inside of its somewhat cavernous ribcage is now filled with frost crystals, jutting out and breaking parts of the ribs. It looks heavily damaged, but still standing. →

name: LAURA
line: Ooh, chilly! →

name: MATT
line: All righty. →

name: SAM
line: You still have your action, right? →

name: LAURA
line: I know, and my bonus action! →

name: MATT
line: Yeah. →

name: LAURA
line: So for my bonus action, I'm going to send my lollipop towards the giant guy and try to hit him. At the same time, I'm going to cast-- What am I going to cast? Radiant-- No, Guiding Bolt! →

name: MATT
line: Okay. →

name: LAURA
line: With, you know, I'm going to do a little flourish, like pink energy comes out. →

name: MATT
line: All right. Go ahead and make your spell attack. →

name: LAURA
line: Okay. Spell attack? Ooh, that's good. →

name: LAURA
line: That's a 19 plus five. →

name: MATT
line: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage. →

name: LAURA
line: Okay. →

name: TALIESIN
line: That's new dice, man. →

name: LAURA
line: Yes, yes, yes. →

name: SAM
line: I touched one. →

name: LAURA
line: You didn't touch these ones. →

name: SAM
line: That's why they rolled so shit. →

name: LAURA
line: Six, eight, nine radiant. →

name: ALL
line: Nine! →

name: MATT
line: What's up with the nines? It's getting ridiculous. →

name: TRAVIS
line: CritRoleStats is going-- (clicking). →

name: MATT
line: Yep. →

name: LIAM
line: We're losing subscribers in Europe right now. →

name: LAURA
line: That's radiant damage, and then the Spiritual Weapon-- →

name: MATT
line: All right. Guiding Bolt: the next attack against it has advantage. →

name: LAURA
line: Oh, good. Then the Spiritual Weapon will have advantage. Great! →

name: LIAM
line: Halt den Mund! →

name: LAURA
line: Oh, good. So that's 20. →

name: MATT
line: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage for Spiritual Weapon. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Nice! →

name: LAURA
line: Where's my eight? Six plus three is nine! →

name: ALL
line: Nine! →

name: MATT
line: This is absurd, guys. This is absurd. All righty, does that end your turn? →

name: LAURA
line: Oh, I'm going to use the rest of my movement to run over and try to get behind this wall. →

name: MATT
line: You're from over there, that's (counting) 20, you have ten more feet. You can get there. →

name: LAURA
line: That'll work. I was going to go to the brick wall. →

name: MATT
line: Oh, the brick wall. You'll get up onto it. →

name: LAURA
line: Yeah, sure, why not? →

name: MATT
line: It's considered rough terrain, so you technically can't get all the way on the other side. You climb up onto it. That finishes your turn. As you finish blasting with the Guiding Bolt, at the same time as it slams and sparkles you watch as the lollipop clubs down onto the back of its head. That ends your turn. Caleb, Nott, you're up. →

name: LIAM
line: Okay. I start moving back towards the same vantage point I had before and I see Jester above me, and I see a guy over there covered in ice, and I whip around and the diamond comes up and I go (sizzling) and I was about to make it acid, but there's ice everywhere so it's ice now. Chromatic Orb off to the big guy in the middle of town square, yeah. →

name: MATT
line: Go ahead and make the attack roll. →

name: LIAM
line: It misses entirely. →

name: MATT
line: It spins and hits the ground. You watch as ice crawls up the side of the building. I will say it does manage to put out part of the fire that is currently burning the building. →

name: MARISHA
line: You did a good thing here. You did good today. →

name: TALIESIN
line: You made lemonade. Way to make some lemonade. →

name: MARISHA
line: You just got the participation trophy. →

name: LIAM
line: Then I use the rest of my movement to press my back against the wall and go nein, nein, nein. →

name: MATT
line: As you move out, where are you at now? →

name: LIAM
line: Still behind the same building. →

name: MATT
line: You dart out and fire, and then back. All righty. That ends your turn. Nott! →

name: SAM
line: Just a little perspective here. The gnolls pushing away the cart, how many are there? And what are they--? →

name: MATT
line: There are currently three that are gathered around it and in the process of pushing it. →

name: MATT
line: They're getting momentum as it's going. →

name: SAM
line: No obvious weak points on the cart or anything? →

name: MATT
line: Make a perception check. It will take your bonus action to do so. →

name: MARISHA
line: Take out a wheel! →

name: SAM
line: It's going to take my bonus action to do so? Then I will not look at the cart. →

name: TALIESIN
line: It will move slower if we kill them. →

name: SAM
line: I'm sure it will, but I don't know if I could kill one in one shot. Instead I will, using my goblin feet claws, just dig in and I'm going to go upside down so I can see into where Beau is and shoot one of the ones next to her. →

name: LAURA
line: You can do that?! →

name: SAM
line: I don't know! →

name: MATT
line: As you dig in and hang down, you watch as your hood and hair hangs upside down. You pull the crossbow down. The tension of the bolt is holding it in, thankfully, otherwise it would just fall from its upside down standpoint, and you fire! You can go ahead and make a strike. →

name: MATT
line: Technically you have two that you're in view of here, they both have three-quarters cover because of the nearby door and the angle. →

name: SAM
line: The ones next to her? →

name: MATT
line: Yeah. →

name: SAM
line: Ugh. Well, I got to hit them. →

name: MATT
line: Which one are you shooting? The skeletal one or the--? →

name: SAM
line: The one that I hit before. →

name: MATT
line: Okay, so that one. Go for it. →

name: SAM
line: That is 17. →

name: MARISHA
line: I think that hits, right? →

name: MATT
line: 17 would hit if it didn't have three-quarters cover, which gives a plus five bonus to AC. →

name: MARISHA
line: Oh, poopers! →

name: MATT
line: Unfortunately, it's just the large part of the door frame in the way, there's Beau in the way, and there's a lot going on in that moment. As you go and fire it just zips past and slams into part of the now broken door that's coming off the hinges. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Man, I hate level three. →

name: SAM
line: Cool. I'm going to go pop back up to the top floor, and use my bonus action to hide. →

name: MATT
line: All righty. Go ahead and make a stealth check. →

name: SAM
line: Nope. Ten. →

name: MATT
line: You get down low, but your hood and hair are now frizzed and poking out the side. That ends your turn, Nott. This one is going to rush forward, pursuing Jester. That one is going to attempt to continue to whale on Beau. That's going to be a 15 against Beau. →

name: MARISHA
line: Miss. →

name: MATT
line: Misses, you just duck out of the way as it tries to bite you and slam your elbow onto its snout, knocking it out of the way. Just holding on, holding off in this doorway. The one that runs up towards you is going to attempt to hit you again with a club. That is going to be a 19. Again. →

name: LAURA
line: Ugh! →

name: MATT
line: Oh that's a d4, sorry. That's six points of bludgeoning damage. Whack! As the club hits you in the back of the head as you're just climbing over the top of the wall. You have to catch yourself from tumbling face first into the dirt on the other side. You manage to catch your footing on top of the wall. But it's now up, and in combat with both you and the guard from earlier. →

name: MATT
line: That ends their turn. Top of the round, Beau, you're up. →

name: MARISHA
line: Oh god, okay. I'm going to taste a little bit of blood that's now in my mouth, get real fucking pissed off, and I'm going to do a Star Wars-style flourish and go crack down to the new guy. →

name: MATT
line: The skeletal one? There's a skeletal one, and there's the one that's been fighting you this whole time. →

name: MARISHA
line: Which one looks like he has less damage? →

name: MATT
line: The skeletal one hasn't been damaged yet, but it looks a little more fragile. The one that got shot by Nott earlier still has the big-- →

name: MARISHA
line: Let's do the skeletal guy. →

name: MATT
line: Go for it. Do the attack. →

name: MARISHA
line: Not good at all. 14. →

name: MATT
line: That hits. Doesn't have as strong an armor class as the other one. →

name: MARISHA
line: Okay. Eight points of damage. →

name: MATT
line: Eight points of damage. That one's already been damaged previously. As you bring the staff down with both hands, whack, you slam right through the center of its chest and clavicle. You watch as the torso breaks and folds from the weight of the blow. The skull tumbles off and hits the ground, and it falls into a pile of bones and rags. →

name: MARISHA
line: I'm going to use my bonus action. With that momentum, I'm going to stick the staff in the ground, and use that to lift myself up and do a two-footer kick into the other guy. →

name: MATT
line: Go for it. Single attack? →

name: MARISHA
line: Let's do Flurry of Blows. →

name: MATT
line: All right, so this is your third ki point? →

name: MARISHA
line: Nope, this is my second. →

name: MATT
line: Right, because you did the-- No, because you did flurry earlier, didn't you? →

name: MARISHA
line: I did, but I did it as an action, not on a bonus action, and you said I didn't have to use a ki point. →

name: MATT
line: No, a Flurry of Blows, I thought. →

name: MARISHA
line: I did Patient Defense, I did one Flurry of Blows-- →

name: MATT
line: You did the dodge action, as an action, which doesn't take any ki points. You spent one doing a Flurry of Blows earlier. →

name: MARISHA
line: I spent one doing deflect, and then one to do Flurry of Blows. →

name: MATT
line: This is your third one. →

name: MARISHA
line: No. This is the second one. This is the first Flurry of Blows I'm doing. →

name: MATT
line: I'm sorry, that's what I was asking, my confusion. Cool, so go for it. →

name: MARISHA
line: Shit, I don't remember. This was what I rolled, right? Okay, not good. Ten. →

name: MATT
line: Ten against him? Nope. As you kick both feet forward, one hits and skims off the shoulder. The other? →

name: MARISHA
line: The other is okay. 15. →

name: MATT
line: 15 just hits. Go ahead and roll damage. →

name: TRAVIS
line: (singing) Pour some sugar on him. →

name: MARISHA
line: Seven. →

name: MATT
line: Seven points of damage? All righty, based on the damage that you had sustained earlier and the blows from earlier, as you strike him with the other foot, you snap the side of his jaw, which breaks out. As he stumbles backward, you take the back of the staff and crack up underneath the jaw, snapping the neck the rest of the way, and it falls to the ground, no longer moving. You still have your movement. →

name: MARISHA
line: Now I'm going to look around, and I'm going to step back and into the house for just a minute. →

name: SAM
line: Into the house? →

name: TALIESIN
line: This is fine. →

name: MARISHA
line: This is fine. Just so I have cover. Right in the doorway. →

name: TRAVIS
line: Just going to take a quick timeout. →

name: MARISHA
line: Quick timeout. →

name: SAM
line: There's a really loud ticking clock in the room with you. →

name: MARISHA
line: You hear a (faint scream) in the distance. →

name: MATT
line: With that, this gnoll is going to stand up. →

name: MATT
line: Molly's on the wall. →

name: TALIESIN
line: I know, I'm being an asshole. →

name: MATT
line: It's okay. Stands up. →

name: TALIESIN
line: Man, I'm normally the one with shaky hands. →

name: MATT
line: That's more because these walls are not the most sturdy. There you go. Stands up to you. This one is going to step forward into the way. This one is going to join in there. Those three now in visual range. These two are both going to take shots at Jester. This one's going to take a shot at Fjord. Two longbows aiming in your direction. →

name: MATT
line: That's a 20 and a natural one. The second one misses. You suffer eight points of piercing damage as the arrow sinks right into your torso, right in the stomach area, and pierces through.
